212 #define dbg(x) DebugLog((x),D_MAP) << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << ": "

214 static cata::colony<item> nulitems; // Returned when &i_at() is asked for an OOB value

217 
218 // Map stack methods.
219 map_stack::iterator map_stack::erase( map_stack::const_iterator it )
220 {
221  return myorigin->i_rem( location, it );
222 }
223 
224 void map_stack::insert( const item &newitem )
225 {
226  myorigin->add_item_or_charges( location, newitem );
227 }
228 
229 units::volume map_stack::max_volume() const
230 {
231  if( !myorigin->inbounds( location ) ) {
232  return 0_ml;
233  } else if( myorigin->has_furn( location ) ) {
234  return myorigin->furn( location ).obj().max_volume;
235  }
236  return myorigin->ter( location ).obj().max_volume;
237 }
238 
239 // Map class methods.
240 
241 map::map( int mapsize, bool zlev ) : my_MAPSIZE( mapsize ), my_HALF_MAPSIZE( mapsize / 2 ),
242  zlevels( zlev )
243 {
244 
245  if( zlevels ) {
246  grid.resize( static_cast<size_t>( my_MAPSIZE ) * my_MAPSIZE * OVERMAP_LAYERS, nullptr );
247  } else {
248  grid.resize( static_cast<size_t>( my_MAPSIZE ) * my_MAPSIZE, nullptr );
249  }
250 
251  for( auto &ptr : pathfinding_caches ) {
252  ptr = std::make_unique<pathfinding_cache>();
253  }
254 
255  dbg( D_INFO ) << "map::map(): my_MAPSIZE: " << my_MAPSIZE << " z-levels enabled:" << zlevels;
256  traplocs.resize( trap::count() );
257 }
258 
259 map::~map()
260 {
261  if( ( _main_requires_cleanup && !_main_cleanup_override ) ||
262  ( _main_cleanup_override && *_main_cleanup_override ) ) {
263  get_map().reset_vehicles_sm_pos();
264  get_map().rebuild_vehicle_level_caches();
265  g->load_npcs();
266  }
267 }
268 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(performance-noexcept-move-constructor)
269 map &map::operator=( map && ) = default;
270 
271 static submap null_submap;
272 
273 void map::set_transparency_cache_dirty( const int zlev )
274 {
275  if( inbounds_z( zlev ) ) {
276  get_cache( zlev ).transparency_cache_dirty.set();
277  }
278 }
279 
280 void map::set_transparency_cache_dirty( const tripoint &p, bool field )
281 {
282  if( inbounds( p ) ) {
283  const tripoint smp = ms_to_sm_copy( p );
284  get_cache( smp.z ).transparency_cache_dirty.set( smp.x * MAPSIZE + smp.y );
285  if( !field ) {
286  get_creature_tracker().invalidate_reachability_cache();
287  }
288  }
289 }
290 
291 void map::set_seen_cache_dirty( const tripoint &change_location )
292 {
293  if( inbounds( change_location ) ) {
294  level_cache &cache = get_cache( change_location.z );
295  if( cache.seen_cache_dirty ) {
296  return;
297  }
298  if( cache.seen_cache[change_location.x][change_location.y] != 0.0 ||
299  cache.camera_cache[change_location.x][change_location.y] != 0.0 ) {
300  cache.seen_cache_dirty = true;
301  }
302  }
303 }
304 
305 void map::set_seen_cache_dirty( const int zlevel )
306 {
307  if( inbounds_z( zlevel ) ) {
308  level_cache &cache = get_cache( zlevel );
309  cache.seen_cache_dirty = true;
310  }
311 }
312 
313 void map::set_outside_cache_dirty( const int zlev )
314 {
315  if( inbounds_z( zlev ) ) {
316  get_cache( zlev ).outside_cache_dirty = true;
317  }
318 }
319 
320 void map::set_floor_cache_dirty( const int zlev )
321 {
322  if( inbounds_z( zlev ) ) {
323  get_cache( zlev ).floor_cache_dirty = true;
324  }
325 }
326 
327 bool map::memory_cache_dec_is_dirty( const tripoint &p ) const
328 {
329  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
330  debugmsg( "memory_cache_dec_is_dirty called on out of bounds position" );
331  return true;
332  }
333  return !get_cache( p.z ).map_memory_cache_dec[p.x + p.y * MAPSIZE_Y];
334 }
335 
336 void map::memory_cache_dec_set_dirty( const tripoint &p, bool value ) const
337 {
338  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
339  debugmsg( "memory_cache_dec_set_dirty called on out of bounds position" );
340  return;
341  }
342  get_cache( p.z ).map_memory_cache_dec[p.x + p.y * MAPSIZE_Y] = !value;
343 }
344 
345 bool map::memory_cache_ter_is_dirty( const tripoint &p ) const
346 {
347  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
348  debugmsg( "memory_cache_ter_is_dirty called on out of bounds position" );
349  return true;
350  }
351  return !get_cache( p.z ).map_memory_cache_ter[p.x + p.y * MAPSIZE_Y];
352 }
353 
354 void map::memory_cache_ter_set_dirty( const tripoint &p, bool value ) const
355 {
356  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
357  debugmsg( "memory_cache_ter_set_dirty called on out of bounds position" );
358  return;
359  }
360  get_cache( p.z ).map_memory_cache_ter[p.x + p.y * MAPSIZE_Y] = !value;
361 }
362 
363 void map::memory_clear_vehicle_points( const vehicle &veh ) const
364 {
365  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
366  for( const tripoint &p : veh.get_points() ) {
367  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
368  continue;
369  }
370  memory_cache_dec_set_dirty( p, true );
371  player_character.memorize_clear_decoration( getglobal( p ), "vp_" );
372  }
373 }
374 
375 void map::invalidate_map_cache( const int zlev )
376 {
377  if( inbounds_z( zlev ) ) {
378  level_cache &ch = get_cache( zlev );
379  ch.floor_cache_dirty = true;
380  ch.seen_cache_dirty = true;
381  ch.outside_cache_dirty = true;
382  set_transparency_cache_dirty( zlev );
383  }
384 }
385 
386 const_maptile map::maptile_at( const tripoint &p ) const
387 {
388  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
389  return const_maptile( &null_submap, point_zero );
390  }
391 
392  return maptile_at_internal( p );
393 }
394 
395 const_maptile map::maptile_at( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
396 {
397  return maptile_at( p.raw() );
398 }
399 
400 maptile map::maptile_at( const tripoint &p )
401 {
402  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
403  return maptile( &null_submap, point_zero );
404  }
405 
406  return maptile_at_internal( p );
407 }
408 
409 maptile map::maptile_at( const tripoint_bub_ms &p )
410 {
411  return maptile_at( p.raw() );
412 }
413 
414 const_maptile map::maptile_at_internal( const tripoint &p ) const
415 {
416  point l;
417  const submap *const sm = get_submap_at( p, l );
418 
419  return const_maptile( sm, l );
420 }
421 
422 maptile map::maptile_at_internal( const tripoint &p )
423 {
424  point l;
425  submap *const sm = get_submap_at( p, l );
426 
427  return maptile( sm, l );
428 }
429 
430 // Vehicle functions
431 
432 VehicleList map::get_vehicles()
433 {
434  if( !zlevels ) {
435  return get_vehicles( tripoint( 0, 0, abs_sub.z() ),
436  tripoint( SEEX * my_MAPSIZE, SEEY * my_MAPSIZE, abs_sub.z() ) );
437  }
438 
439  return get_vehicles( tripoint( 0, 0, -OVERMAP_DEPTH ),
440  tripoint( SEEX * my_MAPSIZE, SEEY * my_MAPSIZE, OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) );
441 }
442 
443 void map::rebuild_vehicle_level_caches()
444 {
445  clear_vehicle_level_caches();
446 
447  for( int gridz = -OVERMAP_DEPTH; gridz <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; gridz++ ) {
448  // Cache all vehicles
449  level_cache *ch = get_cache_lazy( gridz );
450 
451  if( ch ) {
452  for( vehicle * const &elem : ch->vehicle_list ) {
453  add_vehicle_to_cache( elem );
454  }
455  }
456  }
457 }
458 
459 void map::add_vehicle_to_cache( vehicle *veh )
460 {
461  if( veh == nullptr ) {
462  debugmsg( "Tried to add null vehicle to cache" );
463  return;
464  }
465 
466  // Get parts
467  for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts_with_fakes() ) {
468  if( vpr.part().removed ) {
469  continue;
470  }
471  const tripoint p = veh->global_part_pos3( vpr.part() );
472  level_cache &ch = get_cache( p.z );
473  ch.set_veh_cached_parts( p, *veh, static_cast<int>( vpr.part_index() ) );
474  if( inbounds( p ) ) {
475  ch.set_veh_exists_at( p, true );
476  }
477  }
478 }
479 
480 void map::clear_vehicle_point_from_cache( vehicle *veh, const tripoint &pt )
481 {
482  if( veh == nullptr ) {
483  debugmsg( "Tried to add null vehicle to cache" );
484  return;
485  }
486 
487  level_cache *ch = get_cache_lazy( pt.z );
488  if( ch ) {
489  if( inbounds( pt ) ) {
490  ch->set_veh_exists_at( pt, false );
491  }
492  ch->clear_veh_from_veh_cached_parts( pt, veh );
493  }
494 }
495 
496 void map::clear_vehicle_level_caches( )
497 {
498  for( int gridz = -OVERMAP_DEPTH; gridz <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; gridz++ ) {
499  level_cache *ch = get_cache_lazy( gridz );
500  if( ch ) {
501  ch->clear_vehicle_cache();
502  }
503  }
504 }
505 
506 void map::remove_vehicle_from_cache( vehicle *veh, int zmin, int zmax )
507 {
508  for( int gridz = zmin; gridz <= zmax; gridz++ ) {
509  level_cache *const ch = get_cache_lazy( gridz );
510  if( ch != nullptr ) {
511  ch->vehicle_list.erase( veh );
512  ch->zone_vehicles.erase( veh );
513  }
514  dirty_vehicle_list.erase( veh );
515  }
516 }
517 
518 namespace
519 {
520 void _add_vehicle_to_list( level_cache &ch, vehicle *veh )
521 {
522  ch.vehicle_list.insert( veh );
523  if( !veh->loot_zones.empty() ) {
524  ch.zone_vehicles.insert( veh );
525  }
526 }
527 } // namespace
528 
529 void map::reset_vehicles_sm_pos()
530 {
531  int const zmin = zlevels ? -OVERMAP_DEPTH : abs_sub.z();
532  int const zmax = zlevels ? OVERMAP_HEIGHT : abs_sub.z();
533  for( int z = zmin; z <= zmax; z++ ) {
534  level_cache &ch = get_cache( z );
535  for( int x = 0; x < getmapsize(); x++ ) {
536  for( int y = 0; y < getmapsize(); y++ ) {
537  tripoint const grid( x, y, z );
538  submap *const sm = get_submap_at_grid( grid );
539  if( sm != nullptr ) {
540  for( auto const &elem : sm->vehicles ) {
541  elem->sm_pos = grid;
542  add_vehicle_to_cache( &*elem );
543  _add_vehicle_to_list( ch, &*elem );
544  }
545  }
546  }
547  }
548  }
549 }
550 
551 void map::clear_vehicle_list( const int zlev )
552 {
553  auto *ch = get_cache_lazy( zlev );
554  if( ch ) {
555  ch->vehicle_list.clear();
556  ch->zone_vehicles.clear();
557  }
558 }
559 
560 void map::update_vehicle_list( const submap *const to, const int zlev )
561 {
562  // Update vehicle data
563  level_cache &ch = get_cache( zlev );
564  for( const auto &elem : to->vehicles ) {
565  _add_vehicle_to_list( ch, elem.get() );
566  }
567 }
568 
569 std::unique_ptr<vehicle> map::detach_vehicle( vehicle *veh )
570 {
571  if( veh == nullptr ) {
572  debugmsg( "map::detach_vehicle was passed nullptr" );
573  return std::unique_ptr<vehicle>();
574  }
575 
576  int z = veh->sm_pos.z;
577  if( z < -OVERMAP_DEPTH || z > OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) {
578  debugmsg( "detach_vehicle got a vehicle outside allowed z-level range! name=%s, submap:%d,%d,%d",
579  veh->name, veh->sm_pos.x, veh->sm_pos.y, veh->sm_pos.z );
580  // Try to fix by moving the vehicle here
581  z = veh->sm_pos.z = abs_sub.z();
582  }
583 
584  // Unboard all passengers before detaching
585  for( const vpart_reference &part : veh->get_avail_parts( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE ) ) {
586  Character *passenger = part.get_passenger();
587  if( passenger ) {
588  unboard_vehicle( part, passenger );
589  }
590  }
591  veh->invalidate_towing( true );
592  submap *const current_submap = get_submap_at_grid( veh->sm_pos );
593  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
594  debugmsg( "Tried to detach vehicle at (%d,%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", veh->sm_pos.x,
595  veh->sm_pos.y, veh->sm_pos.z );
596  return std::unique_ptr<vehicle>();
597  }
598 
599  level_cache &ch = get_cache( z );
600  for( size_t i = 0; i < current_submap->vehicles.size(); i++ ) {
601  if( current_submap->vehicles[i].get() == veh ) {
602  for( const tripoint &pt : veh->get_points() ) {
603  if( inbounds( pt ) ) {
604  memory_cache_dec_set_dirty( pt, true );
605  }
606  get_avatar().memorize_clear_decoration( getglobal( pt ), "vp_" );
607  }
608  ch.vehicle_list.erase( veh );
609  ch.zone_vehicles.erase( veh );
610  std::unique_ptr<vehicle> result = std::move( current_submap->vehicles[i] );
611  current_submap->vehicles.erase( current_submap->vehicles.begin() + i );
612  if( veh->tracking_on ) {
613  overmap_buffer.remove_vehicle( veh );
614  }
615  dirty_vehicle_list.erase( veh );
616  rebuild_vehicle_level_caches();
617  set_pathfinding_cache_dirty( z );
618  return result;
619  }
620  }
621  debugmsg( "detach_vehicle can't find it! name=%s, submap:%d,%d,%d", veh->name, veh->sm_pos.x,
622  veh->sm_pos.y, veh->sm_pos.z );
623  return std::unique_ptr<vehicle>();
624 }
625 
626 void map::destroy_vehicle( vehicle *veh )
627 {
628  detach_vehicle( veh );
629 }
630 
631 void map::on_vehicle_moved( const int smz )
632 {
633  set_outside_cache_dirty( smz );
634  set_transparency_cache_dirty( smz );
635  set_floor_cache_dirty( smz );
636  set_floor_cache_dirty( smz + 1 );
637  set_pathfinding_cache_dirty( smz );
638 }
639 
640 void map::vehmove()
641 {
642  // give vehicles movement points
643  VehicleList vehicle_list;
644  int minz = zlevels ? -OVERMAP_DEPTH : abs_sub.z();
645  int maxz = zlevels ? OVERMAP_HEIGHT : abs_sub.z();
646  const tripoint player_pos = get_player_character().pos();
647  for( int zlev = minz; zlev <= maxz; ++zlev ) {
648  level_cache *cache_lazy = get_cache_lazy( zlev );
649  if( !cache_lazy ) {
650  continue;
651  }
652  level_cache &cache = *cache_lazy;
653  for( vehicle *veh : cache.vehicle_list ) {
654  if( veh->is_following ) {
655  veh->drive_to_local_target( getabs( player_pos ), true );
656  } else if( veh->is_patrolling ) {
657  veh->autopilot_patrol();
658  }
659  veh->gain_moves();
660  veh->slow_leak();
661  wrapped_vehicle w;
662  w.v = veh;
663  vehicle_list.push_back( w );
664  }
665  }
666 
667  // 15 equals 3 >50mph vehicles, or up to 15 slow (1 square move) ones
668  // But 15 is too low for V12 death-bikes, let's put 100 here
669  for( int count = 0; count < 100; count++ ) {
670  if( !vehproceed( vehicle_list ) ) {
671  break;
672  }
673  }
674  // Process item removal on the vehicles that were modified this turn.
675  // Use a copy because part_removal_cleanup can modify the container.
676  auto temp = dirty_vehicle_list;
677  for( vehicle * const &elem : temp ) {
678  auto same_ptr = [ elem ]( const struct wrapped_vehicle & tgt ) {
679  return elem == tgt.v;
680  };
681  if( std::find_if( vehicle_list.begin(), vehicle_list.end(), same_ptr ) !=
682  vehicle_list.end() ) {
683  elem->part_removal_cleanup();
684  }
685  }
686  dirty_vehicle_list.clear();
687  std::map<vehicle *, bool> vehs; // value true means in on map
688  std::unordered_set<vehicle *> connected_vehs;
689  for( int zlev = minz; zlev <= maxz; ++zlev ) {
690  const level_cache *cache = get_cache_lazy( zlev );
691  if( !cache ) {
692  continue;
693  }
694  for( vehicle *veh : cache->vehicle_list ) {
695  vehs[veh] = true; // force on map vehicles to true
696  veh->get_connected_vehicles( connected_vehs );
697  }
698  }
699  for( vehicle *connected_veh : connected_vehs ) {
700  vehs.emplace( connected_veh, false ); // add with 'false' if does not exist (off map)
701  }
702  for( const std::pair<vehicle *const, bool> &veh_pair : vehs ) {
703  veh_pair.first->idle( /* on_map = */ veh_pair.second );
704  }
705 
706  // refresh vehicle zones for moved vehicles
707  zone_manager::get_manager().cache_vzones( this );
708 }
709 
710 bool map::vehproceed( VehicleList &vehicle_list )
711 {
712  wrapped_vehicle *cur_veh = nullptr;
713  float max_of_turn = 0.0f;
714  // First horizontal movement
715  for( wrapped_vehicle &vehs_v : vehicle_list ) {
716  if( vehs_v.v->of_turn > max_of_turn ) {
717  cur_veh = &vehs_v;
718  max_of_turn = cur_veh->v->of_turn;
719  }
720  }
721 
722  // Then vertical-only movement
723  if( cur_veh == nullptr ) {
724  for( wrapped_vehicle &vehs_v : vehicle_list ) {
725  if( vehs_v.v->is_falling || ( vehs_v.v->is_rotorcraft() && vehs_v.v->get_z_change() != 0 ) ) {
726  cur_veh = &vehs_v;
727  break;
728  }
729  }
730  }
731 
732  if( cur_veh == nullptr ) {
733  return false;
734  }
735 
736  cur_veh->v = cur_veh->v->act_on_map();
737  if( cur_veh->v == nullptr ) {
738  vehicle_list = get_vehicles();
739  }
740 
741  return true;
742 }
743 
744 static bool sees_veh( const Creature &c, vehicle &veh, bool force_recalc )
745 {
746  const auto &veh_points = veh.get_points( force_recalc );
747  return std::any_of( veh_points.begin(), veh_points.end(), [&c]( const tripoint & pt ) {
748  return c.sees( pt );
749  } );
750 }
751 
752 vehicle *map::move_vehicle( vehicle &veh, const tripoint &dp, const tileray &facing )
753 {
754  if( dp == tripoint_zero ) {
755  debugmsg( "Empty displacement vector" );
756  return &veh;
757  } else if( std::abs( dp.x ) > 1 || std::abs( dp.y ) > 1 || std::abs( dp.z ) > 1 ) {
758  debugmsg( "Invalid displacement vector: %d, %d, %d", dp.x, dp.y, dp.z );
759  return &veh;
760  }
761  // Split the movement into horizontal and vertical for easier processing
762  if( dp.xy() != point_zero && dp.z != 0 ) {
763  vehicle *const new_pointer = move_vehicle( veh, tripoint( dp.xy(), 0 ), facing );
764  if( !new_pointer ) {
765  return nullptr;
766  }
767 
768  vehicle *const result = move_vehicle( *new_pointer, tripoint( 0, 0, dp.z ), facing );
769  if( !result ) {
770  return nullptr;
771  }
772 
773  result->is_falling = false;
774  return result;
775  }
776  const bool vertical = dp.z != 0;
777  // Ensured by the splitting above
778  cata_assert( vertical == ( dp.xy() == point_zero ) );
779 
780  const int target_z = dp.z + veh.sm_pos.z;
781  // limit vehicles to at most OVERMAP_HEIGHT - 1; this mitigates getting to zlevel 10 easily
782  // and causing `get_cache_ref( zlev + 1 );` call in map::build_sunlight_cache overflowing
783  if( target_z < -OVERMAP_DEPTH || target_z > OVERMAP_HEIGHT - 1 ) {
784  return &veh;
785  }
786 
787  veh.precalc_mounts( 1, veh.skidding ? veh.turn_dir : facing.dir(), veh.pivot_point() );
788 
789  // cancel out any movement of the vehicle due only to a change in pivot
790  tripoint dp1 = dp - veh.pivot_displacement();
791 
792  int impulse = 0;
793 
794  std::vector<veh_collision> collisions;
795 
796  // Find collisions
797  // Velocity of car before collision
798  // Split into vertical and horizontal movement
799  const int &coll_velocity = vertical ? veh.vertical_velocity : veh.velocity;
800  const int velocity_before = coll_velocity;
801  if( velocity_before == 0 && !veh.is_rotorcraft() && !veh.is_flying_in_air() ) {
802  debugmsg( "%s tried to move %s with no velocity",
803  veh.name, vertical ? "vertically" : "horizontally" );
804  return &veh;
805  }
806 
807  bool veh_veh_coll_flag = false;
808  // Try to collide multiple times
809  size_t collision_attempts = 10;
810  do {
811  collisions.clear();
812  veh.collision( collisions, dp1, false );
813 
814  // Vehicle collisions
815  std::map<vehicle *, std::vector<veh_collision> > veh_collisions;
816  for( veh_collision &coll : collisions ) {
817  if( coll.type != veh_coll_veh ) {
818  continue;
819  }
820 
821  veh_veh_coll_flag = true;
822  // Only collide with each vehicle once
823  veh_collisions[ static_cast<vehicle *>( coll.target ) ].push_back( coll );
824  }
825 
826  for( auto &pair : veh_collisions ) {
827  impulse += vehicle_vehicle_collision( veh, *pair.first, pair.second );
828  }
829 
830  // Non-vehicle collisions
831  for( const veh_collision &coll : collisions ) {
832  if( coll.type == veh_coll_veh ) {
833  continue;
834  }
835  int part_num = veh.get_non_fake_part( coll.part );
836 
837  const point &collision_point = veh.part( coll.part ).mount;
838  const int coll_dmg = coll.imp;
839 
840  // Shock damage, if the target part is a rotor treat as an aimed hit.
841  // don't try to deal damage to invalid part (probably removed or destroyed)
842  if( part_num != -1 ) {
843  if( veh.part( part_num ).info().has_flag( VPFLAG_ROTOR ) ) {
844  veh.damage( *this, part_num, coll_dmg, damage_bash, true );
845  } else {
846  impulse += coll_dmg;
847  veh.damage( *this, part_num, coll_dmg, damage_bash );
848  veh.damage_all( coll_dmg / 2, coll_dmg, damage_bash, collision_point );
849  }
850  }
851  }
852 
853  // prevent vehicle bouncing after the first collision
854  if( vertical && velocity_before < 0 && coll_velocity > 0 ) {
855  veh.vertical_velocity = 0; // also affects `coll_velocity` and thus exits the loop
856  }
857 
858  } while( collision_attempts-- > 0 && coll_velocity != 0 &&
859  sgn( coll_velocity ) == sgn( velocity_before ) &&
860  !collisions.empty() && !veh_veh_coll_flag );
861 
862  const int velocity_after = coll_velocity;
863  bool can_move = velocity_after != 0 && sgn( velocity_after ) == sgn( velocity_before );
864  if( dp.z != 0 && veh.is_rotorcraft() ) {
865  can_move = true;
866  }
867  units::angle coll_turn = 0_degrees;
868  if( impulse > 0 ) {
869  coll_turn = shake_vehicle( veh, velocity_before, facing.dir() );
870  veh.stop_autodriving();
871  const int volume = std::min<int>( 100, std::sqrt( impulse ) );
872  // TODO: Center the sound at weighted (by impulse) average of collisions
873  sounds::sound( veh.global_pos3(), volume, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "crash!" ),
874  false, "smash_success", "hit_vehicle" );
875  }
876 
877  if( veh_veh_coll_flag ) {
878  // Break here to let the hit vehicle move away
879  return nullptr;
880  }
881 
882  // If not enough wheels, mess up the ground a bit.
883  if( !vertical && !veh.valid_wheel_config() && !( veh.is_watercraft() && veh.can_float() ) &&
884  !veh.is_flying_in_air() && dp.z == 0 ) {
885  veh.velocity -= std::clamp( veh.velocity, -2000, 2000 ); // extra drag
886  for( const tripoint &p : veh.get_points() ) {
887  const ter_id &pter = ter( p );
888  if( pter == ter_t_dirt || pter == ter_t_grass ) {
889  ter_set( p, ter_t_dirtmound );
890  }
891  }
892  }
893 
894  const units::angle last_turn_dec = 1_degrees;
895  if( veh.last_turn < 0_degrees ) {
896  veh.last_turn += last_turn_dec;
897  if( veh.last_turn > -last_turn_dec ) {
898  veh.last_turn = 0_degrees;
899  }
900  } else if( veh.last_turn > 0_degrees ) {
901  veh.last_turn -= last_turn_dec;
902  if( veh.last_turn < last_turn_dec ) {
903  veh.last_turn = 0_degrees;
904  }
905  }
906 
907  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
908  const bool seen = sees_veh( player_character, veh, false );
909 
910  if( can_move || ( vertical && veh.is_falling ) ) {
911  // Accept new direction
912  if( veh.skidding ) {
913  veh.face.init( veh.turn_dir );
914  } else {
915  veh.face = facing;
916  }
917 
918  veh.move = facing;
919  if( coll_turn != 0_degrees ) {
920  veh.skidding = true;
921  veh.turn( coll_turn );
922  }
923  veh.on_move();
924  // Actually change position
925  displace_vehicle( veh, dp1 );
926  level_vehicle( veh );
927  } else if( !vertical ) {
928  veh.stop();
929  }
930  veh.check_falling_or_floating();
931  // If the PC is in the currently moved vehicle, adjust the
932  // view offset.
933  if( player_character.controlling_vehicle &&
934  veh_pointer_or_null( veh_at( player_character.pos() ) ) == &veh ) {
935  g->calc_driving_offset( &veh );
936  if( veh.skidding && can_move ) {
937  // TODO: Make skid recovery in air hard
938  veh.possibly_recover_from_skid();
939  }
940  }
941  // Now we're gonna handle traps we're standing on (if we're still moving).
942  if( !vertical && can_move ) {
943  const auto wheel_indices = veh.wheelcache; // Don't use a reference here, it causes a crash.
944 
945  // Values to deal with crushing items.
946  // The math needs to be floating-point to work, so the values might as well be.
947  const float vehicle_grounded_wheel_area = static_cast<int>( vehicle_wheel_traction( veh, true ) );
948  const float weight_to_damage_factor = 0.05f; // Nobody likes a magic number.
949  const float vehicle_mass_kg = to_kilogram( veh.total_mass() );
950 
951  for( const int vp_wheel_idx : wheel_indices ) {
952  vehicle_part &vp_wheel = veh.part( vp_wheel_idx );
953  const vpart_info &vpi_wheel = vp_wheel.info();
954  const tripoint wheel_p = veh.global_part_pos3( vp_wheel );
955  if( one_in( 2 ) && displace_water( wheel_p ) ) {
956  sounds::sound( wheel_p, 4, sounds::sound_t::movement, _( "splash!" ), false,
957  "environment", "splash" );
958  }
959 
960  veh.handle_trap( wheel_p, vp_wheel );
961  // dont use vp_wheel or vp_wheel_idx below this - handle_trap might've removed it from parts
962 
963  if( !has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SEALED, wheel_p ) ) {
964  // Damage is calculated based on the weight of the vehicle,
965  // The area of it's wheels, and the area of the wheel running over the items.
966  // This number is multiplied by weight_to_damage_factor to get reasonable results, damage-wise.
967  const int wheel_damage = vpi_wheel.wheel_info->contact_area / vehicle_grounded_wheel_area *
968  vehicle_mass_kg * weight_to_damage_factor;
969 
970  //~ %1$s: vehicle name
971  smash_items( wheel_p, wheel_damage, string_format( _( "weight of %1$s" ), veh.disp_name() ) );
972  }
973  }
974  }
975  if( veh.is_towing() ) {
976  veh.do_towing_move();
977  // veh.do_towing_move() may cancel towing, so we need to recheck is_towing here
978  if( veh.is_towing() && veh.tow_data.get_towed()->tow_cable_too_far() ) {
979  add_msg( m_info, _( "A towing cable snaps off of %s." ),
980  veh.tow_data.get_towed()->disp_name() );
981  veh.tow_data.get_towed()->invalidate_towing( true );
982  }
983  }
984  // Redraw scene, but only if the player is not engaged in an activity and
985  // the vehicle was seen before or after the move.
986  if( !player_character.activity && ( seen || sees_veh( player_character, veh, true ) ) ) {
987  g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
988  ui_manager::redraw_invalidated();
989  handle_key_blocking_activity();
990  }
991  return &veh;
992 }
993 
994 float map::vehicle_vehicle_collision( vehicle &veh, vehicle &veh2,
995  const std::vector<veh_collision> &collisions )
996 {
997  if( &veh == &veh2 ) {
998  debugmsg( "Vehicle %s collided with itself", veh.name );
999  return 0.0f;
1000  }
1001 
1002  // Effects of colliding with another vehicle:
1003  // transfers of momentum, skidding,
1004  // parts are damaged/broken on both sides,
1005  // remaining times are normalized
1006  const veh_collision &c = collisions[0];
1007  const bool vertical = veh.sm_pos.z != veh2.sm_pos.z;
1008 
1009  if( c.part < 0 || c.part >= static_cast<int>( veh.part_count() ) ) {
1010  debugmsg( "invalid c.part %d", c.part );
1011  return 0.0f;
1012  }
1013 
1014  if( c.target_part < 0 || c.target_part >= static_cast<int>( veh2.part_count() ) ) {
1015  debugmsg( "invalid c.target_part %d", c.target_part );
1016  return 0.0f;
1017  }
1018  vehicle_part &vp1 = veh.part( c.part );
1019  vehicle_part &vp2 = veh2.part( c.target_part );
1020 
1021  // Check whether avatar sees the collision, and log a message if so
1022  const avatar &you = get_avatar();
1023  const tripoint part1_pos = veh.global_part_pos3( vp1 );
1024  const tripoint part2_pos = veh2.global_part_pos3( vp2 );
1025  if( you.sees( part1_pos ) || you.sees( part2_pos ) ) {
1026  //~ %1$s: first vehicle name (without "the")
1027  //~ %2$s: first part name
1028  //~ %3$s: second vehicle display name (with "the")
1029  //~ %4$s: second part name
1030  add_msg( m_bad, _( "The %1$s's %2$s collides with %3$s's %4$s." ),
1031  veh.name, vp1.info().name(),
1032  veh2.disp_name(), vp2.info().name() );
1033  }
1034 
1035  // Used to calculate the epicenter of the collision.
1036  point epicenter1;
1037  point epicenter2;
1038 
1039  float dmg;
1040  // Vertical collisions will be simpler for a while (1D)
1041  if( !vertical ) {
1042  // For reference, a cargo truck weighs ~25300, a bicycle 690,
1043  // and 38mph is 3800 'velocity'
1044  rl_vec2d velo_veh1 = veh.velo_vec();
1045  rl_vec2d velo_veh2 = veh2.velo_vec();
1046  const float m1 = to_kilogram( veh.total_mass() );
1047  const float m2 = to_kilogram( veh2.total_mass() );
1048  //Energy of vehicle1 and vehicle2 before collision
1049  float E = 0.5 * m1 * velo_veh1.magnitude() * velo_veh1.magnitude() +
1050  0.5 * m2 * velo_veh2.magnitude() * velo_veh2.magnitude();
1051 
1052  // Collision_axis
1053  point cof1 = veh .rotated_center_of_mass();
1054  point cof2 = veh2.rotated_center_of_mass();
1055  int &x_cof1 = cof1.x;
1056  int &y_cof1 = cof1.y;
1057  int &x_cof2 = cof2.x;
1058  int &y_cof2 = cof2.y;
1059  rl_vec2d collision_axis_y;
1060 
1061  collision_axis_y.x = ( veh.global_pos3().x + x_cof1 ) - ( veh2.global_pos3().x + x_cof2 );
1062  collision_axis_y.y = ( veh.global_pos3().y + y_cof1 ) - ( veh2.global_pos3().y + y_cof2 );
1063  collision_axis_y = collision_axis_y.normalized();
1064  rl_vec2d collision_axis_x = collision_axis_y.rotated( M_PI / 2 );
1065  // imp? & delta? & final? reworked:
1066  // newvel1 =( vel1 * ( mass1 - mass2 ) + ( 2 * mass2 * vel2 ) ) / ( mass1 + mass2 )
1067  // as per http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elastic_collision
1068  //velocity of veh1 before collision in the direction of collision_axis_y
1069  float vel1_y = collision_axis_y.dot_product( velo_veh1 );
1070  float vel1_x = collision_axis_x.dot_product( velo_veh1 );
1071  //velocity of veh2 before collision in the direction of collision_axis_y
1072  float vel2_y = collision_axis_y.dot_product( velo_veh2 );
1073  float vel2_x = collision_axis_x.dot_product( velo_veh2 );
1074  // e = 0 -> inelastic collision
1075  // e = 1 -> elastic collision
1076  float e = get_collision_factor( vel1_y / 100 - vel2_y / 100 );
1077 
1078  // Velocity after collision
1079  // vel1_x_a = vel1_x, because in x-direction we have no transmission of force
1080  float vel1_x_a = vel1_x;
1081  float vel2_x_a = vel2_x;
1082  // Transmission of force only in direction of collision_axix_y
1083  // Equation: partially elastic collision
1084  float vel1_y_a = ( m2 * vel2_y * ( 1 + e ) + vel1_y * ( m1 - m2 * e ) ) / ( m1 + m2 );
1085  float vel2_y_a = ( m1 * vel1_y * ( 1 + e ) + vel2_y * ( m2 - m1 * e ) ) / ( m1 + m2 );
1086  // Add both components; Note: collision_axis is normalized
1087  rl_vec2d final1 = collision_axis_y * vel1_y_a + collision_axis_x * vel1_x_a;
1088  rl_vec2d final2 = collision_axis_y * vel2_y_a + collision_axis_x * vel2_x_a;
1089 
1090  veh.move.init( final1.as_point() );
1091  if( final1.dot_product( veh.face_vec() ) < 0 ) {
1092  // Car is being pushed backwards. Make it move backwards
1093  veh.velocity = -final1.magnitude();
1094  } else {
1095  veh.velocity = final1.magnitude();
1096  }
1097 
1098  veh2.move.init( final2.as_point() );
1099  if( final2.dot_product( veh2.face_vec() ) < 0 ) {
1100  // Car is being pushed backwards. Make it move backwards
1101  veh2.velocity = -final2.magnitude();
1102  } else {
1103  veh2.velocity = final2.magnitude();
1104  }
1105 
1106  //give veh2 the initiative to proceed next before veh1
1107  float avg_of_turn = ( veh2.of_turn + veh.of_turn ) / 2.0f;
1108  if( avg_of_turn < 0.1f ) {
1109  avg_of_turn = 0.1f;
1110  }
1111 
1112  veh.of_turn = avg_of_turn * 0.9f;
1113  veh2.of_turn = avg_of_turn * 1.1f;
1114 
1115  //Energy after collision
1116  float E_a = 0.5 * m1 * final1.magnitude() * final1.magnitude() +
1117  0.5 * m2 * final2.magnitude() * final2.magnitude();
1118  float d_E = E - E_a; //Lost energy at collision -> deformation energy
1119  dmg = std::abs( d_E / 1000 / 2000 ); //adjust to balance damage
1120  } else {
1121  const float m1 = to_kilogram( veh.total_mass() );
1122  // Collision is perfectly inelastic for simplicity
1123  // Assume veh2 is standing still
1124  dmg = std::abs( veh.vertical_velocity / 100 ) * m1 / 10;
1125  veh.vertical_velocity = 0;
1126  }
1127 
1128  float dmg_veh1 = dmg * 0.5f;
1129  float dmg_veh2 = dmg * 0.5f;
1130 
1131  int coll_parts_cnt = 0; //quantity of colliding parts between veh1 and veh2
1132  for( const veh_collision &veh_veh_coll : collisions ) {
1133  if( &veh2 == static_cast<vehicle *>( veh_veh_coll.target ) ) {
1134  coll_parts_cnt++;
1135  }
1136  }
1137 
1138  // Prevent potential division by zero
1139  if( coll_parts_cnt == 0 ) {
1140  debugmsg( "Vehicle %s collided with bugs in the code", veh.name );
1141  return 0.0f;
1142  }
1143 
1144  const float dmg1_part = dmg_veh1 / coll_parts_cnt;
1145  const float dmg2_part = dmg_veh2 / coll_parts_cnt;
1146 
1147  //damage colliding parts (only veh1 and veh2 parts)
1148  for( const veh_collision &veh_veh_coll : collisions ) {
1149  if( &veh2 != static_cast<vehicle *>( veh_veh_coll.target ) ) {
1150  continue;
1151  }
1152  int coll_part = veh.get_non_fake_part( veh_veh_coll.part );
1153  int target_part = veh2.get_non_fake_part( veh_veh_coll.target_part );
1154 
1155  int coll_parm = veh.part_with_feature( coll_part, VPFLAG_ARMOR, true );
1156  if( coll_parm < 0 ) {
1157  coll_parm = coll_part;
1158  }
1159  int target_parm = veh2.part_with_feature( target_part, VPFLAG_ARMOR, true );
1160  if( target_parm < 0 ) {
1161  target_parm = target_part;
1162  }
1163 
1164  epicenter1 += veh.part( coll_parm ).mount;
1165  veh.damage( *this, coll_parm, dmg1_part, damage_bash );
1166 
1167  epicenter2 += veh2.part( target_parm ).mount;
1168  veh2.damage( *this, target_parm, dmg2_part, damage_bash );
1169  }
1170 
1171  epicenter2.x /= coll_parts_cnt;
1172  epicenter2.y /= coll_parts_cnt;
1173 
1174  if( dmg2_part > 100 ) {
1175  // Shake vehicle because of collision
1176  veh2.damage_all( dmg2_part / 2, dmg2_part, damage_bash, epicenter2 );
1177  }
1178 
1179  if( dmg_veh1 > 800 ) {
1180  veh.skidding = true;
1181  }
1182 
1183  if( dmg_veh2 > 800 ) {
1184  veh2.skidding = true;
1185  }
1186 
1187  // Return the impulse of the collision
1188  return dmg_veh1;
1189 }
1190 
1191 bool map::check_vehicle_zones( const int zlev )
1192 {
1193  for( vehicle *veh : get_cache( zlev ).zone_vehicles ) {
1194  if( veh->zones_dirty ) {
1195  return true;
1196  }
1197  }
1198  return false;
1199 }
1200 
1201 std::vector<zone_data *> map::get_vehicle_zones( const int zlev )
1202 {
1203  std::vector<zone_data *> veh_zones;
1204  bool rebuild = false;
1205  for( vehicle *veh : get_cache( zlev ).zone_vehicles ) {
1206  if( veh->refresh_zones() ) {
1207  rebuild = true;
1208  }
1209  for( auto &zone : veh->loot_zones ) {
1210  veh_zones.emplace_back( &zone.second );
1211  }
1212  }
1213  if( rebuild ) {
1214  zone_manager::get_manager().cache_vzones();
1215  }
1216  return veh_zones;
1217 }
1218 
1219 void map::register_vehicle_zone( vehicle *veh, const int zlev )
1220 {
1221  level_cache &ch = get_cache( zlev );
1222  ch.zone_vehicles.insert( veh );
1223 }
1224 
1225 bool map::deregister_vehicle_zone( zone_data &zone ) const
1226 {
1227  const tripoint pos = getlocal( zone.get_start_point() );
1228  if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> vp = veh_at( pos ).cargo() ) {
1229  vehicle &veh = vp->vehicle();
1230  auto bounds = veh.loot_zones.equal_range( vp->mount() );
1231  for( auto it = bounds.first; it != bounds.second; it++ ) {
1232  if( &zone == &( it->second ) ) {
1233  veh.loot_zones.erase( it );
1234  return true;
1235  }
1236  }
1237  }
1238  return false;
1239 }
1240 
1241 std::set<tripoint_bub_ms> map::get_moving_vehicle_targets( const Creature &z, int max_range )
1242 {
1243  const tripoint_bub_ms zpos( z.pos() );
1244  std::set<tripoint_bub_ms> priority;
1245  std::set<tripoint_bub_ms> visible;
1246  for( wrapped_vehicle &v : get_vehicles() ) {
1247  if( !v.v->is_moving() ) {
1248  continue;
1249  }
1250  if( std::abs( v.pos.z - zpos.z() ) > fov_3d_z_range ) {
1251  continue;
1252  }
1253  if( rl_dist( zpos, tripoint_bub_ms( v.pos ) ) > max_range + 40 ) {
1254  continue; // coarse distance filter, 40 = ~24 * sqrt(2) - rough max diameter of a vehicle
1255  }
1256  for( const vpart_reference &vpr : v.v->get_all_parts() ) {
1257  const tripoint_bub_ms vppos = static_cast<tripoint_bub_ms>( vpr.pos() );
1258  if( rl_dist( zpos, vppos ) > max_range ) {
1259  continue;
1260  }
1261  if( !z.sees( vppos ) ) {
1262  continue;
1263  }
1264  if( vpr.has_feature( VPFLAG_CONTROLS ) ||
1265  vpr.has_feature( VPFLAG_ENGINE ) ||
1266  vpr.has_feature( VPFLAG_WHEEL ) ) {
1267  priority.emplace( vppos );
1268  } else {
1269  visible.emplace( vppos );
1270  }
1271  }
1272  }
1273  return !priority.empty() ? priority : visible;
1274 }
1275 
1276 // 3D vehicle functions
1277 
1278 VehicleList map::get_vehicles( const tripoint &start, const tripoint &end )
1279 {
1280  const int chunk_sx = std::max( 0, ( start.x / SEEX ) - 1 );
1281  const int chunk_ex = std::min( my_MAPSIZE - 1, ( end.x / SEEX ) + 1 );
1282  const int chunk_sy = std::max( 0, ( start.y / SEEY ) - 1 );
1283  const int chunk_ey = std::min( my_MAPSIZE - 1, ( end.y / SEEY ) + 1 );
1284  const int chunk_sz = start.z;
1285  const int chunk_ez = end.z;
1286  VehicleList vehs;
1287 
1288  for( int cx = chunk_sx; cx <= chunk_ex; ++cx ) {
1289  for( int cy = chunk_sy; cy <= chunk_ey; ++cy ) {
1290  for( int cz = chunk_sz; cz <= chunk_ez; ++cz ) {
1291  submap *current_submap = get_submap_at_grid( { cx, cy, cz } );
1292  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
1293  debugmsg( "Tried to process vehicle at (%d,%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", cx, cy, cz );
1294  continue;
1295  }
1296  for( const auto &elem : current_submap->vehicles ) {
1297  // Ensure the vehicle z-position is correct
1298  elem->sm_pos.z = cz;
1299  wrapped_vehicle w;
1300  w.v = elem.get();
1301  w.pos = w.v->global_pos3();
1302  vehs.push_back( w );
1303  }
1304  }
1305  }
1306  }
1307 
1308  return vehs;
1309 }
1310 
1311 optional_vpart_position map::veh_at( const tripoint_abs_ms &p ) const
1312 {
1313  return veh_at( getlocal( p ) );
1314 }
1315 
1316 optional_vpart_position map::veh_at( const tripoint &p ) const
1317 {
1318  if( !inbounds( p ) || !const_cast<map *>( this )->get_cache( p.z ).get_veh_in_active_range() ) {
1319  return optional_vpart_position( std::nullopt );
1320  }
1321 
1322  int part_num = 1;
1323  vehicle *const veh = const_cast<map *>( this )->veh_at_internal( p, part_num );
1324  if( !veh ) {
1325  return optional_vpart_position( std::nullopt );
1326  }
1327  return optional_vpart_position( vpart_position( *veh, part_num ) );
1328 
1329 }
1330 
1331 optional_vpart_position map::veh_at( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
1332 {
1333  return veh_at( p.raw() );
1334 }
1335 
1336 const vehicle *map::veh_at_internal( const tripoint &p, int &part_num ) const
1337 {
1338  // This function is called A LOT. Move as much out of here as possible.
1339  const level_cache &ch = get_cache( p.z );
1340  if( !ch.get_veh_in_active_range() || !ch.get_veh_exists_at( p ) ) {
1341  part_num = -1;
1342  return nullptr; // Clear cache indicates no vehicle. This should optimize a great deal.
1343  }
1344 
1345  std::pair<vehicle *, int> ret = ch.get_veh_cached_parts( p );
1346  if( ret.first ) {
1347  part_num = ret.second;
1348  return ret.first;
1349  }
1350 
1351  debugmsg( "vehicle part cache indicated vehicle not found: %d %d %d", p.x, p.y, p.z );
1352  part_num = -1;
1353  return nullptr;
1354 }
1355 
1356 vehicle *map::veh_at_internal( const tripoint &p, int &part_num )
1357 {
1358  return const_cast<vehicle *>( const_cast<const map *>( this )->veh_at_internal( p, part_num ) );
1359 }
1360 
1361 void map::board_vehicle( const tripoint &pos, Character *p )
1362 {
1363  if( p == nullptr ) {
1364  debugmsg( "map::board_vehicle: null player" );
1365  return;
1366  }
1367 
1368  const std::optional<vpart_reference> vp = veh_at( pos ).part_with_feature( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE,
1369  true );
1370  if( !vp ) {
1371  avatar *player_character = p->as_avatar();
1372  if( player_character != nullptr &&
1373  player_character->grab_point.x == 0 && player_character->grab_point.y == 0 ) {
1374  debugmsg( "map::board_vehicle: vehicle with unbroken and BOARDABLE part not found" );
1375  }
1376  return;
1377  }
1378  if( vp->part().has_flag( vp_flag::passenger_flag ) ) {
1379  Character *psg = vp->vehicle().get_passenger( vp->part_index() );
1380  debugmsg( "map::board_vehicle: passenger (%s) is already there",
1381  psg ? psg->get_name() : "<null>" );
1382  unboard_vehicle( pos );
1383  }
1384  vp->part().set_flag( vp_flag::passenger_flag );
1385  vp->part().passenger_id = p->getID();
1386  vp->vehicle().invalidate_mass();
1387 
1388  p->setpos( pos );
1389  p->in_vehicle = true;
1390  if( p->is_avatar() ) {
1391  g->update_map( *p->as_avatar() );
1392  }
1393 }
1394 
1395 void map::unboard_vehicle( const vpart_reference &vp, Character *passenger, bool dead_passenger )
1396 {
1397  // Mark the part as un-occupied regardless of whether there's a live passenger here.
1398  vp.part().remove_flag( vp_flag::passenger_flag );
1399  vp.vehicle().invalidate_mass();
1400 
1401  if( !passenger ) {
1402  if( !dead_passenger ) {
1403  debugmsg( "map::unboard_vehicle: passenger not found" );
1404  }
1405  return;
1406  }
1407  passenger->in_vehicle = false;
1408  if( passenger->controlling_vehicle ) {
1409  // If the driver left, stop autodriving.
1410  vp.vehicle().stop_autodriving( false );
1411  // Only make vehicle go out of control if the driver is the one unboarding.
1412  vp.vehicle().skidding = true;
1413  }
1414  passenger->controlling_vehicle = false;
1415 }
1416 
1417 void map::unboard_vehicle( const tripoint &p, bool dead_passenger )
1418 {
1419  const std::optional<vpart_reference> vp = veh_at( p ).part_with_feature( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE, false );
1420  Character *passenger = nullptr;
1421  if( !vp ) {
1422  debugmsg( "map::unboard_vehicle: vehicle not found" );
1423  // Try and force unboard the player anyway.
1424  passenger = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<Character>( p );
1425  if( passenger ) {
1426  passenger->in_vehicle = false;
1427  passenger->controlling_vehicle = false;
1428  }
1429  return;
1430  }
1431  passenger = vp->get_passenger();
1432  unboard_vehicle( *vp, passenger, dead_passenger );
1433 }
1434 
1435 bool map::displace_vehicle( vehicle &veh, const tripoint &dp, const bool adjust_pos,
1436  const std::set<int> &parts_to_move )
1437 {
1438  const tripoint_bub_ms src = veh.pos_bub();
1439  // handle vehicle ramps
1440  int ramp_offset = 0;
1441  if( adjust_pos ) {
1442  if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_UP, src + dp ) ) {
1443  ramp_offset += 1;
1444  veh.is_on_ramp = true;
1445  } else if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_DOWN, src + dp ) ) {
1446  ramp_offset -= 1;
1447  veh.is_on_ramp = true;
1448  }
1449  }
1450 
1451  const tripoint_bub_ms dst =
1452  src + ( adjust_pos ? ( dp + tripoint( 0, 0, ramp_offset ) ) : tripoint_zero );
1453 
1454  if( !inbounds( src ) ) {
1455  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MAP,
1456  "map::displace_vehicle: coordinates out of bounds %d,%d,%d->%d,%d,%d",
1457  src.x(), src.y(), src.z(), dst.x(), dst.y(), dst.z() );
1458  return false;
1459  }
1460 
1461  point src_offset;
1462  point dst_offset;
1463  submap *src_submap = get_submap_at( src.raw(), src_offset );
1464  submap *const dst_submap = get_submap_at( dst.raw(), dst_offset );
1465  if( src_submap == nullptr || dst_submap == nullptr ) {
1466  debugmsg( "Tried to displace vehicle at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", src_offset.x,
1467  src_offset.y );
1468  return true;
1469  }
1470  std::set<int> smzs;
1471 
1472  // first, let's find our position in current vehicles vector
1473  size_t our_i = 0;
1474  bool found = false;
1475  for( submap *&smap : grid ) {
1476  for( size_t i = 0; i < smap->vehicles.size(); i++ ) {
1477  if( smap->vehicles[i].get() == &veh ) {
1478  our_i = i;
1479  src_submap = smap;
1480  found = true;
1481  break;
1482  }
1483  }
1484  if( found ) {
1485  break;
1486  }
1487  }
1488 
1489  if( !found ) {
1490  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MAP, "displace_vehicle [%s] failed", veh.name );
1491  return false;
1492  }
1493 
1494  // move the vehicle
1495  // don't let it go off grid
1496  if( !inbounds( dst ) ) {
1497  veh.stop();
1498  // Silent debug
1499  dbg( D_ERROR ) << "map:displace_vehicle: Stopping vehicle, displaced dp=("
1500  << dp.x << ", " << dp.y << ", " << dp.z << ")";
1501  return true;
1502  }
1503 
1504  memory_clear_vehicle_points( veh );
1505 
1506  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1507  // Need old coordinates to check for remote control
1508  const bool remote = veh.remote_controlled( player_character );
1509 
1510  // record every passenger and pet inside
1511  std::vector<rider_data> riders = veh.get_riders();
1512 
1513  bool need_update = false;
1514  int z_change = 0;
1515  // Move passengers and pets
1516  bool complete = false;
1517  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
1518  // loop until everyone has moved or for each passenger
1519  for( size_t i = 0; !complete && i < riders.size(); i++ ) {
1520  complete = true;
1521  for( rider_data &r : riders ) {
1522  if( r.moved ) {
1523  continue;
1524  }
1525  const int prt = r.prt;
1526  if( !parts_to_move.empty() && parts_to_move.find( prt ) == parts_to_move.end() ) {
1527  r.moved = true;
1528  continue;
1529  }
1530  Creature *psg = r.psg;
1531  const tripoint part_pos = veh.global_part_pos3( prt );
1532  if( psg == nullptr ) {
1533  debugmsg( "Empty passenger for part #%d at %d,%d,%d player at %d,%d,%d?",
1534  prt, part_pos.x, part_pos.y, part_pos.z,
1535  player_character.posx(), player_character.posy(), player_character.posz() );
1536  veh.part( prt ).remove_flag( vp_flag::passenger_flag );
1537  r.moved = true;
1538  continue;
1539  }
1540 
1541  if( psg->pos() != part_pos ) {
1542  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MAP, "Part/passenger position mismatch: part #%d at %d,%d,%d "
1543  "passenger at %d,%d,%d", prt, part_pos.x, part_pos.y, part_pos.z,
1544  psg->posx(), psg->posy(), psg->posz() );
1545  }
1546  const vehicle_part &veh_part = veh.part( prt );
1547 
1548  // ramps make everything super tricky
1549  int psg_offset_z = -ramp_offset;
1550  tripoint next_pos; // defaults to 0,0,0
1551  if( parts_to_move.empty() ) {
1552  next_pos = veh_part.precalc[1];
1553  }
1554  if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_UP, src + dp + next_pos ) ) {
1555  psg_offset_z += 1;
1556  } else if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_DOWN, src + dp + next_pos ) ) {
1557  psg_offset_z -= 1;
1558  }
1559 
1560  // Place passenger on the new part location
1561  tripoint_bub_ms psgp( dst + next_pos + tripoint( 0, 0, psg_offset_z ) );
1562  // someone is in the way so try again
1563  if( creatures.creature_at( psgp ) ) {
1564  complete = false;
1565  continue;
1566  }
1567  if( psg->is_avatar() ) {
1568  // If passenger is you, we need to update the map
1569  need_update = true;
1570  z_change = psgp.z() - part_pos.z;
1571  }
1572 
1573  psg->setpos( psgp.raw() );
1574  r.moved = true;
1575  }
1576  }
1577 
1578  veh.shed_loose_parts( trinary::SOME, &dst );
1579  smzs = veh.advance_precalc_mounts( dst_offset, src.raw(), dp, ramp_offset,
1580  adjust_pos, parts_to_move );
1581  veh.update_active_fakes();
1582 
1583  if( src_submap != dst_submap ) {
1584  dst_submap->ensure_nonuniform();
1585  veh.set_submap_moved( tripoint( dst.x() / SEEX, dst.y() / SEEY, dst.z() ) );
1586  auto src_submap_veh_it = src_submap->vehicles.begin() + our_i;
1587  dst_submap->vehicles.push_back( std::move( *src_submap_veh_it ) );
1588  src_submap->vehicles.erase( src_submap_veh_it );
1589  invalidate_max_populated_zlev( dst.z() );
1590  }
1591  if( need_update ) {
1592  g->update_map( player_character );
1593  }
1594  add_vehicle_to_cache( &veh );
1595 
1596  if( z_change || src.z() != dst.z() ) {
1597  if( z_change ) {
1598  g->vertical_move( z_change, true );
1599  // vertical moves can flush the caches, so make sure we're still in the cache
1600  add_vehicle_to_cache( &veh );
1601  }
1602  update_vehicle_list( dst_submap, dst.z() );
1603  // delete the vehicle from the source z-level vehicle cache set if it is no longer on
1604  // that z-level
1605  if( src.z() != dst.z() ) {
1606  level_cache &ch2 = get_cache( src.z() );
1607  for( const vehicle *elem : ch2.vehicle_list ) {
1608  if( elem == &veh ) {
1609  ch2.vehicle_list.erase( &veh );
1610  ch2.zone_vehicles.erase( &veh );
1611  break;
1612  }
1613  }
1614  }
1615  veh.check_is_heli_landed();
1616  }
1617 
1618  if( remote ) {
1619  // Has to be after update_map or coordinates won't be valid
1620  g->setremoteveh( &veh );
1621  }
1622 
1623  veh.zones_dirty = true; // invalidate zone positions
1624 
1625  for( int vsmz : smzs ) {
1626  on_vehicle_moved( dst.z() + vsmz );
1627  }
1628  return true;
1629 }
1630 
1631 void map::level_vehicle( vehicle &veh )
1632 {
1633  int cnt = 0;
1634  while( !veh.level_vehicle() && cnt < ( 2 * OVERMAP_DEPTH ) ) {
1635  cnt++;
1636  }
1637 }
1638 
1639 bool map::displace_water( const tripoint &p )
1640 {
1641  // Check for shallow water
1642  if( has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SHALLOW_WATER, p ) ) {
1643  int dis_places = 0;
1644  int sel_place = 0;
1645  for( int pass = 0; pass < 2; pass++ ) {
1646  // we do 2 passes.
1647  // first, count how many non-water places around
1648  // then choose one within count and fill it with water on second pass
1649  if( pass != 0 ) {
1650  sel_place = rng( 0, dis_places - 1 );
1651  dis_places = 0;
1652  }
1653  for( const tripoint &temp : points_in_radius( p, 1 ) ) {
1654  if( temp != p
1655  || impassable_ter_furn( temp )
1656  || has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, temp ) ) {
1657  continue;
1658  }
1659  if( has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SHALLOW_WATER, p ) ||
1660  has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, p ) ) {
1661  continue;
1662  }
1663  if( pass != 0 && dis_places == sel_place ) {
1664  ter_set( temp, ter_t_water_sh );
1665  ter_set( temp, ter_t_dirt );
1666  return true;
1667  }
1668 
1669  dis_places++;
1670  }
1671  }
1672  }
1673  return false;
1674 }
1675 
1676 // End of 3D vehicle
1677 
1678 void map::set( const tripoint &p, const ter_id &new_terrain, const furn_id &new_furniture )
1679 {
1680  furn_set( p, new_furniture );
1681  ter_set( p, new_terrain );
1682 }
1683 
1684 std::string map::name( const tripoint &p )
1685 {
1686  return has_furn( p ) ? furnname( p ) : tername( p );
1687 }
1688 
1689 std::string map::name( const tripoint_bub_ms &p )
1690 {
1691  return name( p.raw() );
1692 }
1693 
1694 std::string map::disp_name( const tripoint &p )
1695 {
1696  return string_format( _( "the %s" ), name( p ) );
1697 }
1698 
1699 std::string map::obstacle_name( const tripoint &p )
1700 {
1701  if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> vp = veh_at( p ).obstacle_at_part() ) {
1702  return vp->info().name();
1703  }
1704  return name( p );
1705 }
1706 
1707 std::string map::obstacle_name( const tripoint_bub_ms &p )
1708 {
1709  return obstacle_name( p.raw() );
1710 }
1711 
1712 bool map::has_furn( const tripoint &p ) const
1713 {
1714  return furn( p ) != furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
1715 }
1716 
1717 bool map::has_furn( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
1718 {
1719  return has_furn( p.raw() );
1720 }
1721 
1722 furn_id map::furn( const tripoint &p ) const
1723 {
1724  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
1725  return furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
1726  }
1727 
1728  point l;
1729  const submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
1730  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
1731  debugmsg( "Tried process furniture at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
1732  return furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
1733  }
1734 
1735  return current_submap->get_furn( l );
1736 }
1737 
1738 furn_id map::furn( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
1739 {
1740  return furn( p.raw() );
1741 }
1742 
1743 bool map::furn_set( const tripoint &p, const furn_id &new_furniture, const bool furn_reset,
1744  bool avoid_creatures )
1745 {
1746  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
1747  debugmsg( "map::furn_set %s out of bounds", p.to_string() );
1748  return false;
1749  }
1750  if( avoid_creatures ) {
1751  Creature *c = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( tripoint_abs_ms( getabs( p ) ), true );
1752  if( c ) {
1753  return false;
1754  }
1755  }
1756  point l;
1757  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
1758  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
1759  debugmsg( "Tried to set furniture at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
1760  return false;
1761  }
1762  const furn_id new_target_furniture = new_furniture == furn_f_clear ? furn_str_id::NULL_ID() :
1763  new_furniture;
1764  const furn_id old_id = current_submap->get_furn( l );
1765  if( old_id == new_target_furniture ) {
1766  // Nothing changed
1767  return true;
1768  }
1769 
1770  current_submap->set_furn( l, new_target_furniture );
1771  current_submap->set_map_damage( point_sm_ms( l ), 0 );
1772 
1773  // Set the dirty flags
1774  const furn_t &old_f = old_id.obj();
1775  const furn_t &new_f = new_target_furniture.obj();
1776 
1777  bool result = true;
1778 
1779  if( current_submap->is_open_air( l ) &&
1780  !new_f.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_ALLOW_ON_OPEN_AIR ) &&
1781  !new_f.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FLOATS_IN_AIR ) &&
1782  new_target_furniture != furn_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
1783  const ter_id current_ter = current_submap->get_ter( l );
1784  debugmsg( "Setting furniture %s at %s where terrain is %s (which is_open_air)\n"
1785  "If this is intentional, set the ALLOW_ON_OPEN_AIR flag on the furniture",
1786  new_target_furniture.id().str(), p.to_string(), current_ter.id().str() );
1787  result = false;
1788  }
1789 
1790  if( new_f.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLANT ) ) {
1791  if( current_submap->get_ter( l ) == ter_t_dirtmound ) {
1792  ter_set( p, ter_t_dirt );
1793  }
1794  }
1795 
1796  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
1797  // If player has grabbed this furniture and it's no longer grabbable, release the grab.
1798  if( player_character.get_grab_type() == object_type::FURNITURE &&
1799  !furn_reset &&
1800  player_character.pos() + player_character.grab_point == p && !new_f.is_movable() ) {
1801  add_msg( _( "The %s you were grabbing is destroyed!" ), old_f.name() );
1802  player_character.grab( object_type::NONE );
1803  }
1804  // If a creature was crushed under a rubble -> free it
1805  if( old_id == furn_f_rubble && new_target_furniture == furn_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
1806  Creature *c = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( p );
1807  if( c ) {
1808  c->remove_effect( effect_crushed );
1809  }
1810  }
1811  if( !new_f.emissions.empty() ) {
1812  field_furn_locs.push_back( p );
1813  }
1814  if( old_f.transparent != new_f.transparent ) {
1815  set_transparency_cache_dirty( p );
1816  set_seen_cache_dirty( p );
1817  }
1818 
1819  if( old_f.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_INDOORS ) != new_f.has_flag(
1820  ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_INDOORS ) ) {
1821  set_outside_cache_dirty( p.z );
1822  }
1823 
1824  if( old_f.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_FLOOR ) != new_f.has_flag(
1825  ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_FLOOR ) ) {
1826  set_floor_cache_dirty( p.z );
1827  set_seen_cache_dirty( p );
1828  get_creature_tracker().invalidate_reachability_cache();
1829  }
1830 
1831  if( old_f.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SUN_ROOF_ABOVE ) != new_f.has_flag(
1832  ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SUN_ROOF_ABOVE ) ) {
1833  set_floor_cache_dirty( p.z + 1 );
1834  }
1835 
1836  invalidate_max_populated_zlev( p.z );
1837 
1838  memory_cache_dec_set_dirty( p, true );
1839  if( player_character.sees( p ) ) {
1840  player_character.memorize_clear_decoration( getglobal( p ), "f_" );
1841  }
1842 
1843  if( ( old_f.movecost < 0 ) != ( new_f.movecost < 0 ) ) {
1844  get_creature_tracker().invalidate_reachability_cache();
1845  }
1846  // TODO: Limit to changes that affect move cost, traps and stairs
1847  set_pathfinding_cache_dirty( p );
1848 
1849  // Make sure the furniture falls if it needs to
1850  support_dirty( p );
1851  tripoint above( p.xy(), p.z + 1 );
1852  // Make sure that if we supported something and no longer do so, it falls down
1853  support_dirty( above );
1854 
1855  return result;
1856 }
1857 
1858 bool map::furn_set( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, const furn_id &new_furniture, const bool furn_reset,
1859  bool avoid_creatures )
1860 {
1861  return furn_set( p.raw(), new_furniture, furn_reset, avoid_creatures );
1862 }
1863 
1864 bool map::can_move_furniture( const tripoint &pos, Character *you ) const
1865 {
1866  if( !you ) {
1867  return false;
1868  }
1869  const furn_t &furniture_type = furn( pos ).obj();
1870  int required_str = furniture_type.move_str_req;
1871 
1872  // Object can not be moved (or nothing there)
1873  if( required_str < 0 ) {
1874  return false;
1875  }
1876 
1877  ///\EFFECT_STR determines what furniture the player can move
1878  int adjusted_str = you->str_cur;
1879  if( you->is_mounted() ) {
1880  auto *mons = you->mounted_creature.get();
1881  if( mons->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) && mons->mech_str_addition() != 0 ) {
1882  adjusted_str = mons->mech_str_addition();
1883  }
1884  }
1885  return adjusted_str >= required_str;
1886 }
1887 
1888 std::string map::furnname( const tripoint &p )
1889 {
1890  const furn_t &f = furn( p ).obj();
1891  if( f.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLANT ) ) {
1892  // Can't use item_stack::only_item() since there might be fertilizer
1893  map_stack items = i_at( p );
1894  const map_stack::iterator seed = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
1895  return it.is_seed();
1896  } );
1897  if( seed == items.end() ) {
1898  debugmsg( "Missing seed for plant at (%d, %d, %d)", p.x, p.y, p.z );
1899  return "null";
1900  }
1901  const std::string &plant = seed->get_plant_name();
1902  return string_format( "%s (%s)", f.name(), plant );
1903  } else {
1904  return f.name();
1905  }
1906 }
1907 
1908 std::string map::furnname( const tripoint_bub_ms &p )
1909 {
1910  return furnname( p.raw() );
1911 }
1912 
1913 /*
1914  * Get the terrain integer id. This is -not- a number guaranteed to remain
1915  * the same across revisions; it is a load order, and can change when mods
1916  * are loaded or removed. The old t_floor style constants will still work but
1917  * are -not- guaranteed; if a mod removes t_lava, t_lava will equal t_null;
1918  * New terrains added to the core game generally do not need this, it's
1919  * retained for high performance comparisons, save/load, and gradual transition
1920  * to string terrain.id
1921  */
1922 ter_id map::ter( const tripoint &p ) const
1923 {
1924  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
1925  return ter_str_id::NULL_ID().id();
1926  }
1927 
1928  point l;
1929  const submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
1930  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
1931  debugmsg( "Tried to process terrain at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
1932  return ter_str_id::NULL_ID().id();
1933  }
1934 
1935  return current_submap->get_ter( l );
1936 }
1937 
1938 ter_id map::ter( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
1939 {
1940  return ter( p.raw() );
1941 }
1942 
1943 int map::get_map_damage( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
1944 {
1945  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
1946  return 0;
1947  }
1948 
1949  point_sm_ms l;
1950  const submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
1951  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
1952  debugmsg( "Called get_map_damage for unloaded submap" );
1953  return 0;
1954  }
1955  return current_submap->get_map_damage( l );
1956 }
1957 
1958 void map::set_map_damage( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, int dmg )
1959 {
1960  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
1961  return;
1962  }
1963 
1964  point_sm_ms l;
1965  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
1966  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
1967  debugmsg( "Called set_map_damage for unloaded submap" );
1968  return;
1969  }
1970  return current_submap->set_map_damage( l, dmg );
1971 }
1972 
1973 uint8_t map::get_known_connections( const tripoint &p,
1974  const std::bitset<NUM_TERCONN> &connect_group,
1975  const std::map<tripoint, ter_id> &override ) const
1976 {
1977  if( connect_group.none() ) {
1978  return 0;
1979  }
1980 
1981  const level_cache &ch = access_cache( p.z );
1982  uint8_t val = 0;
1983  std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> is_memorized;
1984  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
1985 #ifdef TILES
1986  if( use_tiles ) {
1987  is_memorized =
1988  [&]( const tripoint & q ) {
1989  return !player_character.get_memorized_tile( getglobal( q ) ).get_ter_id().empty();
1990  };
1991  } else {
1992 #endif
1993  is_memorized =
1994  [&]( const tripoint & q ) {
1995  return player_character.get_memorized_tile( getglobal( q ) ).symbol != 0;
1996  };
1997 #ifdef TILES
1998  }
1999 #endif
2000 
2001  const bool overridden = override.find( p ) != override.end();
2002  const bool is_transparent = ch.transparency_cache[p.x][p.y] > LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_SOLID;
2003 
2004  // populate connection information
2005  for( int i = 0; i < 4; ++i ) {
2006  tripoint neighbour = p + offsets[i];
2007  if( !inbounds( neighbour ) ) {
2008  continue;
2009  }
2010  const auto neighbour_override = override.find( neighbour );
2011  const bool neighbour_overridden = neighbour_override != override.end();
2012  // if there's some non-memory terrain to show at the neighboring tile
2013  const bool may_connect = neighbour_overridden ||
2014  get_visibility( ch.visibility_cache[neighbour.x][neighbour.y],
2015  get_visibility_variables_cache() ) == visibility_type::CLEAR ||
2016  // or if an actual center tile is transparent or next to a memorized tile
2017  ( !overridden && ( is_transparent || is_memorized( neighbour ) ) );
2018  if( may_connect ) {
2019  const ter_t &neighbour_terrain = neighbour_overridden ?
2020  neighbour_override->second.obj() : ter( neighbour ).obj();
2021  if( neighbour_terrain.in_connect_groups( connect_group ) ) {
2022  val += 1 << i;
2023  }
2024  }
2025  }
2026 
2027  return val;
2028 }
2029 
2030 uint8_t map::get_known_rotates_to( const tripoint &p,
2031  const std::bitset<NUM_TERCONN> &rotate_to_group,
2032  const std::map<tripoint, ter_id> &override ) const
2033 {
2034  if( rotate_to_group.none() ) {
2035  return CHAR_MAX;
2036  }
2037 
2038  uint8_t val = 0;
2039 
2040  // populate connection information
2041  for( int i = 0; i < 4; ++i ) {
2042  tripoint neighbour = p + offsets[i];
2043  if( !inbounds( neighbour ) ) {
2044  continue;
2045  }
2046  const auto neighbour_override = override.find( neighbour );
2047  const bool neighbour_overridden = neighbour_override != override.end();
2048 
2049  const ter_t &neighbour_terrain = neighbour_overridden ?
2050  neighbour_override->second.obj() : ter( neighbour ).obj();
2051  if( neighbour_terrain.in_connect_groups( rotate_to_group ) ) {
2052  val += 1 << i;
2053  }
2054  }
2055 
2056  return val;
2057 }
2058 
2059 uint8_t map::get_known_connections_f( const tripoint &p,
2060  const std::bitset<NUM_TERCONN> &connect_group,
2061  const std::map<tripoint, furn_id> &override ) const
2062 {
2063  if( connect_group.none() ) {
2064  return 0;
2065  }
2066 
2067  const level_cache &ch = access_cache( p.z );
2068  uint8_t val = 0;
2069  std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> is_memorized;
2070  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
2071 #ifdef TILES
2072  if( use_tiles ) {
2073  is_memorized = [&]( const tripoint & q ) {
2074  return !player_character.get_memorized_tile( getglobal( q ) ).get_dec_id().empty();
2075  };
2076  } else {
2077 #endif
2078  is_memorized = [&]( const tripoint & q ) {
2079  return player_character.get_memorized_tile( getglobal( q ) ).symbol != 0;
2080  };
2081 #ifdef TILES
2082  }
2083 #endif
2084 
2085  const bool overridden = override.find( p ) != override.end();
2086  const bool is_transparent = ch.transparency_cache[p.x][p.y] > LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_SOLID;
2087 
2088  // populate connection information
2089  for( int i = 0; i < 4; ++i ) {
2090  tripoint pt = p + offsets[i];
2091  if( !inbounds( pt ) ) {
2092  continue;
2093  }
2094  const auto neighbour_override = override.find( pt );
2095  const bool neighbour_overridden = neighbour_override != override.end();
2096  // if there's some non-memory terrain to show at the neighboring tile
2097  const bool may_connect = neighbour_overridden ||
2098  get_visibility( ch.visibility_cache[pt.x][pt.y],
2099  get_visibility_variables_cache() ) ==
2100  visibility_type::CLEAR ||
2101  // or if an actual center tile is transparent or
2102  // next to a memorized tile
2103  ( !overridden && ( is_transparent || is_memorized( pt ) ) );
2104  if( may_connect ) {
2105  const furn_t &neighbour_furn = neighbour_overridden ?
2106  neighbour_override->second.obj() : furn( pt ).obj();
2107  if( neighbour_furn.in_connect_groups( connect_group ) ) {
2108  val += 1 << i;
2109  }
2110  }
2111  }
2112 
2113  return val;
2114 }
2115 
2116 uint8_t map::get_known_rotates_to_f( const tripoint &p,
2117  const std::bitset<NUM_TERCONN> &rotate_to_group,
2118  const std::map<tripoint, ter_id> &override,
2119  const std::map<tripoint, furn_id> &override_f ) const
2120 {
2121  if( rotate_to_group.none() ) {
2122  return CHAR_MAX;
2123  }
2124 
2125  uint8_t val = 0;
2126 
2127  // populate connection information
2128  for( int i = 0; i < 4; ++i ) {
2129  tripoint pt = p + offsets[i];
2130  if( !inbounds( pt ) ) {
2131  continue;
2132  }
2133  const auto neighbour_override = override.find( pt );
2134  const bool neighbour_overridden = neighbour_override != override.end();
2135 
2136  const auto neighbour_override_f = override_f.find( pt );
2137  const bool neighbour_overridden_f = neighbour_override_f != override_f.end();
2138 
2139  const ter_t &neighbour = neighbour_overridden ?
2140  neighbour_override->second.obj() : ter( pt ).obj();
2141 
2142  const furn_t &neighbour_f = neighbour_overridden_f ?
2143  neighbour_override_f->second.obj() : furn( pt ).obj();
2144 
2145  if( neighbour.in_connect_groups( rotate_to_group ) ||
2146  neighbour_f.in_connect_groups( rotate_to_group ) ) {
2147  val += 1 << i;
2148  }
2149  }
2150 
2151  return val;
2152 }
2153 
2154 /*
2155  * Get the results of harvesting this tile's furniture or terrain
2156  */
2157 const harvest_id &map::get_harvest( const tripoint &pos ) const
2158 {
2159  const furn_id furn_here = furn( pos );
2160  if( !furn_here->has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_HARVESTED ) ) {
2161  const harvest_id &harvest = furn_here->get_harvest();
2162  if( ! harvest.is_null() ) {
2163  return harvest;
2164  }
2165  }
2166 
2167  const ter_id ter_here = ter( pos );
2168  if( ter_here->has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_HARVESTED ) ) {
2169  return harvest_id::NULL_ID();
2170  }
2171 
2172  return ter_here->get_harvest();
2173 }
2174 
2175 const std::set<std::string> &map::get_harvest_names( const tripoint &pos ) const
2176 {
2177  static const std::set<std::string> null_harvest_names = {};
2178  const furn_id furn_here = furn( pos );
2179  if( furn_here->can_examine( pos ) ) {
2180  if( furn_here->has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_HARVESTED ) ) {
2181  return null_harvest_names;
2182  }
2183 
2184  return furn_here->get_harvest_names();
2185  }
2186 
2187  const ter_id ter_here = ter( pos );
2188  if( ter_here->has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_HARVESTED ) ) {
2189  return null_harvest_names;
2190  }
2191 
2192  return ter_here->get_harvest_names();
2193 }
2194 
2195 /*
2196  * Get the terrain transforms_into id (what will the terrain transforms into)
2197  */
2198 ter_id map::get_ter_transforms_into( const tripoint &p ) const
2199 {
2200  return ter( p ).obj().transforms_into.id();
2201 }
2202 
2203 /**
2204  * Examines the tile pos, with character as the "examinator"
2205  * Casts Character to player because player/NPC split isn't done yet
2206  */
2207 void map::examine( Character &you, const tripoint &pos ) const
2208 {
2209  const furn_t furn_here = furn( pos ).obj();
2210  if( furn_here.can_examine( pos ) ) {
2211  furn_here.examine( dynamic_cast<Character &>( you ), pos );
2212  } else {
2213  ter( pos ).obj().examine( dynamic_cast<Character &>( you ), pos );
2214  }
2215 }
2216 
2217 bool map::is_harvestable( const tripoint &pos ) const
2218 {
2219  const harvest_id &harvest_here = get_harvest( pos );
2220  return !harvest_here.is_null() && !harvest_here->empty();
2221 }
2222 
2223 /*
2224  * set terrain via string; this works for -any- terrain id
2225  */
2226 bool map::ter_set( const tripoint &p, const ter_id &new_terrain, bool avoid_creatures )
2227 {
2228  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
2229  return false;
2230  }
2231  if( avoid_creatures ) {
2232  Creature *c = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( tripoint_abs_ms( getabs( p ) ), true );
2233  if( c ) {
2234  return false;
2235  }
2236  }
2237 
2238  point l;
2239  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
2240  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
2241  debugmsg( "Tried to set terrain at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
2242  return true;
2243  }
2244  const ter_id old_id = current_submap->get_ter( l );
2245  if( old_id == new_terrain ) {
2246  // Nothing changed
2247  return false;
2248  }
2249 
2250  current_submap->set_ter( l, new_terrain );
2251  current_submap->set_map_damage( point_sm_ms( l ), 0 );
2252 
2253  // Set the dirty flags
2254  const ter_t &old_t = old_id.obj();
2255  const ter_t &new_t = new_terrain.obj();
2256 
2257  if( current_submap->is_open_air( l ) ) {
2258  const furn_id &current_furn = current_submap->get_furn( l );
2259  if( current_furn != furn_str_id::NULL_ID() &&
2260  !current_furn->has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_ALLOW_ON_OPEN_AIR ) ) {
2261  debugmsg( "Setting terrain %s at %s where furniture is %s. Terrain is_open_air\n"
2262  "If this is intentional, set the ALLOW_ON_OPEN_AIR flag on the furniture",
2263  new_terrain.id().str(), p.to_string(), current_furn.id().str() );
2264  }
2265  }
2266 
2267  // HACK: Hack around ledges in traplocs or else it gets NASTY in z-level mode
2268  if( old_t.trap != tr_null && old_t.trap != tr_ledge ) {
2269  auto &traps = traplocs[old_t.trap.to_i()];
2270  const auto iter = std::find( traps.begin(), traps.end(), p );
2271  if( iter != traps.end() ) {
2272  traps.erase( iter );
2273  }
2274  }
2275  if( new_t.trap != tr_null && new_t.trap != tr_ledge ) {
2276  traplocs[new_t.trap.to_i()].push_back( p );
2277  }
2278  if( !new_t.emissions.empty() ) {
2279  field_ter_locs.push_back( p );
2280  }
2281  if( old_t.transparent != new_t.transparent ) {
2282  set_transparency_cache_dirty( p );
2283  set_seen_cache_dirty( p );
2284  }
2285 
2286  if( old_t.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_INDOORS ) != new_t.has_flag(
2287  ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_INDOORS ) ) {
2288  set_outside_cache_dirty( p.z );
2289  }
2290 
2291  if( new_t.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_FLOOR ) != old_t.has_flag(
2292  ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_FLOOR ) ) {
2293  set_floor_cache_dirty( p.z );
2294  // It's a set, not a flag
2295  support_cache_dirty.insert( p );
2296  set_seen_cache_dirty( p );
2297  }
2298 
2299  if( new_t.has_flag( "SPAWN_WITH_LIQUID" ) ) {
2300  if( new_t.has_flag( "FRESH_WATER" ) ) {
2301  item water( "water", calendar::start_of_cataclysm );
2302  // TODO: Move all numeric values to json
2303  water.charges = rng( 40, 240 );
2304  if( new_t.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_MURKY ) ) {
2305  water.poison = rng( 1, 6 );
2306  water.get_comestible()->parasites = 5;
2307  water.get_comestible()->contamination = { { disease_bad_food, 5 } };
2308  }
2309  add_item( p, water );
2310  }
2311  }
2312 
2313  invalidate_max_populated_zlev( p.z );
2314 
2315  memory_cache_dec_set_dirty( p, true );
2316  memory_cache_ter_set_dirty( p, true );
2317  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
2318  if( player_character.sees( p ) ) {
2319  player_character.memorize_clear_decoration( getglobal( p ), "t_" );
2320  }
2321 
2322  if( ( old_t.movecost == 0 ) != ( new_t.movecost == 0 ) ) {
2323  get_creature_tracker().invalidate_reachability_cache();
2324  }
2325  // TODO: Limit to changes that affect move cost, traps and stairs
2326  set_pathfinding_cache_dirty( p );
2327 
2328  tripoint above( p.xy(), p.z + 1 );
2329  // Make sure that if we supported something and no longer do so, it falls down
2330  support_dirty( above );
2331 
2332  return true;
2333 }
2334 
2335 bool map::ter_set( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, const ter_id &new_terrain, bool avoid_creatures )
2336 {
2337  return ter_set( p.raw(), new_terrain, avoid_creatures );
2338 }
2339 
2340 std::string map::tername( const tripoint &p ) const
2341 {
2342  return ter( p ).obj().name();
2343 }
2344 
2345 std::string map::features( const tripoint &p ) const
2346 {
2347  std::string result;
2348  const auto add = [&]( const std::string & text ) {
2349  if( !result.empty() ) {
2350  result += " ";
2351  }
2352  result += text;
2353  };
2354  const auto add_if = [&]( const bool cond, const std::string & text ) {
2355  if( cond ) {
2356  add( text );
2357  }
2358  };
2359  // This is used in an info window that is 46 characters wide, and is expected
2360  // to take up one line. So, make sure it does that.
2361  // FIXME: can't control length of localized text.
2362  add_if( is_bashable( p ), _( "Smashable." ) );
2363  add_if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DIGGABLE, p ), _( "Diggable." ) );
2364  add_if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLOWABLE, p ), _( "Plowable." ) );
2365  add_if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_ROUGH, p ), _( "Rough." ) );
2366  add_if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_UNSTABLE, p ), _( "Unstable." ) );
2367  add_if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SHARP, p ), _( "Sharp." ) );
2368  add_if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FLAT, p ), _( "Flat." ) );
2369  add_if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_EASY_DECONSTRUCT, p ), _( "Simple." ) );
2370  add_if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_MOUNTABLE, p ), _( "Mountable." ) );
2371  add_if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FLAMMABLE, p ) ||
2372  has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FLAMMABLE_ASH, p ) ||
2373  has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FLAMMABLE_HARD, p ), _( "Flammable." ) );
2374  return result;
2375 }
2376 
2377 int map::move_cost_internal( const furn_t &furniture, const ter_t &terrain, const field &field,
2378  const vehicle *veh,
2379  const int vpart ) const
2380 {
2381  if( terrain.movecost == 0 || ( furniture.id && furniture.movecost < 0 ) ||
2382  field.total_move_cost() < 0 ) {
2383  return 0;
2384  }
2385 
2386  if( veh != nullptr ) {
2387  const vpart_position vp( const_cast<vehicle &>( *veh ), vpart );
2388  if( vp.obstacle_at_part() ) {
2389  return 0;
2390  } else if( vp.part_with_feature( VPFLAG_AISLE, true ) ) {
2391  return 2;
2392  } else {
2393  return 8;
2394  }
2395  }
2396  int movecost = std::max( terrain.movecost + field.total_move_cost(), 0 );
2397 
2398  if( furniture.id ) {
2399  if( furniture.has_flag( "BRIDGE" ) ) {
2400  movecost = 2 + std::max( furniture.movecost, 0 );
2401  } else {
2402  movecost += std::max( furniture.movecost, 0 );
2403  }
2404  }
2405 
2406  return movecost;
2407 }
2408 
2409 bool map::is_wall_adjacent( const tripoint &center ) const
2410 {
2411  for( const tripoint &p : points_in_radius( center, 1 ) ) {
2412  if( p != center && impassable( p ) ) {
2413  return true;
2414  }
2415  }
2416  return false;
2417 }
2418 
2419 bool map::is_open_air( const tripoint &p ) const
2420 {
2421  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
2422  return false;
2423  }
2424  point l;
2425  const submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
2426  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
2427  return false;
2428  }
2429  return current_submap->is_open_air( l );
2430 }
2431 
2432 // Move cost: 3D
2433 
2434 int map::move_cost( const tripoint &p, const vehicle *ignored_vehicle ) const
2435 {
2436  // To save all of the bound checks and submaps fetching, we extract it
2437  // here instead of using furn(), field_at() and ter().
2438  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
2439  return 0;
2440  }
2441  point l;
2442  const submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
2443  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
2444  return 0;
2445  }
2446 
2447  const furn_t &furniture = current_submap->get_furn( l ).obj();
2448  const ter_t &terrain = current_submap->get_ter( l ).obj();
2449  const field &field = current_submap->get_field( l );
2450  const optional_vpart_position vp = veh_at( p );
2451  vehicle *const veh = ( !vp || &vp->vehicle() == ignored_vehicle ) ? nullptr : &vp->vehicle();
2452  const int part = veh ? vp->part_index() : -1;
2453 
2454  return move_cost_internal( furniture, terrain, field, veh, part );
2455 }
2456 
2457 int map::move_cost( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, const vehicle *ignored_vehicle ) const
2458 {
2459  return move_cost( p.raw(), ignored_vehicle );
2460 }
2461 
2462 bool map::impassable( const tripoint &p ) const
2463 {
2464  return !passable( p );
2465 }
2466 
2467 bool map::impassable( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
2468 {
2469  return impassable( p.raw() );
2470 }
2471 
2472 bool map::passable( const tripoint &p ) const
2473 {
2474  return move_cost( p ) != 0;
2475 }
2476 
2477 bool map::passable( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
2478 {
2479  return passable( p.raw() );
2480 }
2481 
2482 int map::move_cost_ter_furn( const tripoint &p ) const
2483 {
2484  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
2485  return 0;
2486  }
2487 
2488  point l;
2489  const submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
2490  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
2491  debugmsg( "Tried process terrain at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
2492  return 0;
2493  }
2494 
2495  const int tercost = current_submap->get_ter( l ).obj().movecost;
2496  if( tercost == 0 ) {
2497  return 0;
2498  }
2499 
2500  const int furncost = current_submap->get_furn( l ).obj().movecost;
2501  if( furncost < 0 ) {
2502  return 0;
2503  }
2504 
2505  const int cost = tercost + furncost;
2506  return cost > 0 ? cost : 0;
2507 }
2508 
2509 bool map::impassable_ter_furn( const tripoint &p ) const
2510 {
2511  return !passable_ter_furn( p );
2512 }
2513 
2514 bool map::passable_ter_furn( const tripoint &p ) const
2515 {
2516  return move_cost_ter_furn( p ) != 0;
2517 }
2518 
2519 int map::combined_movecost( const tripoint &from, const tripoint &to,
2520  const vehicle *ignored_vehicle,
2521  const int modifier, const bool flying, const bool via_ramp ) const
2522 {
2523  static constexpr std::array<int, 4> mults = { 0, 50, 71, 100 };
2524  const int cost1 = move_cost( from, ignored_vehicle );
2525  const int cost2 = move_cost( to, ignored_vehicle );
2526  // Multiply cost depending on the number of differing axes
2527  // 0 if all axes are equal, 100% if only 1 differs, 141% for 2, 200% for 3
2528  size_t match = trigdist ? ( from.x != to.x ) + ( from.y != to.y ) + ( from.z != to.z ) : 1;
2529  if( flying || from.z == to.z ) {
2530  return ( cost1 + cost2 + modifier ) * mults[match] / 2;
2531  }
2532 
2533  // Inter-z-level movement by foot (not flying)
2534  if( !valid_move( from, to, false, via_ramp ) ) {
2535  return 0;
2536  }
2537 
2538  // TODO: Penalize for using stairs
2539  return ( cost1 + cost2 + modifier ) * mults[match] / 2;
2540 }
2541 
2542 bool map::valid_move( const tripoint &from, const tripoint &to,
2543  const bool bash, const bool flying, const bool via_ramp ) const
2544 {
2545  // Used to account for the fact that older versions of GCC can trip on the if statement here.
2546  cata_assert( to.z > std::numeric_limits<int>::min() );
2547  // Note: no need to check inbounds here, because maptile_at will do that
2548  // If oob tile is supplied, the maptile_at will be an unpassable "null" tile
2549  if( std::abs( from.x - to.x ) > 1 || std::abs( from.y - to.y ) > 1 ||
2550  std::abs( from.z - to.z ) > 1 ) {
2551  return false;
2552  }
2553 
2554  if( from.z == to.z ) {
2555  // But here we need to, to prevent bashing critters
2556  return passable( to ) || ( bash && inbounds( to ) );
2557  } else if( !zlevels ) {
2558  return false;
2559  }
2560 
2561  const bool going_up = from.z < to.z;
2562 
2563  const tripoint &up_p = going_up ? to : from;
2564  const tripoint &down_p = going_up ? from : to;
2565 
2566  const const_maptile up = maptile_at( up_p );
2567  const ter_t &up_ter = up.get_ter_t();
2568  if( up_ter.id.is_null() ) {
2569  return false;
2570  }
2571  // Checking for ledge is a workaround for the case when mapgen doesn't
2572  // actually make a valid ledge drop location with zlevels on, this forces
2573  // at least one zlevel drop and if down_ter is impassable it's probably
2574  // inside a wall, we could workaround that further but it's unnecessary.
2575  const bool up_is_ledge = tr_at( up_p ) == tr_ledge;
2576 
2577  if( up_ter.movecost == 0 ) {
2578  // Unpassable tile
2579  return false;
2580  }
2581 
2582  const const_maptile down = maptile_at( down_p );
2583  const ter_t &down_ter = down.get_ter_t();
2584  if( down_ter.id.is_null() ) {
2585  return false;
2586  }
2587 
2588  if( !up_is_ledge && down_ter.movecost == 0 ) {
2589  // Unpassable tile
