4923  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
4924  debugmsg( "Tried to set radiation at (%d,%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
4925  return;
4926  }
4927 
4928  current_submap->set_radiation( l, value );
4929 }
4930 
4931 void map::adjust_radiation( const tripoint &p, const int delta )
4932 {
4933  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
4934  return;
4935  }
4936 
4937  point l;
4938  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
4939  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
4940  debugmsg( "Tried to adjust radiation at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
4941  return;
4942  }
4943 
4944  int current_radiation = current_submap->get_radiation( l );
4945  current_submap->set_radiation( l, current_radiation + delta );
4946 }
4947 
4948 units::temperature_delta map::get_temperature_mod( const tripoint &p ) const
4949 {
4950  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
4951  return units::from_kelvin_delta( 0 );
4952  }
4953 
4954  const submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p );
4955  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
4956  debugmsg( "Tried to get temperature at (%d,%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", p.x, p.y, p.z );
4957  return units::from_kelvin_delta( 0 );
4958  }
4959 
4960  return current_submap->get_temperature_mod();
4961 }
4962 
4963 void map::set_temperature_mod( const tripoint &p, units::temperature_delta new_temperature_mod )
4964 {
4965  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
4966  return;
4967  }
4968  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p );
4969  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
4970  debugmsg( "Tried to set temperature at (%d,%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", p.x, p.y, p.z );
4971  return;
4972  }
4973 
4974  current_submap->set_temperature_mod( new_temperature_mod );
4975 }
4976 // Items: 3D
4977 
4978 map_stack map::i_at( const tripoint &p )
4979 {
4980  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
4981  nulitems.clear();
4982  return map_stack{ &nulitems, p, this };
4983  }
4984 
4985  point l;
4986  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
4987  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
4988  debugmsg( "Tried to get items at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
4989  nulitems.clear();
4990  return map_stack{ &nulitems, p, this };
4991  }
4992 
4993  return map_stack{ &current_submap->get_items( l ), p, this };
4994 }
4995 
4996 map_stack map::i_at( const tripoint_bub_ms &p )
4997 {
4998  return i_at( p.raw() );
4999 }
5000 
5001 map_stack::iterator map::i_rem( const tripoint &p, const map_stack::const_iterator &it )
5002 {
5003  point l;
5004  submap *const current_submap = get_submap_at( p, l );
5005  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
5006  debugmsg( "Tried to remove items at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
5007  nulitems.clear();
5008  return map_stack{ &nulitems, p, this } .begin();
5009  }
5010 
5011  current_submap->update_lum_rem( l, *it );
5012 
5013  return current_submap->get_items( l ).erase( it );
5014 }
5015 
5016 void map::i_rem( const tripoint &p, item *it )
5017 {
5018  map_stack map_items = i_at( p );
5019  map_stack::const_iterator iter = map_items.get_iterator_from_pointer( it );
5020  if( iter != map_items.end() ) {
5021  i_rem( p, iter );
5022  }
5023 }
5024 
5025 void map::i_rem( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, item *it )
5026 {
5027  return i_rem( p.raw(), it );
5028 }
5029 
5030 void map::i_clear( const tripoint &p )
5031 {
5032  point l;
5033  submap *const current_submap = get_submap_at( p, l );
5034  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
5035  debugmsg( "Tried to clear items at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
5036  return;
5037  }
5038 
5039  current_submap->set_lum( l, 0 );
5040  current_submap->get_items( l ).clear();
5041 }
5042 
5043 void map::i_clear( const tripoint_bub_ms &p )
5044 {
5045  i_clear( p.raw() );
5046 }
5047 
5048 std::vector<item *> map::spawn_items( const tripoint &p, const std::vector<item> &new_items )
5049 {
5050  std::vector<item *> ret;
5051  if( !inbounds( p ) || has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DESTROY_ITEM, p ) ) {
5052  return ret;
5053  }
5054  const bool swimmable = has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, p );
5055  for( const item &new_item : new_items ) {
5056 
5057  if( new_item.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && swimmable ) {
5058  continue;
5059  }
5060  item &it = add_item_or_charges( p, new_item );
5061  if( !it.is_null() ) {
5062  ret.push_back( &it );
5063  }
5064  }
5065 
5066  return ret;
5067 }
5068 
5069 std::vector<item *> map::spawn_items( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, const std::vector<item> &new_items )
5070 {
5071  return spawn_items( p.raw(), new_items );
5072 }
5073 
5074 void map::spawn_artifact( const tripoint &p, const relic_procgen_id &id,
5075  const int max_attributes,
5076  const int power_level, const int max_negative_power, const bool is_resonant )
5077 {
5078  relic_procgen_data::generation_rules rules;
5079  rules.max_attributes = max_attributes;
5080  rules.power_level = power_level;
5081  rules.max_negative_power = max_negative_power;
5082  rules.resonant = is_resonant;
5083 
5084  add_item_or_charges( p, id->create_item( rules ) );
5085 }
5086 
5087 void map::spawn_artifact( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, const relic_procgen_id &id,
5088  const int max_attributes,
5089  const int power_level, const int max_negative_power, const bool is_resonant )
5090 {
5091  relic_procgen_data::generation_rules rules;
5092  rules.max_attributes = max_attributes;
5093  rules.power_level = power_level;
5094  rules.max_negative_power = max_negative_power;
5095  rules.resonant = is_resonant;
5096 
5097  add_item_or_charges( p, id->create_item( rules ) );
5098 }
5099 
5100 void map::spawn_item( const tripoint &p, const itype_id &type_id, const unsigned quantity,
5101  const int charges, const time_point &birthday, const int damlevel, const std::set<flag_id> &flags,
5102  const std::string &variant, const std::string &faction )
5103 {
5104  if( type_id.is_null() ) {
5105  return;
5106  }
5107 
5108  if( item_is_blacklisted( type_id ) ) {
5109  return;
5110  }
5111  // recurse to spawn (quantity - 1) items
5112  for( size_t i = 1; i < quantity; i++ ) {
5113  spawn_item( p, type_id, 1, charges, birthday, damlevel, flags, variant, faction );
5114  }
5115  // migrate and spawn the item
5116  itype_id mig_type_id = item_controller->migrate_id( type_id );
5117  item new_item( mig_type_id, birthday );
5118  new_item.set_itype_variant( variant );
5119  new_item.set_owner( faction_id( faction ) );
5120  if( one_in( 3 ) && new_item.has_flag( flag_VARSIZE ) ) {
5121  new_item.set_flag( flag_FIT );
5122  }
5123 
5124  if( charges && new_item.charges > 0 ) {
5125  //let's fail silently if we specify charges for an item that doesn't support it
5126  new_item.charges = charges;
5127  }
5128  new_item = new_item.in_its_container();
5129  new_item.set_owner( faction_id( faction ) ); // Set faction to the container as well
5130  if( ( new_item.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, p ) ) ||
5131  has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DESTROY_ITEM, p ) ) {
5132  return;
5133  }
5134 
5135  new_item.set_damage( damlevel );
5136  new_item.rand_degradation();
5137  for( const flag_id &flag : flags ) {
5138  new_item.set_flag( flag );
5139  }
5140 
5141  add_item_or_charges( p, new_item );
5142 }
5143 
5144 units::volume map::max_volume( const tripoint &p )
5145 {
5146  return i_at( p ).max_volume();
5147 }
5148 
5149 // total volume of all the things
5150 units::volume map::stored_volume( const tripoint &p )
5151 {
5152  return i_at( p ).stored_volume();
5153 }
5154 
5155 // free space
5156 units::volume map::free_volume( const tripoint &p )
5157 {
5158  return i_at( p ).free_volume();
5159 }
5160 
5161 units::volume map::free_volume( const tripoint_bub_ms &p )
5162 {
5163  return free_volume( p.raw() );
5164 }
5165 
5166 item_location map::add_item_ret_loc( const tripoint &pos, item obj, bool overflow )
5167 {
5168  int copies = 1;
5169  std::pair<item *, tripoint> ret = _add_item_or_charges( pos, std::move( obj ), copies, overflow );
5170  if( ret.first != nullptr && !ret.first->is_null() ) {
5171  return item_location { map_cursor{ ret.second }, ret.first };
5172  }
5173 
5174  return {};
5175 }
5176 
5177 item &map::add_item_or_charges( const tripoint &pos, item obj, bool overflow )
5178 {
5179  int copies = 1;
5180  return *_add_item_or_charges( pos, std::move( obj ), copies, overflow ).first;
5181 }
5182 
5183 item &map::add_item_or_charges( const tripoint &pos, item obj, int &copies_remaining,
5184  bool overflow )
5185 {
5186  return *_add_item_or_charges( pos, std::move( obj ), copies_remaining, overflow ).first;
5187 }
5188 
5189 std::pair<item *, tripoint> map::_add_item_or_charges( const tripoint &pos, item obj,
5190  int &copies_remaining, bool overflow )
5191 {
5192  // Checks if item would not be destroyed if added to this tile
5193  auto valid_tile = [&]( const tripoint & e ) {
5194  if( !inbounds( e ) ) {
5195  dbg( D_INFO ) << e; // should never happen
5196  return false;
5197  }
5198 
5199  // Some tiles destroy items (e.g. lava)
5200  if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DESTROY_ITEM, e ) ) {
5201  return false;
5202  }
5203 
5204  // Cannot drop liquids into tiles that are comprised of liquid
5205  if( obj.made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) && has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, e ) ) {
5206  return false;
5207  }
5208 
5209  return true;
5210  };
5211 
5212  // Get how many copies of the item can fit in a tile
5213  auto how_many_copies_fit = [&]( const tripoint & e ) {
5214  return std::min( { copies_remaining,
5215  obj.volume() == 0_ml ? INT_MAX : free_volume( e ) / obj.volume(),
5216  static_cast<int>( MAX_ITEM_IN_SQUARE - i_at( e ).size() ) } );
5217  };
5218 
5219  // Performs the actual insertion of the object onto the map
5220  auto place_item = [&]( const tripoint & tile, int &copies ) -> item& {
5221  if( obj.count_by_charges() )
5222  {
5223  for( item &e : i_at( tile ) ) {
5224  if( e.merge_charges( obj ) ) {
5225  return e;
5226  }
5227  }
5228  }
5229 
5230  support_dirty( tile );
5231  return add_item( tile, obj, copies );
5232  };
5233 
5234  if( item_is_blacklisted( obj.typeId() ) ) {
5235  return { &null_item_reference(), tripoint_min };
5236  }
5237 
5238  // Some items never exist on map as a discrete item (must be contained by another item)
5239  if( obj.has_flag( flag_NO_DROP ) ) {
5240  return { &null_item_reference(), tripoint_min };
5241  }
5242 
5243  // If intended drop tile destroys the item then we don't attempt to overflow
5244  if( !valid_tile( pos ) ) {
5245  return { &null_item_reference(), tripoint_min };
5246  }
5247 
5248  std::optional<std::pair<item *, tripoint>> first_added;
5249  int copies_to_add_here = how_many_copies_fit( pos );
5250 
5251  if( ( !has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NOITEM, pos ) ||
5252  ( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_LIQUIDCONT, pos ) && obj.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) ) &&
5253  copies_to_add_here > 0 ) {
5254  // Pass map into on_drop, because this map may not be the global map object (in mapgen, for instance).
5255  if( obj.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) || !obj.has_flag( flag_DROP_ACTION_ONLY_IF_LIQUID ) ) {
5256  if( obj.on_drop( pos, *this ) ) {
5257  return { &null_item_reference(), tripoint_min };
5258  }
5259  }
5260  // If tile can contain items place here...
5261  copies_remaining -= copies_to_add_here;
5262  first_added = first_added ? first_added : std::make_pair( &place_item( pos, copies_to_add_here ),
5263  pos );
5264  }
5265  if( overflow && copies_remaining > 0 ) {
5266  // ...otherwise try to overflow to adjacent tiles (if permitted)
5267  const int max_dist = 2;
5268  std::vector<tripoint> tiles = closest_points_first( pos, max_dist );
5269  tiles.erase( tiles.begin() ); // we already tried this position
5270  const int max_path_length = 4 * max_dist;
5271  const pathfinding_settings setting( 0, max_dist, max_path_length, 0, false, false, true, false,
5272  false, false );
5273  for( const tripoint &e : tiles ) {
5274  if( copies_remaining <= 0 ) {
5275  break;
5276  }
5277  if( !inbounds( e ) ) {
5278  continue;
5279  }
5280  //must be a path to the target tile
5281  if( route( pos, e, setting ).empty() ) {
5282  continue;
5283  }
5284  if( obj.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) || !obj.has_flag( flag_DROP_ACTION_ONLY_IF_LIQUID ) ) {
5285  if( obj.on_drop( e, *this ) ) {
5286  return first_added ? first_added.value() : std::make_pair( &null_item_reference(), tripoint_min );
5287  }
5288  }
5289 
5290  copies_to_add_here = how_many_copies_fit( e );
5291  if( !valid_tile( e ) || copies_to_add_here <= 0 ||
5292  has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NOITEM, e ) || has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SEALED, e ) ) {
5293  continue;
5294  }
5295  copies_remaining -= copies_to_add_here;
5296  std::pair<item *, tripoint> new_item = { &place_item( e, copies_to_add_here ), e };
5297  first_added = first_added ? first_added : new_item;
5298  }
5299  }
5300 
5301  // If first_added has no value, no items were added due to lack of space at target tile (+/- overflow tiles)
5302  return first_added ? first_added.value() : std::make_pair( &null_item_reference(), tripoint_min );
5303 }
5304 
5305 item &map::add_item_or_charges( const tripoint_bub_ms &pos, item obj, bool overflow )
5306 {
5307  return add_item_or_charges( pos.raw(), std::move( obj ), overflow );
5308 }
5309 
5310 item &map::add_item_or_charges( const tripoint_bub_ms &pos, item obj, int &copies_remaining,
5311  bool overflow )
5312 {
5313  return add_item_or_charges( pos.raw(), std::move( obj ), copies_remaining, overflow );
5314 }
5315 
5316 float map::item_category_spawn_rate( const item &itm )
5317 {
5318  const item_category_id &cat = itm.get_category_of_contents().id;
5319  const float spawn_rate = cat.obj().get_spawn_rate();
5320 
5321  return spawn_rate > 1.0f ? roll_remainder( spawn_rate ) : spawn_rate;
5322 }
5323 
5324 item &map::add_item( const tripoint &p, item new_item )
5325 {
5326  int copies = 1;
5327  return add_item( p, std::move( new_item ), copies );
5328 }
5329 item &map::add_item( const tripoint &p, item new_item, int copies )
5330 {
5331  if( item_is_blacklisted( new_item.typeId() ) ) {
5332  return null_item_reference();
5333  }
5334 
5335  if( copies <= 0 ) {
5336  return null_item_reference();
5337  }
5338 
5339  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
5340  return null_item_reference();
5341  }
5342 
5343  point l;
5344  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
5345  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
5346  debugmsg( "Tried to add items at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
5347  return null_item_reference();
5348  }
5349 
5350  // Process foods and temperature tracked items when they are added to the map, here instead of add_item_at()
5351  // to avoid double processing food during active item processing.
5352  if( new_item.has_temperature() && !new_item.is_corpse() ) {
5353  new_item.process( *this, nullptr, p );
5354  }
5355 
5356  if( new_item.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, p ) ) {
5357  return null_item_reference();
5358  }
5359 
5360  if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DESTROY_ITEM, p ) ) {
5361  return null_item_reference();
5362  }
5363 
5364  if( new_item.has_flag( flag_ACT_IN_FIRE ) && get_field( p, fd_fire ) != nullptr ) {
5365  if( new_item.has_flag( flag_BOMB ) && new_item.is_transformable() ) {
5366  //Convert a bomb item into its transformable version, e.g. incendiary grenade -> active incendiary grenade
5367  new_item.convert( dynamic_cast<const iuse_transform *>
5368  ( new_item.type->get_use( "transform" )->get_actor_ptr() )->target );
5369  }
5370  new_item.active = true;
5371  }
5372 
5373  if( new_item.is_map() && !new_item.has_var( "reveal_map_center_omt" ) ) {
5374  new_item.set_var( "reveal_map_center_omt", ms_to_omt_copy( getabs( p ) ) );
5375  }
5376 
5377  if( new_item.has_flag( json_flag_PRESERVE_SPAWN_OMT ) &&
5378  !new_item.has_var( "spawn_location_omt" ) ) {
5379  new_item.set_var( "spawn_location_omt", ms_to_omt_copy( getabs( p ) ) );
5380  }
5381  for( item *const it : new_item.all_items_top( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
5382  if( it->has_flag( json_flag_PRESERVE_SPAWN_OMT ) &&
5383  !it->has_var( "spawn_location_omt" ) ) {
5384  it->set_var( "spawn_location_omt", ms_to_omt_copy( getabs( p ) ) );
5385  }
5386  }
5387 
5388  if( new_item.has_flag( flag_ACTIVATE_ON_PLACE ) ) {
5389  new_item.activate();
5390  }
5391 
5392  current_submap->ensure_nonuniform();
5393  invalidate_max_populated_zlev( p.z );
5394 
5395  current_submap->update_lum_add( l, new_item );
5396 
5397  const map_stack::iterator new_pos = current_submap->get_items( l ).insert( new_item );
5398  while( --copies > 0 ) {
5399  current_submap->get_items( l ).insert( new_item );
5400  }
5401 
5402  if( current_submap->active_items.add( *new_pos, l ) ) {
5403  // TODO: fix point types
5404  tripoint_abs_sm const loc( abs_sub.x() + p.x / SEEX, abs_sub.y() + p.y / SEEY, p.z );
5405  submaps_with_active_items_dirty.insert( loc );
5406  if( this != &get_map() && get_map().inbounds( loc ) ) {
5407  get_map().make_active( loc );
5408  }
5409  }
5410 
5411  return *new_pos;
5412 }
5413 
5414 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(readability-make-member-function-const)
5415 item map::water_from( const tripoint &p )
5416 {
5417  weather_manager &weather = get_weather();
5418  if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SALT_WATER, p ) ) {
5419  item ret( "salt_water", calendar::turn, item::INFINITE_CHARGES );
5420  ret.set_item_temperature( std::max( weather.get_temperature( p ),
5421  temperatures::cold ) );
5422  return ret;
5423  }
5424 
5425  if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CHOCOLATE, p ) ) {
5426  item ret( "liquid_cacao", calendar::turn, item::INFINITE_CHARGES );
5427  ret.set_item_temperature( std::max( weather.get_temperature( p ),
5428  temperatures::cold ) );
5429  return ret;
5430  }
5431 
5432  if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_MURKY, p ) ) {
5433  for( item &ret : get_map().i_at( p ) ) {
5434  if( ret.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
5435  ret.set_item_temperature( std::max( weather.get_temperature( p ),
5436  temperatures::cold ) );
5437  ret.poison = rng( 1, 6 );
5438  ret.get_comestible()->parasites = 5;
5439  ret.get_comestible()->contamination = { { disease_bad_food, 5 } };
5440  return ret;
5441  }
5442  }
5443  }
5444 
5445  if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_TOILET_WATER, p ) ) {
5446  for( item &ret : get_map().i_at( p ) ) {
5447  if( ret.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
5448  ret.set_item_temperature( std::max( weather.get_temperature( p ),
5449  temperatures::cold ) );
5450  ret.poison = one_in( 3 ) ? 0 : rng( 1, 3 );
5451  return ret;
5452  }
5453  }
5454  }
5455 
5456  const ter_id terrain_id = ter( p );
5457  if( terrain_id == ter_t_sewage ) {
5458  item ret( "water_sewage", calendar::turn, item::INFINITE_CHARGES );
5459  ret.set_item_temperature( std::max( weather.get_temperature( p ),
5460  temperatures::cold ) );
5461  ret.poison = rng( 1, 7 );
5462  return ret;
5463  }
5464 
5465  item ret( "water", calendar::turn, item::INFINITE_CHARGES );
5466  ret.set_item_temperature( std::max( weather.get_temperature( p ),
5467  temperatures::cold ) );
5468  // iexamine::water_source requires a valid liquid from this function.
5469  if( terrain_id->has_examine( iexamine::water_source ) ) {
5470  int poison_chance = 0;
5471  if( terrain_id.obj().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER ) ) {
5472  if( terrain_id.obj().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CURRENT ) ) {
5473  poison_chance = 20;
5474  } else {
5475  poison_chance = 4;
5476  }
5477  } else {
5478  if( terrain_id.obj().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CURRENT ) ) {
5479  poison_chance = 10;
5480  } else {
5481  poison_chance = 3;
5482  }
5483  }
5484  if( one_in( poison_chance ) ) {
5485  ret.poison = rng( 1, 4 );
5486  }
5487  return ret;
5488  }
5489  if( furn( p )->has_examine( iexamine::water_source ) ) {
5490  return ret;
5491  }
5492  return item();
5493 }
5494 
5495 void map::make_active( item_location &loc )
5496 {
5497  item *target = loc.get_item();
5498 
5499  point l;
5500  submap *const current_submap = get_submap_at( loc.position(), l );
5501  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
5502  debugmsg( "Tried to make active at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
5503  return;
5504  }
5505  cata::colony<item> &item_stack = current_submap->get_items( l );
5506  cata::colony<item>::iterator iter = item_stack.get_iterator_from_pointer( target );
5507 
5508  if( current_submap->active_items.add( *iter, l ) ) {
5509  // TODO: fix point types
5510  tripoint_abs_sm const smloc( abs_sub.x() + loc.position().x / SEEX,
5511  abs_sub.y() + loc.position().y / SEEY, loc.position().z );
5512  submaps_with_active_items_dirty.insert( smloc );
5513  if( this != &get_map() && get_map().inbounds( smloc ) ) {
5514  get_map().make_active( smloc );
5515  }
5516  }
5517 }
5518 
5519 void map::make_active( tripoint_abs_sm const &loc )
5520 {
5521  submaps_with_active_items_dirty.insert( loc );
5522 }
5523 
5524 void map::update_lum( item_location &loc, bool add )
5525 {
5526  item *target = loc.get_item();
5527 
5528  // if the item is not emissive, do nothing
5529  if( !target->is_emissive() ) {
5530  return;
5531  }
5532 
5533  point l;
5534  submap *const current_submap = get_submap_at( loc.position(), l );
5535  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
5536  debugmsg( "Tried to update lum at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
5537  return;
5538  }
5539 
5540  if( add ) {
5541  current_submap->update_lum_add( l, *target );
5542  } else {
5543  current_submap->update_lum_rem( l, *target );
5544  }
5545 }
5546 
5547 static bool process_map_items( map &here, item_stack &items, safe_reference<item> &item_ref,
5548  item *parent, const tripoint &location, const float insulation,
5549  const temperature_flag flag, const float spoil_multiplier )
5550 {
5551  if( item_ref->process( here, nullptr, location, insulation, flag, spoil_multiplier, false ) ) {
5552  // Item is to be destroyed so erase it from the map stack
5553  // unless it was already destroyed by processing.
5554  if( item_ref ) {
5555  item_ref->spill_contents( location );
5556  if( parent != nullptr ) {
5557  parent->remove_item( *item_ref );
5558  } else {
5559  items.erase( items.get_iterator_from_pointer( item_ref.get() ) );
5560  }
5561  }
5562  if( parent != nullptr ) {
5563  parent->on_contents_changed();
5564  }
5565  return true;
5566  }
5567  // Item not destroyed
5568  return false;
5569 }
5570 
5571 static void process_vehicle_items( vehicle &cur_veh, int part )
5572 {
5573  vehicle_part &vp = cur_veh.part( part );
5574  const vpart_info &vpi = vp.info();
5575 
5576  const bool washer_here = vp.enabled &&
5577  ( vpi.has_flag( VPFLAG_WASHING_MACHINE ) ||
5578  vpi.has_flag( VPFLAG_DISHWASHER ) );
5579 
5580  if( washer_here ) {
5581  bool washing_machine_finished = false;
5582  for( item &n : cur_veh.get_items( vp ) ) {
5583  const time_duration washing_time = 90_minutes;
5584  const time_duration time_left = washing_time - n.age();
5585  if( time_left <= 0_turns ) {
5586  n.unset_flag( flag_FILTHY );
5587  washing_machine_finished = true;
5588  vp.enabled = false;
5589  } else if( calendar::once_every( 15_minutes ) ) {
5590  //~ %1$d: Number of minutes remaining, %2$s: Name of the vehicle
5591  add_msg( _( "It should take %1$d minutes to finish washing items in the %2$s." ),
5592  to_minutes<int>( time_left ) + 1, cur_veh.name );
5593  break;
5594  }
5595  }
5596  if( washing_machine_finished && !vpi.has_flag( VPFLAG_APPLIANCE ) ) {
5597  //~ %1$s: Cleaner, %2$s: Name of the vehicle
5598  add_msg( _( "The %1$s in the %2$s has finished washing." ), vp.name( false ), cur_veh.name );
5599  } else if( washing_machine_finished ) {
5600  add_msg( _( "The %1$s has finished washing." ), vp.name( false ) );
5601  }
5602  }
5603 
5604  const bool autoclave_here = vpi.has_flag( VPFLAG_AUTOCLAVE ) && vp.enabled;
5605  if( autoclave_here ) {
5606  bool autoclave_finished = false;
5607  for( item &n : cur_veh.get_items( vp ) ) {
5608  const time_duration cycle_time = 90_minutes;
5609  const time_duration time_left = cycle_time - n.age();
5610  if( time_left <= 0_turns ) {
5611  if( !n.has_flag( flag_NO_PACKED ) ) {
5612  n.unset_flag( flag_NO_STERILE );
5613  }
5614  autoclave_finished = true;
5615  vp.enabled = false;
5616  } else if( calendar::once_every( 15_minutes ) ) {
5617  const int minutes = to_minutes<int>( time_left ) + 1;
5618  //~ %1$d: Number of minutes remaining, %2$s: Name of the vehicle
5619  add_msg( n_gettext( "It should take %1$d minute to finish sterilizing items in the %2$s.",
5620  "It should take %1$d minutes to finish sterilizing items in the %2$s.", minutes ),
5621  minutes, cur_veh.name );
5622  break;
5623  }
5624  }
5625  if( autoclave_finished && !vpi.has_flag( VPFLAG_APPLIANCE ) ) {
5626  add_msg( _( "The autoclave in the %s has finished its cycle." ), cur_veh.name );
5627  } else if( autoclave_finished ) {
5628  add_msg( _( "The autoclave has finished its cycle." ) );
5629  }
5630  }
5631 
5632  const int recharge_part_idx = cur_veh.part_with_feature( part, VPFLAG_RECHARGE, true );
5633  if( recharge_part_idx >= 0 ) {
5634  const vehicle_part &recharge_part = cur_veh.part( recharge_part_idx );
5635  if( !recharge_part.removed && recharge_part.enabled ) {
5636  for( item &n : cur_veh.get_items( vp ) ) {
5637  if( !n.has_flag( flag_RECHARGE ) && !n.has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
5638  continue;
5639  }
5640  // TODO: BATTERIES this should be rewritten when vehicle power and items both use energy quantities
5641  if( n.ammo_capacity( ammo_battery ) > n.ammo_remaining() ||
5642  ( n.type->battery && n.type->battery->max_capacity > n.energy_remaining( nullptr ) ) ) {
5643  int power = recharge_part.info().bonus;
5644  while( power >= 1000 || x_in_y( power, 1000 ) ) {
5645  const int missing = cur_veh.discharge_battery( 1 );
5646  // Around 85% efficient; a few of the discharges don't actually recharge
5647  if( missing == 0 && !one_in( 7 ) ) {
5648  if( n.is_vehicle_battery() ) {
5649  n.mod_energy( 1_kJ );
5650  } else {
5651  n.ammo_set( itype_battery, n.ammo_remaining() + 1 );
5652  }
5653  }
5654  power -= 1000;
5655  }
5656  break;
5657  }
5658  }
5659  }
5660  }
5661 }
5662 
5663 void map::process_items()
5664 {
5665  const int minz = zlevels ? -OVERMAP_DEPTH : abs_sub.z();
5666  const int maxz = zlevels ? OVERMAP_HEIGHT : abs_sub.z();
5667  for( int gz = minz; gz <= maxz; ++gz ) {
5668  level_cache &cache = access_cache( gz );
5669  std::set<tripoint> submaps_with_vehicles;
5670  for( vehicle *this_vehicle : cache.vehicle_list ) {
5671  tripoint pos = this_vehicle->global_pos3();
5672  submaps_with_vehicles.emplace( pos.x / SEEX, pos.y / SEEY, pos.z );
5673  }
5674  for( const tripoint &pos : submaps_with_vehicles ) {
5675  submap *const current_submap = get_submap_at_grid( pos );
5676  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
5677  debugmsg( "Tried to process items at (%d,%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", pos.x, pos.y,
5678  pos.z );
5679  continue;
5680  }
5681  // Vehicles first in case they get blown up and drop active items on the map.
5682  process_items_in_vehicles( *current_submap );
5683  }
5684  }
5685  update_submaps_with_active_items();
5686  for( auto iter = submaps_with_active_items.begin(); iter != submaps_with_active_items.end(); ) {
5687  tripoint_abs_sm const abs_pos = *iter;
5688  if( !inbounds( project_to<coords::ms>( abs_pos ) ) ) {
5689  iter = submaps_with_active_items.erase( iter );
5690  continue;
5691  }
5692  const tripoint_rel_sm local_pos = abs_pos - abs_sub.xy();
5693  // TODO: fix point types
5694  submap *const current_submap = get_submap_at_grid( local_pos.raw() );
5695  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
5696  debugmsg( "Tried to process items at %s but the submap is not loaded",
5697  local_pos.to_string() );
5698  continue;
5699  }
5700  // TODO: fix point types
5701  process_items_in_submap( *current_submap, local_pos.raw() );
5702  if( current_submap->active_items.empty() ) {
5703  iter = submaps_with_active_items.erase( iter );
5704  } else {
5705  ++iter;
5706  }
5707  }
5708 }
5709 
5710 void map::process_items_in_submap( submap &current_submap, const tripoint &gridp )
5711 {
5712  // Get a COPY of the active item list for this submap.
5713  // If more are added as a side effect of processing, they are ignored this turn.
5714  // If they are destroyed before processing, they don't get processed.
5715  std::vector<item_reference> active_items = current_submap.active_items.get_for_processing();
5716  const point grid_offset( gridp.x * SEEX, gridp.y * SEEY );
5717  for( item_reference &active_item_ref : active_items ) {
5718  if( !active_item_ref.item_ref ) {
5719  // The item was destroyed, so skip it.
5720  continue;
5721  }
5722 
5723  const tripoint map_location = tripoint( grid_offset + active_item_ref.location, gridp.z );
5724  const furn_t &furn = this->furn( map_location ).obj();
5725 
5726  if( furn.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DONT_REMOVE_ROTTEN ) ) {
5727  // plants contain a seed item which must not be removed under any circumstances.
5728  // Lets not process it at all.
5729  continue;
5730  }
5731  // root cellars are special
5732  temperature_flag flag = temperature_flag::NORMAL;
5733  if( ter( map_location ) == ter_t_rootcellar ) {
5734  flag = temperature_flag::ROOT_CELLAR;
5735  }
5736 
5737  float spoil_multiplier = 1.0f;
5738 
5739  if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_SPOIL, map_location ) ) {
5740  spoil_multiplier = 0.0f;
5741  }
5742 
5743  map_stack items = i_at( map_location );
5744 
5745  process_map_items( *this, items, active_item_ref.item_ref, active_item_ref.parent,
5746  map_location, 1, flag,
5747  spoil_multiplier * active_item_ref.spoil_multiplier() );
5748  }
5749 }
5750 
5751 void map::process_items_in_vehicles( submap &current_submap )
5752 {
5753  // a copy, important if the vehicle list changes because a
5754  // vehicle got destroyed by a bomb (an active item!), this list
5755  // won't change, but veh_in_nonant will change.
5756  std::vector<vehicle *> vehicles;
5757  vehicles.reserve( current_submap.vehicles.size() );
5758  for( const auto &veh : current_submap.vehicles ) {
5759  vehicles.push_back( veh.get() );
5760  }
5761  for( vehicle *&cur_veh : vehicles ) {
5762  if( !current_submap.contains_vehicle( cur_veh ) ) {
5763  // vehicle not in the vehicle list of the nonant, has been
5764  // destroyed (or moved to another nonant?)
5765  // Can't be sure that it still exists, so skip it
5766  continue;
5767  }
5768 
5769  process_items_in_vehicle( *cur_veh, current_submap );
5770  }
5771 }
5772 
5773 void map::process_items_in_vehicle( vehicle &cur_veh, submap &current_submap )
5774 {
5775  const bool engine_heater_is_on = cur_veh.has_part( "E_HEATER", true ) && cur_veh.engine_on;
5776  for( const vpart_reference &vp : cur_veh.get_any_parts( VPFLAG_FLUIDTANK ) ) {
5777  vp.part().process_contents( *this, vp.pos(), engine_heater_is_on );
5778  }
5779 
5780  auto cargo_parts = cur_veh.get_parts_including_carried( VPFLAG_CARGO );
5781  for( const vpart_reference &vp : cargo_parts ) {
5782  process_vehicle_items( cur_veh, vp.part_index() );
5783  }
5784 
5785  for( item_reference &active_item_ref : cur_veh.active_items.get_for_processing() ) {
5786  if( empty( cargo_parts ) ) {
5787  return;
5788  } else if( !active_item_ref.item_ref ) {
5789  // The item was destroyed, so skip it.
5790  continue;
5791  }
5792  const auto it = std::find_if( begin( cargo_parts ),
5793  end( cargo_parts ), [&]( const vpart_reference & part ) {
5794  return active_item_ref.location == part.mount();
5795  } );
5796 
5797  if( it == end( cargo_parts ) ) {
5798  continue; // Can't find a cargo part matching the active item.
5799  }
5800  const item &target = *active_item_ref.item_ref;
5801  // Find the cargo part and coordinates corresponding to the current active item.
5802  const vehicle_part &pt = it->part();
5803  const tripoint item_loc = it->pos();
5804  vehicle_stack items = cur_veh.get_items( pt );
5805  float it_insulation = 1.0f;
5806  temperature_flag flag = temperature_flag::NORMAL;
5807  if( target.has_temperature() || target.is_food_container() ) {
5808  const vpart_info &pti = pt.info();
5809  if( engine_heater_is_on ) {
5810  flag = temperature_flag::HEATER;
5811  }
5812  // some vehicle parts provide insulation, default is 1
5813  it_insulation = item::find_type( pti.base_item )->insulation_factor;
5814 
5815  if( pt.enabled && pti.has_flag( VPFLAG_FRIDGE ) ) {
5816  it_insulation = 1; // ignore fridge insulation if on
5817  flag = temperature_flag::FRIDGE;
5818  } else if( pt.enabled && pti.has_flag( VPFLAG_FREEZER ) ) {
5819  it_insulation = 1; // ignore freezer insulation if on
5820  flag = temperature_flag::FREEZER;
5821  } else if( pt.enabled && pti.has_flag( VPFLAG_HEATED_TANK ) ) {
5822  it_insulation = 1; // ignore tank insulation if on
5823  flag = temperature_flag::HEATER;
5824  }
5825  }
5826  if( !process_map_items( *this, items, active_item_ref.item_ref, active_item_ref.parent,
5827  item_loc, it_insulation, flag,
5828  active_item_ref.spoil_multiplier() ) ) {
5829  // If the item was NOT destroyed, we can skip the remainder,
5830  // which handles fallout from the vehicle being damaged.
5831  continue;
5832  }
5833 
5834  // item does not exist anymore, might have been an exploding bomb,
5835  // check if the vehicle is still valid (does exist)
5836  if( !current_submap.contains_vehicle( &cur_veh ) ) {
5837  // Nope, vehicle is not in the vehicle list of the submap,
5838  // it might have moved to another submap (unlikely)
5839  // or be destroyed, anyway it does not need to be processed here
5840  return;
5841  }
5842 
5843  // Vehicle still valid, reload the list of cargo parts,
5844  // the list of cargo parts might have changed (imagine a part with
5845  // a low index has been removed by an explosion, all the other
5846  // parts would move up to fill the gap).
5847  cargo_parts = cur_veh.get_any_parts( VPFLAG_CARGO );
5848  }
5849 }
5850 
5851 // Crafting/item finding functions
5852 
5853 // Note: this is called quite a lot when drawing tiles
5854 // Console build has the most expensive parts optimized out
5855 bool map::sees_some_items( const tripoint &p, const Creature &who ) const
5856 {
5857  // Can only see items if there are any items.
5858  return has_items( p ) && could_see_items( p, who.pos() );
5859 }
5860 
5861 bool map::sees_some_items( const tripoint &p, const tripoint &from ) const
5862 {
5863  return has_items( p ) && could_see_items( p, from );
5864 }
5865 
5866 bool map::could_see_items( const tripoint &p, const Creature &who ) const
5867 {
5868  return could_see_items( p, who.pos() );
5869 }
5870 
5871 bool map::could_see_items( const tripoint &p, const tripoint &from ) const
5872 {
5873  static const std::string container_string( "CONTAINER" );
5874  const bool container = has_flag_ter_or_furn( container_string, p );
5875  const bool sealed = has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SEALED, p );
5876  if( sealed && container ) {
5877  // never see inside of sealed containers
5878  return false;
5879  }
5880  if( container ) {
5881  // can see inside of containers if adjacent or
5882  // on top of the container
5883  return std::abs( p.x - from.x ) <= 1 &&
5884  std::abs( p.y - from.y ) <= 1 &&
5885  std::abs( p.z - from.z ) <= 1;
5886  }
5887  return true;
5888 }
5889 
5890 bool map::has_items( const tripoint &p ) const
5891 {
5892  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
5893  return false;
5894  }
5895 
5896  point l;
5897  const submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
5898  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
5899  debugmsg( "Tried to check items at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
5900  return false;
5901  }
5902 
5903  return !current_submap->get_items( l ).empty();
5904 }
5905 
5906 bool map::has_items( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
5907 {
5908  return has_items( p.raw() );
5909 }
5910 
5911 bool map::only_liquid_in_liquidcont( const tripoint &p )
5912 {
5913  if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_LIQUIDCONT, p ) ) {
5914  for( const item &it : i_at( p ) ) {
5915  if( it.made_of( phase_id::SOLID ) ) {
5916  return false;
5917  }
5918  }
5919  return true;
5920  }
5921  return false;
5922 }
5923 
5924 template <typename Stack>
5925 std::list<item> use_amount_stack( Stack stack, const itype_id &type, int &quantity,
5926  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter )
5927 {
5928  std::list<item> ret;
5929  for( auto a = stack.begin(); a != stack.end() && quantity > 0; ) {
5930  if( a->use_amount( type, quantity, ret, filter ) ) {
5931  a = stack.erase( a );
5932  } else {
5933  ++a;
5934  }
5935  }
5936  return ret;
5937 }
5938 
5939 std::list<item> map::use_amount_square( const tripoint &p, const itype_id &type,
5940  int &quantity, const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter )
5941 {
5942  std::list<item> ret;
5943  // Handle infinite map sources.
5944  item water = water_from( p );
5945  if( water.typeId() == type && water.charges == item::INFINITE_CHARGES ) {
5946  ret.push_back( water );
5947  quantity = 0;
5948  return ret;
5949  }
5950 
5951  if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = veh_at( p ).cargo() ) {
5952  std::list<item> tmp = use_amount_stack( ovp->items(), type, quantity, filter );
5953  ret.splice( ret.end(), tmp );
5954  }
5955  std::list<item> tmp = use_amount_stack( i_at( p ), type, quantity, filter );
5956  ret.splice( ret.end(), tmp );
5957  return ret;
5958 }
5959 
5960 std::list<item_location> map::items_with( const tripoint &p,
5961  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter )
5962 {
5963  std::list<item_location> ret;
5964  if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> vp = veh_at( p ).cargo() ) {
5965  for( item &it : vp->items() ) {
5966  if( filter( it ) ) {
5967  ret.emplace_back( vehicle_cursor( vp->vehicle(), vp->part_index() ), &it );
5968  }
5969  }
5970  }
5971  for( item &it : i_at( p ) ) {
5972  if( filter( it ) ) {
5973  ret.emplace_back( map_cursor( p ), &it );
5974  }
5975  }
5976  return ret;
5977 }
5978 std::list<item> map::use_amount( const std::vector<tripoint> &reachable_pts, const itype_id &type,
5979  int &quantity, const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter, bool select_ind )
5980 {
5981  std::list<item> ret;
5982  if( select_ind && !type->count_by_charges() ) {
5983  std::vector<item_location> locs;
5984  for( const tripoint &p : reachable_pts ) {
5985  std::list<item_location> tmp = items_with( p, [&filter, &type]( const item & it ) -> bool {
5986  return filter( it ) && it.typeId() == type;
5987  } );
5988  locs.insert( locs.end(), tmp.begin(), tmp.end() );
5989  }
5990  while( quantity != static_cast<int>( locs.size() ) && quantity > 0 && !locs.empty() ) {
5991  uilist imenu;
5992  //~ Select components from the map to consume. %d = number of components left to consume.
5993  imenu.title = string_format( _( "Select which component to use (%d left)" ), quantity );
5994  for( const item_location &loc : locs ) {
5995  imenu.addentry( loc->display_name() + " (" + loc.describe() + ")" );
5996  }
5997  imenu.query();
5998  if( imenu.ret < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( imenu.ret ) >= locs.size() ) {
5999  break;
6000  }
6001  locs[imenu.ret]->use_amount( type, quantity, ret, filter );
6002  locs[imenu.ret].remove_item();
6003  locs.erase( locs.begin() + imenu.ret );
6004  }
6005  }
6006  for( const tripoint &p : reachable_pts ) {
6007  if( accessible_items( p ) ) {
6008  std::list<item> tmp = use_amount_square( p, type, quantity, filter );
6009  ret.splice( ret.end(), tmp );
6010  }
6011  }
6012  return ret;
6013 }
6014 std::list<item> map::use_amount( const tripoint &origin, const int range, const itype_id &type,
6015  int &quantity, const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter, bool select_ind )
6016 {
6017  std::vector<tripoint> reachable_pts;
6018  reachable_flood_steps( reachable_pts, origin, range, 1, 100 );
6019  return use_amount( reachable_pts, type, quantity, filter, select_ind );
6020 }
6021 
6022 static void use_charges_from_furn( const furn_t &f, const itype_id &type, int &quantity,
6023  map *m, const tripoint &p, std::list<item> &ret,
6024  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter, bool in_tools )
6025 {
6026  if( m->has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_LIQUIDCONT, p ) ) {
6027  map_stack item_list = m->i_at( p );
6028  auto current_item = item_list.begin();
6029  for( ; current_item != item_list.end(); ++current_item ) {
6030  // looking for a liquid that matches
6031  if( filter( *current_item ) && current_item->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) &&
6032  type == current_item->typeId() ) {
6033  ret.push_back( *current_item );
6034  if( current_item->charges - quantity > 0 ) {
6035  // Update the returned liquid amount to match the requested amount
6036  ret.back().charges = quantity;
6037  // Update the liquid item in the world to contain the leftover liquid
6038  current_item->charges -= quantity;
6039  // All the liquid needed was found, no other sources will be needed
6040  quantity = 0;
6041  } else {
6042  // The liquid copy in ret already contains how much was available
6043  // The leftover quantity returned will check other sources
6044  quantity -= current_item->charges;
6045  // Remove liquid item from the world
6046  item_list.erase( current_item );
6047  }
6048  return;
6049  }
6050  }
6051  }
6052 
6053  const itype *itt = f.crafting_pseudo_item_type();
6054  if( itt != nullptr && itt->tool && !itt->tool->ammo_id.empty() ) {
6055  const bool using_ammotype = f.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_AMMOTYPE_RELOAD );
6056  map_stack stack = m->i_at( p );
6057  for( const itype *ammo_itype : f.crafting_ammo_item_types() ) {
6058  itype_id ammo = ammo_itype->get_id();
6059  auto iter = std::find_if( stack.begin(), stack.end(),
6060  [ammo, using_ammotype]( const item & i ) {
6061  if( using_ammotype && i.type->ammo && ammo->ammo ) {
6062  return i.type->ammo->type == ammo->ammo->type;
6063  } else {
6064  return i.typeId() == ammo;
6065  }
6066  } );
6067  if( iter != stack.end() ) {
6068  item furn_item( itt, calendar::turn_zero );
6069  furn_item.ammo_set( ammo, iter->charges );
6070 
6071  if( !filter( furn_item ) ) {
6072  return;
6073  }
6074  if( furn_item.use_charges( type, quantity, ret, p, return_true<item>, nullptr, in_tools ) ) {
6075  stack.erase( iter );
6076  } else {
6077  iter->charges = furn_item.ammo_remaining();
6078  }
6079  }
6080  }
6081  }
6082 }
6083 
6084 std::list<item> map::use_charges( const std::vector<tripoint> &reachable_pts,
6085  const itype_id &type, int &quantity,
6086  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter,
6087  basecamp *bcp, bool in_tools )
6088 {
6089  std::list<item> ret;
6090 
6091  // We prefer infinite map sources where available, so search for those
6092  // first
6093  for( const tripoint &p : reachable_pts ) {
6094  // Handle infinite map sources.
6095  item water = water_from( p );
6096  if( water.typeId() == type && water.charges == item::INFINITE_CHARGES ) {
6097  water.charges = quantity;
6098  ret.push_back( water );
6099  quantity = 0;
6100  return ret;
6101  }
6102  }
6103 
6104  if( bcp ) {
6105  ret = bcp->use_charges( type, quantity );
6106  if( quantity <= 0 ) {
6107  return ret;
6108  }
6109  }
6110 
6111  for( const tripoint &p : reachable_pts ) {
6112  if( accessible_items( p ) ) {
6113  std::list<item> tmp = i_at( p ).use_charges( type, quantity, p, filter, in_tools );
6114  ret.splice( ret.end(), tmp );
6115  if( quantity <= 0 ) {
6116  return ret;
6117  }
6118  }
6119 
6120  if( has_furn( p ) ) {
6121  use_charges_from_furn( furn( p ).obj(), type, quantity, this, p, ret, filter, in_tools );
6122  if( quantity <= 0 ) {
6123  return ret;
6124  }
6125  }
6126 
6127  const optional_vpart_position vp = veh_at( p );
6128  if( vp ) {
6129  std::list<item> tmp = vp->vehicle().use_charges( *vp, type, quantity, filter, in_tools );
6130  ret.splice( ret.end(), tmp );
6131  if( quantity <= 0 ) {
6132  return ret;
6133  }
6134  }
6135  }
6136 
6137  return ret;
6138 }
6139 
6140 std::list<item> map::use_charges( const tripoint &origin, const int range,
6141  const itype_id &type, int &quantity,
6142  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter,
6143  basecamp *bcp, bool in_tools )
6144 {
6145  // populate a grid of spots that can be reached
6146  std::vector<tripoint> reachable_pts;
6147  reachable_flood_steps( reachable_pts, origin, range, 1, 100 );
6148  return use_charges( reachable_pts, type, quantity, filter, bcp, in_tools );
6149 }
6150 
6151 units::energy map::consume_ups( const std::vector<tripoint> &reachable_pts, units::energy qty )
6152 {
6153  const units::energy wanted_qty = qty;
6154 
6155  // populate a grid of spots that can be reached
6156 
6157  for( const tripoint &p : reachable_pts ) {
6158  if( accessible_items( p ) ) {
6159 
6160  map_stack items = i_at( p );
6161  for( item &elem : items ) {
6162  if( elem.has_flag( flag_IS_UPS ) ) {
6163  qty -= elem.energy_consume( qty, p, nullptr );
6164  if( qty <= 0_J ) {
6165  break;
6166  }
6167  }
6168  }
6169  }
6170  }
6171 
6172  return wanted_qty - qty;
6173 }
6174 
6175 units::energy map::consume_ups( const tripoint &origin, const int range, units::energy qty )
6176 {
6177  // populate a grid of spots that can be reached
6178  std::vector<tripoint> reachable_pts;
6179  reachable_flood_steps( reachable_pts, origin, range, 1, 100 );
6180  return consume_ups( reachable_pts, qty );
6181 }
6182 
6183 std::list<std::pair<tripoint, item *> > map::get_rc_items( const tripoint &p )
6184 {
6185  std::list<std::pair<tripoint, item *> > rc_pairs;
6186  tripoint pos;
6187  pos.z = abs_sub.z();
6188  for( pos.x = 0; pos.x < MAPSIZE_X; pos.x++ ) {
6189  if( p.x != -1 && p.x != pos.x ) {
6190  continue;
6191  }
6192  for( pos.y = 0; pos.y < MAPSIZE_Y; pos.y++ ) {
6193  if( p.y != -1 && p.y != pos.y ) {
6194  continue;
6195  }
6196  map_stack items = i_at( pos );
6197  for( item &elem : items ) {
6198  if( elem.has_flag( flag_RADIO_ACTIVATION ) || elem.has_flag( flag_RADIO_CONTAINER ) ) {
6199  rc_pairs.emplace_back( pos, &elem );
6200  }
6201  }
6202  }
6203  }
6204 
6205  return rc_pairs;
6206 }
6207 
6208 bool map::can_see_trap_at( const tripoint &p, const Character &c ) const
6209 {
6210  return tr_at( p ).can_see( p, c );
6211 }
6212 
6213 const trap &map::tr_at( const tripoint &p ) const
6214 {
6215  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
6216  return tr_null.obj();
6217  }
6218 
6219  point l;
6220  const submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
6221  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
6222  debugmsg( "Tried to get trap at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
6223  return tr_null.obj();
6224  }
6225 
6226  const trap_id &builtin_trap = current_submap->get_ter( l )->trap;
6227  if( builtin_trap != tr_null ) {
6228  return *builtin_trap;
6229  }
6230 
6231  return current_submap->get_trap( l ).obj();
6232 }
6233 
6234 const trap &map::tr_at( const tripoint_abs_ms &p ) const
6235 {
6236  return tr_at( bub_from_abs( p ) );
6237 }
6238 
6239 const trap &map::tr_at( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
6240 {
6241  return tr_at( p.raw() );
6242 }
6243 
6244 partial_con *map::partial_con_at( const tripoint_bub_ms &p )
6245 {
6246  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
6247  return nullptr;
6248  }
6249  point_sm_ms l;
6250  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
6251  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
6252  debugmsg( "Tried to get construction at %s but the submap is not loaded", l.to_string() );
6253  return nullptr;
6254  }
6255  auto it = current_submap->partial_constructions.find( tripoint_sm_ms( l, p.z() ) );
6256  if( it != current_submap->partial_constructions.end() ) {
6257  return &it->second;
6258  }
6259  return nullptr;
6260 }
6261 
6262 void map::partial_con_remove( const tripoint_bub_ms &p )
6263 {
6264  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
6265  return;
6266  }
6267  point_sm_ms l;
6268  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
6269  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
6270  debugmsg( "Tried to remove construction at %s but the submap is not loaded", l.to_string() );
6271  return;
6272  }
6273  current_submap->partial_constructions.erase( tripoint_sm_ms( l, p.z() ) );
6274  memory_cache_dec_set_dirty( p.raw(), true );
6275  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
6276  if( player_character.sees( p ) ) {
6277  player_character.memorize_clear_decoration( getglobal( p ), "tr_" );
6278  }
6279 }
6280 
6281 void map::partial_con_set( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, const partial_con &con )
6282 {
6283  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
6284  return;
6285  }
6286  point_sm_ms l;
6287  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
6288  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
6289  debugmsg( "Tried to set construction at %s but the submap is not loaded", l.to_string() );
6290  return;
6291  }
6292  if( !current_submap->partial_constructions.emplace( tripoint_sm_ms( l, p.z() ), con ).second ) {
6293  debugmsg( "set partial con on top of terrain which already has a partial con" );
6294  }
6295 }
6296 
6297 void map::trap_set( const tripoint &p, const trap_id &type )
6298 {
6299  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
6300  return;
6301  }
6302 
6303  point l;
6304  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
6305  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
6306  debugmsg( "Tried to set trap at %s but the submap is not loaded", l.to_string() );
6307  return;
6308  }
6309  const ter_t &ter = current_submap->get_ter( l ).obj();
6310  if( ter.trap != tr_null ) {
6311  debugmsg( "set trap %s (%s) at %s on top of terrain %s (%s) which already has a "
6312  "built-in trap", type.id().str(), type->name(), p.to_string(),
6313  ter.id.str(), ter.name() );
6314  return;
6315  }
6316 
6317  memory_cache_dec_set_dirty( p, true );
6318  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
6319  if( player_character.sees( p ) ) {
6320  player_character.memorize_clear_decoration( getglobal( p ), "tr_" );
6321  }
6322  // If there was already a trap here, remove it.
6323  if( current_submap->get_trap( l ) != tr_null ) {
6324  remove_trap( p );
6325  }
6326 
6327  current_submap->set_trap( l, type );
6328  if( type != tr_null ) {
6329  traplocs[type.to_i()].push_back( p );
6330  }
6331 }
6332 
6333 void map::trap_set( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, const trap_id &type )
6334 {
6335  trap_set( p.raw(), type );
6336 }
6337 
6338 void map::remove_trap( const tripoint &p )
6339 {
6340  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
6341  return;
6342  }
6343 
6344  point l;
6345  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
6346  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
6347  debugmsg( "Tried to remove trap at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
6348  return;
6349  }
6350 
6351  trap_id tid = current_submap->get_trap( l );
6352  if( tid != tr_null ) {
6353  if( g != nullptr && this == &get_map() ) {
6354  memory_cache_dec_set_dirty( p, true );
6355  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
6356  if( player_character.sees( p ) ) {
6357  player_character.memorize_clear_decoration( getglobal( p ), "tr_" );
6358  }
6359  player_character.add_known_trap( p, tr_null.obj() );
6360  }
6361 
6362  current_submap->set_trap( l, tr_null );
6363  auto &traps = traplocs[tid.to_i()];
6364  const auto iter = std::find( traps.begin(), traps.end(), p );
6365  if( iter != traps.end() ) {
6366  traps.erase( iter );
6367  }
6368  }
6369 }
6370 
6371 void map::remove_trap( const tripoint_bub_ms &p )
6372 {
6373  remove_trap( p.raw() );
6374 }
6375 
6376 /*
6377  * Get wrapper for all fields at xyz
6378  */
6379 const field &map::field_at( const tripoint &p ) const
6380 {
6381  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
6382  nulfield = field();
6383  return nulfield;
6384  }
6385 
6386  point l;
6387  const submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
6388  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
6389  debugmsg( "Tried to get field at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
6390  nulfield = field();
6391  return nulfield;
6392  }
6393 
6394  return current_submap->get_field( l );
6395 }
6396 
6397 /*
6398  * As above, except not const
6399  */
6400 field &map::field_at( const tripoint &p )
6401 {
6402  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
6403  nulfield = field();
6404  return nulfield;
6405  }
6406 
6407  point l;
6408  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
6409  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
6410  debugmsg( "Tried to get field at (%d,%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", p.x, p.y, p.z );
6411  nulfield = field();
6412  return nulfield;
6413  }
6414 
6415  return current_submap->get_field( l );
6416 }
6417 
6418 field &map::field_at( const tripoint_bub_ms &p )
6419 {
6420  return field_at( p.raw() );
6421 }
6422 
6423 time_duration map::mod_field_age( const tripoint &p, const field_type_id &type,
6424  const time_duration &offset )
6425 {
6426  return set_field_age( p, type, offset, true );
6427 }
6428 
6429 int map::mod_field_intensity( const tripoint &p, const field_type_id &type, const int offset )
6430 {
6431  return set_field_intensity( p, type, offset, true );
6432 }
6433 
6434 time_duration map::set_field_age( const tripoint &p, const field_type_id &type,
6435  const time_duration &age, const bool isoffset )
6436 {
6437  if( field_entry *const field_ptr = get_field( p, type ) ) {
6438  return field_ptr->set_field_age( ( isoffset ? field_ptr->get_field_age() : 0_turns ) + age );
6439  }
6440  return -1_turns;
6441 }
6442 
6443 /*
6444  * set intensity of field type at point, creating if not present, removing if intensity is 0
6445  * returns resulting intensity, or 0 for not present
6446  */
6447 int map::set_field_intensity( const tripoint &p, const field_type_id &type,
6448  const int new_intensity,
6449  bool isoffset )
6450 {
6451  field_entry *field_ptr = get_field( p, type );
6452  if( field_ptr != nullptr ) {
6453  int adj = ( isoffset && field_ptr->is_field_alive() ?
6454  field_ptr->get_field_intensity() : 0 ) + new_intensity;
6455  on_field_modified( p, *type );
6456  field_ptr->set_field_intensity( adj );
6457  return adj;
6458  } else if( new_intensity > 0 ) {
6459  return add_field( p, type, new_intensity ) ? new_intensity : 0;
6460  }
6461 
6462  return 0;
6463 }
6464 
6465 time_duration map::get_field_age( const tripoint &p, const field_type_id &type ) const
6466 {
6467  const field_entry *field_ptr = field_at( p ).find_field( type );
6468  return field_ptr == nullptr ? -1_turns : field_ptr->get_field_age();
6469 }
6470 
6471 time_duration map::get_field_age( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, const field_type_id &type ) const
6472 {
6473  return get_field_age( p.raw(), type );
6474 }
6475 
6476 int map::get_field_intensity( const tripoint &p, const field_type_id &type ) const
6477 {
6478  return get_field_intensity( tripoint_bub_ms( p ), type );
6479 }
6480 
6481 int map::get_field_intensity( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, const field_type_id &type ) const
6482 {
6483  const field_entry *field_ptr = get_field( p, type );
6484  return field_ptr == nullptr ? 0 : field_ptr->get_field_intensity();
6485 }
6486 
6487 bool map::has_field_at( const tripoint &p, bool check_bounds ) const
6488 {
6489  const tripoint sm = ms_to_sm_copy( p );
6490  return ( !check_bounds || inbounds( p ) ) && get_cache( p.z ).field_cache[sm.x + sm.y * MAPSIZE];
6491 }
6492 
6493 bool map::has_field_at( const tripoint &p, const field_type_id &type ) const
6494 {
6495  return get_field( p, type ) != nullptr;
6496 }
6497 
6498 template<typename Map>
6499 cata::copy_const<Map, field_entry> *map::get_field_helper(
6500  Map &m, const tripoint &p, const field_type_id &type )
6501 {
6502  if( !m.inbounds( p ) || !m.has_field_at( p, false ) ) {
6503  return nullptr;
6504  }
6505 
6506  point l;
6507  auto *const current_submap = m.unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
6508  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
6509  debugmsg( "Tried to get field at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
6510  return nullptr;
6511  }
6512 
6513  return current_submap->get_field( l ).find_field( type );
6514 }
6515 
6516 field_entry *map::get_field( const tripoint &p, const field_type_id &type )
6517 {
6518  return get_field_helper( *this, p, type );
6519 }
6520 
6521 field_entry *map::get_field( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, const field_type_id &type )
6522 {
6523  return get_field( p.raw(), type );
6524 }
6525 
6526 const field_entry *map::get_field( const tripoint &p, const field_type_id &type ) const
6527 {
6528  return get_field_helper( *this, p, type );
6529 }
6530 
6531 const field_entry *map::get_field( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, const field_type_id &type ) const
6532 {
6533  return get_field( p.raw(), type );
6534 }
6535 
6536 bool map::dangerous_field_at( const tripoint &p )
6537 {
6538  for( auto &pr : field_at( p ) ) {
6539  field_entry &fd = pr.second;
6540  if( fd.is_dangerous() ) {
6541  return true;
6542  }
6543  }
6544  return false;
6545 }
6546 
6547 bool map::dangerous_field_at( const tripoint_bub_ms &p )
6548 {
6549  return dangerous_field_at( p.raw() );
6550 }
6551 
6552 bool map::mopsafe_field_at( const tripoint &p )
6553 {
6554  for( const std::pair<const int_id<field_type>, field_entry> &pr : field_at( p ) ) {
6555  const field_entry &fd = pr.second;
6556  if( !fd.is_mopsafe() ) {
6557  return false;
6558  }
6559  }
6560  return true;
6561 }
6562 
6563 bool map::add_field( const tripoint &p, const field_type_id &type_id, int intensity,
6564  const time_duration &age, bool hit_player )
6565 {
6566  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
6567  return false;
6568  }
6569 
6570  if( !type_id ) {
6571  return false;
6572  }
6573 
6574  // Don't spawn non-gaseous fields on open air
6575  if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_FLOOR, p ) && type_id.obj().phase != phase_id::GAS ) {
6576  return false;
6577  }
6578 
6579  // Don't spawn liquid fields on water tiles
6580  if( has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, p ) && type_id.obj().phase == phase_id::LIQUID ) {
6581  return false;
6582  }
6583 
6584  // Hacky way to force electricity fields to become unlit electricity fields
6585  const field_type_id &converted_type_id = ( type_id == fd_electricity ||
6586  type_id == fd_electricity_unlit ) ? get_applicable_electricity_field( p ) : type_id;
6587  const field_type &fd_type = *converted_type_id;
6588 
6589  intensity = std::min( intensity, fd_type.get_max_intensity() );
6590  if( intensity <= 0 ) {
6591  return false;
6592  }
6593 
6594  point l;
6595  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
6596  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
6597  debugmsg( "Tried to add field at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
6598  return false;
6599  }
6600  current_submap->ensure_nonuniform();
6601  invalidate_max_populated_zlev( p.z );
6602 
6603  if( current_submap->get_field( l ).add_field( converted_type_id, intensity, age ) ) {
6604  //Only adding it to the count if it doesn't exist.
6605  if( !current_submap->field_count++ ) {
6606  get_cache( p.z ).field_cache.set(
6607  static_cast<size_t>( p.x / SEEX ) + ( ( p.y / SEEX ) * MAPSIZE ) );
6608  }
6609  }
6610 
6611  if( hit_player ) {
6612  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
6613  if( g != nullptr && this == &get_map() && p == player_character.pos() ) {
6614  //Hit the player with the field if it spawned on top of them.
6615  creature_in_field( player_character );
6616  }
6617  }
6618 
6619  on_field_modified( p, fd_type );
6620 
6621  return true;
6622 }
6623 
6624 bool map::add_field( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, const field_type_id &type_id, int intensity,
6625  const time_duration &age, bool hit_player )
6626 {
6627  return add_field( p.raw(), type_id, intensity, age, hit_player );
6628 }
6629 
6630 void map::remove_field( const tripoint &p, const field_type_id &field_to_remove )
6631 {
6632  set_field_intensity( p, field_to_remove, 0 );
6633 }
6634 
6635 void map::remove_field( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, const field_type_id &field_to_remove )
6636 {
6637  return remove_field( p.raw(), field_to_remove );
6638 }
6639 
6640 void map::delete_field( const tripoint &p, const field_type_id &field_to_remove )
6641 {
6642  submap *current_submap = this->unsafe_get_submap_at( p );
6643  field &curfield = this->get_field( p );
6644 
6645  // when displayed_field_type == fd_null it means that `curfield` has no fields inside
6646  // avoids instantiating (relatively) expensive map iterator
6647  if( !curfield.displayed_field_type() ) {
6648  return;
6649  }
6650 
6651  for( auto it = curfield.begin(); it != curfield.end(); it++ ) {
6652  if( it->second.get_field_type() == field_to_remove ) {
6653  --current_submap->field_count;
6654  curfield.remove_field( it );
6655  break;
6656  }
6657  }
6658 }
6659 
6660 void map::clear_fields( const tripoint &p )
6661 {
6662  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
6663  return;
6664  }
6665 
6666  point l;
6667  submap *const current_submap = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
6668  current_submap->clear_fields( l );
6669 }
6670 
6671 void map::on_field_modified( const tripoint &p, const field_type &fd_type )
6672 {
6673  invalidate_max_populated_zlev( p.z );
6674 
6675  get_cache( p.z ).field_cache.set(
6676  static_cast<size_t>( p.x / SEEX ) + ( ( p.y / SEEX ) * MAPSIZE ) );
6677 
6678  // Dirty the transparency cache now that field processing doesn't always do it
6679  if( fd_type.dirty_transparency_cache || !fd_type.is_transparent() ) {
6680  set_transparency_cache_dirty( p, true );
6681  set_seen_cache_dirty( p );
6682  }
6683 
6684  if( fd_type.is_dangerous() ) {
6685  set_pathfinding_cache_dirty( p );
6686  }
6687 
6688  // Ensure blood type fields don't hang in the air
6689  if( zlevels && fd_type.accelerated_decay ) {
6690  support_dirty( p );
6691  }
6692 }
6693 
6694 void map::add_splatter( const field_type_id &type, const tripoint &where, int intensity )
6695 {
6696  if( intensity <= 0 ) {
6697  return;
6698  }
6699  if( type.obj().is_splattering ) {
6700  if( const optional_vpart_position vp = veh_at( where ) ) {
6701  vehicle *const veh = &vp->vehicle();
6702  // Might be -1 if all the vehicle's parts at where are marked for removal
6703  const int part = veh->part_displayed_at( vp->mount(), true );
6704  if( part != -1 ) {
6705  veh->part( part ).blood += 200 * std::min( intensity, 3 ) / 3;
6706  return;
6707  }
6708  }
6709  }
6710  mod_field_intensity( where, type, intensity );
6711 }
6712 
6713 void map::add_splatter_trail( const field_type_id &type, const tripoint &from,
6714  const tripoint &to )
6715 {
6716  if( !type.id() ) {
6717  return;
6718  }
6719  const auto trail = line_to( from, to );
6720  int remainder = trail.size();
6721  for( const tripoint &elem : trail ) {
6722  add_splatter( type, elem );
6723  remainder--;
6724  if( impassable( elem ) ) { // Blood splatters stop at walls.
6725  add_splatter( type, elem, remainder );
6726  return;
6727  }
6728  }
6729 }
6730 
6731 void map::add_splash( const field_type_id &type, const tripoint &center, int radius,
6732  int intensity )
6733 {
6734  if( !type.id() ) {
6735  return;
6736  }
6737  // TODO: use Bresenham here and take obstacles into account
6738  for( const tripoint &pnt : points_in_radius( center, radius ) ) {
6739  if( trig_dist( pnt, center ) <= radius && !one_in( intensity ) ) {
6740  add_splatter( type, pnt );
6741  }
6742  }
6743 }
6744 
6745 computer *map::computer_at( const tripoint &p )
6746 {
6747  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
6748  return nullptr;
6749  }
6750 
6751  point l;
6752  submap *const sm = unsafe_get_submap_at( p, l );
6753  if( sm == nullptr ) {
6754  debugmsg( "Tried to get computer at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", l.x, l.y );
6755  return nullptr;
6756  }
6757  return sm->get_computer( l );
6758 }
6759 
6760 bool map::point_within_camp( const tripoint &point_check ) const
6761 {
6762  // TODO: fix point types
6763  const tripoint_abs_omt omt_check( ms_to_omt_copy( point_check ) );
6764  const point_abs_omt p = omt_check.xy();
6765  for( int x2 = -2; x2 < 2; x2++ ) {
6766  for( int y2 = -2; y2 < 2; y2++ ) {
6767  if( std::optional<basecamp *> bcp = overmap_buffer.find_camp( p + point( x2, y2 ) ) ) {
6768  return ( *bcp )->point_within_camp( omt_check );
6769  }
6770  }
6771  }
6772  return false;
6773 }
6774 
6775 void map::remove_submap_camp( const tripoint &p )
6776 {
6777  submap *const current_submap = get_submap_at( p );
6778  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
6779  debugmsg( "Tried to remove camp at (%d,%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", p.x, p.y, p.z );
6780  return;
6781  }
6782  current_submap->camp.reset();
6783 }
6784 
6785 basecamp map::hoist_submap_camp( const tripoint &p )
6786 {
6787  submap *const current_submap = get_submap_at( p );
6788  if( current_submap == nullptr ) {
6789  debugmsg( "Tried to hoist camp at (%d,%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", p.x, p.y, p.z );
6790  return basecamp();
6791  }
6792  basecamp *pcamp = current_submap->camp.get();
6793  return pcamp ? *pcamp : basecamp();
6794 }
6795 
6796 void map::add_camp( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_pos, const std::string &name )
6797 {
6798  basecamp temp_camp = basecamp( name, omt_pos );
6799  overmap_buffer.add_camp( temp_camp );
6800  get_player_character().camps.insert( omt_pos );
6801  g->validate_camps();
6802 }
6803 
6804 void map::update_submaps_with_active_items()
6805 {
6806  std::move( submaps_with_active_items_dirty.begin(), submaps_with_active_items_dirty.end(),
6807  std::inserter( submaps_with_active_items, submaps_with_active_items.begin() ) );
6808  submaps_with_active_items_dirty.clear();
6809 }
6810 
6811 void map::update_visibility_cache( const int zlev )
6812 {
6813  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
6814  if( !visibility_variables_cache.visibility_cache_dirty &&
6815  player_character.pos() == visibility_variables_cache.last_pos ) {
6816  return;
6817  }
6818 
6819  if( player_character.pos().z - zlev < fov_3d_z_range && zlev > -OVERMAP_DEPTH ) {
6820  update_visibility_cache( zlev - 1 );
6821  }
6822  visibility_variables_cache.variables_set = true; // Not used yet
6823  visibility_variables_cache.g_light_level = static_cast<int>( g->light_level( zlev ) );
6824  visibility_variables_cache.vision_threshold = player_character.get_vision_threshold(
6825  get_cache_ref(
6826  player_character.posz() ).lm[player_character.posx()][player_character.posy()].max() );
6827 
6828  visibility_variables_cache.u_clairvoyance = player_character.clairvoyance();
6829  visibility_variables_cache.u_sight_impaired = player_character.sight_impaired();
6830  visibility_variables_cache.u_is_boomered = player_character.has_effect( effect_boomered );
6831  visibility_variables_cache.clairvoyance_field.reset();
6832  if( field_fd_clairvoyant.is_valid() ) {
6833  visibility_variables_cache.clairvoyance_field = field_fd_clairvoyant;
6834  }
6835 
6836  cata::mdarray<int, point_bub_sm> sm_squares_seen = {};
6837 
6838  auto &visibility_cache = get_cache( zlev ).visibility_cache;
6839 
6840  tripoint p;
6841  p.z = zlev;
6842  int &x = p.x;
6843  int &y = p.y;
6844  for( x = 0; x < MAPSIZE_X; x++ ) {
6845  for( y = 0; y < MAPSIZE_Y; y++ ) {
6846  lit_level ll = apparent_light_at( p, visibility_variables_cache );
6847  visibility_cache[x][y] = ll;
6848  sm_squares_seen[ x / SEEX ][ y / SEEY ] += ( ll == lit_level::BRIGHT || ll == lit_level::LIT );
6849  }
6850  }
6851 
6852  for( int gridx = 0; gridx < my_MAPSIZE; gridx++ ) {
6853  for( int gridy = 0; gridy < my_MAPSIZE; gridy++ ) {
6854  if( sm_squares_seen[gridx][gridy] > 36 ) { // 25% of the submap is visible
6855  const tripoint sm( gridx, gridy, 0 );
6856  const tripoint_abs_sm abs_sm = map::abs_sub + sm;
6857  const tripoint_abs_omt abs_omt = project_to<coords::omt>( abs_sm );
6858  overmap_buffer.set_seen( abs_omt, true );
6859  }
6860  }
6861  }
6862 
6863 #if defined(TILES)
6864  if( !test_mode ) {
6865  // Mark cata_tiles draw caches as dirty
6866  tilecontext->set_draw_cache_dirty();
6867  }
6868 #endif
6869 
6870  visibility_variables_cache.last_pos = player_character.pos();
6871  visibility_variables_cache.visibility_cache_dirty = false;
6872 }
6873 
6874 void map::invalidate_visibility_cache()
6875 {
6876  visibility_variables_cache.visibility_cache_dirty = true;
6877 }
6878 
6879 const visibility_variables &map::get_visibility_variables_cache() const
6880 {
6881  return visibility_variables_cache;
6882 }
6883 
6884 visibility_type map::get_visibility( const lit_level ll,
6885  const visibility_variables &cache ) const
6886 {
6887  switch( ll ) {
6888  case lit_level::DARK:
6889  // can't see this square at all
6890  if( cache.u_is_boomered ) {
6891  return visibility_type::BOOMER_DARK;
6892  } else {
6893  return visibility_type::DARK;
6894  }
6895  case lit_level::BRIGHT_ONLY:
6896  // can only tell that this square is bright
6897  if( cache.u_is_boomered ) {
6898  return visibility_type::BOOMER;
6899  } else {
6900  return visibility_type::LIT;
6901  }
6902 
6903  case lit_level::LOW:
6904  // low light, square visible in monochrome
6905  case lit_level::LIT:
6906  // normal light
6907  case lit_level::BRIGHT:
6908  // bright light
6909  return visibility_type::CLEAR;
6910  case lit_level::BLANK:
6911  case lit_level::MEMORIZED:
6912  if( cache.u_is_boomered ) {
6913  return visibility_type::BOOMER_DARK;
6914  } else {
6915  return visibility_type::HIDDEN;
6916  }
6917  }
6918  return visibility_type::HIDDEN;
6919 }
6920 
6921 static std::optional<char32_t> get_memory_at( const tripoint &p )
6922 {
6923  const memorized_tile &mt = get_avatar().get_memorized_tile( get_map().getglobal( p ) );
6924  if( mt.symbol != 0 ) {
6925  return mt.symbol;
6926  }
6927  return std::nullopt;
6928 }
6929 
6930 void map::draw( const catacurses::window &w, const tripoint &center )
6931 {
6932  // We only need to draw anything if we're not in tiles mode.
6933  if( is_draw_tiles_mode() ) {
6934  return;
6935  }
6936 
6937  g->reset_light_level();
6938 
6939  update_visibility_cache( center.z );
6940  const visibility_variables &cache = get_visibility_variables_cache();
6941 
6942  const auto &visibility_cache = get_cache_ref( center.z ).visibility_cache;
6943 
6944  int wnd_h = getmaxy( w );
6945  int wnd_w = getmaxx( w );
6946  const tripoint offs = center - tripoint( wnd_w / 2, wnd_h / 2, 0 );
6947 
6948  // Map memory should be at least the size of the view range
6949  // so that new tiles can be memorized, and at least the size of the terminal
6950  // since displayed area may be bigger than view range.
6951  const point min_mm_reg = point(
6952  std::min( 0, offs.x ),
6953  std::min( 0, offs.y )
6954  );
6955  const point max_mm_reg = point(
6956  std::max( MAPSIZE_X, offs.x + wnd_w ),
6957  std::max( MAPSIZE_Y, offs.y + wnd_h )
6958  );
6959  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
6960  player_character.prepare_map_memory_region(
6961  getglobal( tripoint( min_mm_reg, center.z ) ),
6962  getglobal( tripoint( max_mm_reg, center.z ) )
6963  );
6964 
6965  const auto draw_background = [&]( const tripoint & p ) {
6966  int sym = ' ';
6967  nc_color col = c_black;
6968  if( const std::optional<char32_t> memorized_symbol = get_memory_at( p ) ) {
6969  sym = *memorized_symbol;
6970  col = c_brown;
6971  }
6972  wputch( w, col, sym );
6973  };
6974 
6975  const auto draw_vision_effect = [&]( const visibility_type vis ) -> bool {
6976  int sym = '#';
6977  nc_color col;
6978  switch( vis )
6979  {
6980  case visibility_type::LIT:
6981  // can only tell that this square is bright
6982  col = c_light_gray;
6983  break;
6984  case visibility_type::BOOMER:
6985  col = c_pink;
6986  break;
6987  case visibility_type::BOOMER_DARK:
6988  col = c_magenta;
6989  break;
6990  default:
6991  return false;
6992  }
6993  wputch( w, col, sym );
6994  return true;
6995  };
6996 
6997  drawsq_params params = drawsq_params().memorize( true );
6998  for( int wy = 0; wy < wnd_h; wy++ ) {
6999  for( int wx = 0; wx < wnd_w; wx++ ) {
7000  wmove( w, point( wx, wy ) );
7001  const tripoint p = offs + tripoint( wx, wy, 0 );
7002  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
7003  draw_background( p );
7004  continue;
7005  }
7006 
7007  const lit_level lighting = visibility_cache[p.x][p.y];
7008  const visibility_type vis = get_visibility( lighting, cache );
7009 
7010  if( draw_vision_effect( vis ) ) {
7011  continue;
7012  }
7013 
7014  if( vis == visibility_type::HIDDEN || vis == visibility_type::DARK ) {
7015  draw_background( p );
7016  continue;
7017  }
7018 
7019  const const_maptile curr_maptile = maptile_at_internal( p );
7020  params
7021  .low_light( lighting == lit_level::LOW )
7022  .bright_light( lighting == lit_level::BRIGHT );
7023  if( draw_maptile( w, p, curr_maptile, params ) ) {
7024  continue;
7025  }
7026  const maptile tile_below = maptile_at_internal( p + tripoint_below );
7027  draw_from_above( w, tripoint( p.xy(), p.z - 1 ), tile_below, params );
7028  }
7029  }
7030 
7031  // Memorize off-screen tiles
7032  half_open_rectangle<point> display( offs.xy(), offs.xy() + point( wnd_w, wnd_h ) );
7033  drawsq_params mm_params = drawsq_params().memorize( true ).output( false );
7034  for( int y = 0; y < MAPSIZE_Y; y++ ) {
7035  for( int x = 0; x < MAPSIZE_X; x++ ) {
7036  const tripoint p( x, y, center.z );
7037  if( display.contains( p.xy() ) ) {
7038  // Have been memorized during display loop
7039  continue;
7040  }
7041 
7042  const lit_level lighting = visibility_cache[p.x][p.y];
7043  const visibility_type vis = get_visibility( lighting, cache );
7044 
7045  if( vis != visibility_type::CLEAR ) {
7046  continue;
7047  }
7048 
7049  const maptile curr_maptile = maptile_at_internal( p );
7050  mm_params
7051  .low_light( lighting == lit_level::LOW )
7052  .bright_light( lighting == lit_level::BRIGHT );
7053 
7054  draw_maptile( w, p, curr_maptile, mm_params );
7055  }
7056  }
7057 }
7058 
7059 void map::drawsq( const catacurses::window &w, const tripoint &p,
7060  const drawsq_params &params ) const
7061 {
7062  // If we are in tiles mode, the only thing we want to potentially draw is a highlight
7063  if( is_draw_tiles_mode() ) {
7064  if( params.highlight() ) {
7065  g->draw_highlight( p );
7066  }
7067  return;
7068  }
7069 
7070  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
7071  return;
7072  }
7073 
7074  const tripoint view_center = params.center();
7075  const int k = p.x + getmaxx( w ) / 2 - view_center.x;
7076  const int j = p.y + getmaxy( w ) / 2 - view_center.y;
7077  if( k < 0 || k >= getmaxx( w ) || j < 0 || j >= getmaxy( w ) ) {
7078  return;
7079  }
7080  wmove( w, point( k, j ) );
7081 
7082  const const_maptile tile = maptile_at( p );
7083  if( draw_maptile( w, p, tile, params ) ) {
7084  return;
7085  }
7086 
7087  tripoint below( p.xy(), p.z - 1 );
7088  const const_maptile tile_below = maptile_at( below );
7089  draw_from_above( w, below, tile_below, params );
7090 }
7091 
7092 void map::drawsq( const catacurses::window &w, const tripoint_bub_ms &p,
7093  const drawsq_params &params ) const
7094 {
7095  map::drawsq( w, p.raw(), params );
7096 }
7097 
7098 // a check to see if the lower floor needs to be rendered in tiles
7099 bool map::dont_draw_lower_floor( const tripoint &p ) const
7100 {
7101  return !zlevels || p.z <= -OVERMAP_DEPTH || get_cache( p.z ).floor_cache[p.x][p.y];
7102 }
7103 
7104 bool map::draw_maptile( const catacurses::window &w, const tripoint &p,
7105  const const_maptile &curr_maptile, const drawsq_params &params ) const
7106 {
7107  drawsq_params param = params;
7108  nc_color tercol;
7109  const ter_t &curr_ter = curr_maptile.get_ter_t();
7110  const furn_t &curr_furn = curr_maptile.get_furn_t();
7111  const trap &curr_trap = curr_maptile.get_trap().obj();
7112  const field &curr_field = curr_maptile.get_field();
7113  int sym;
7114  int memory_sym;
7115  bool hi = false;
7116  bool graf = false;
7117  bool draw_item_sym = false;
7118 
7119  if( curr_ter.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_AUTO_WALL_SYMBOL ) ) {
7120  memory_sym = sym = determine_wall_corner( p );
7121  tercol = curr_ter.color();
7122  } else {
7123  memory_sym = sym = curr_ter.symbol();
7124  tercol = curr_ter.color();
7125  }
7126 
7127  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
7128  if( curr_furn.id ) {
7129  sym = curr_furn.symbol();
7130  tercol = curr_furn.color();
7131  if( !( player_character.get_grab_type() == object_type::FURNITURE
7132  && p == player_character.pos() + player_character.grab_point ) ) {
7133  memory_sym = sym;
7134  }
7135  }
7136  if( curr_ter.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE ) &&
7137  curr_ter.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER ) &&
7138  !player_character.is_underwater() ) {
7139  param.show_items( false ); // Can only see underwater items if WE are underwater
7140  }
7141  // If there's a trap here, and we have sufficient perception, draw that instead
7142  if( curr_trap.can_see( p, player_character ) ) {
7143  tercol = curr_trap.color;
7144  if( curr_trap.sym == '%' ) {
7145  switch( rng( 1, 5 ) ) {
7146  case 1:
7147  memory_sym = sym = '*';
7148  break;
7149  case 2:
7150  memory_sym = sym = '0';
7151  break;
7152  case 3:
7153  memory_sym = sym = '8';
7154  break;
7155  case 4:
7156  memory_sym = sym = '&';
7157  break;
7158  case 5:
7159  memory_sym = sym = '+';
7160  break;
7161  }
7162  } else {
7163  memory_sym = sym = curr_trap.sym;
7164  }
7165  }
7166  // FIXME: fix point type
7167  if( const_cast<map *>( this )->partial_con_at( tripoint_bub_ms( p ) ) != nullptr ) {
7168  tercol = tr_unfinished_construction->color;
7169  memory_sym = sym = tr_unfinished_construction->sym;
7170  }
7171  if( curr_field.field_count() > 0 ) {
7172  const field_type_id &fid = curr_field.displayed_field_type();
7173  const field_entry *fe = curr_field.find_field( fid );
7174  const std::string field_symbol = fid->get_symbol();
7175  if( field_symbol == "&" || fe == nullptr ) {
7176  // Do nothing, a '&' indicates invisible fields.
7177  } else if( field_symbol == "*" ) {
7178  // A random symbol.
7179  switch( rng( 1, 5 ) ) {
7180  case 1:
7181  memory_sym = sym = '*';
7182  break;
7183  case 2:
7184  memory_sym = sym = '0';
7185  break;
7186  case 3:
7187  memory_sym = sym = '8';
7188  break;
7189  case 4:
7190  memory_sym = sym = '&';
7191  break;
7192  case 5:
7193  memory_sym = sym = '+';
7194  break;
7195  }
7196  } else {
7197  // A field symbol '%' indicates the field should not hide
7198  // items/terrain. When the symbol is not '%' it will
7199  // hide items (the color is still inverted if there are items,
7200  // but the tile symbol is not changed).
7201  // draw_item_sym indicates that the item symbol should be used
7202  // even if sym is not '.'.
7203  // As we don't know at this stage if there are any items
7204  // (that are visible to the player!), we always set the symbol.
7205  // If there are items and the field does not hide them,
7206  // the code handling items will override it.
7207  draw_item_sym = ( field_symbol == "'%" );
7208  // If field display_priority is > 1, and the field is set to hide items,
7209  //draw the field as it obscures what's under it.
7210  if( ( field_symbol != "%" && fid.obj().priority > 1 ) || ( field_symbol != "%" &&
7211  sym == '.' ) ) {
7212  // default terrain '.' and
7213  // non-default field symbol -> field symbol overrides terrain
7214  memory_sym = sym = static_cast<uint8_t>( field_symbol[0] );
7215  }
7216  tercol = fe->color();
7217  }
7218  }
7219 
7220  // TODO: change the local variable sym to std::string and use it instead of this hack.
7221  // Currently this are different variables because terrain/... uses int as symbol type and
7222  // item now use string. Ideally they should all be strings.
7223  std::string item_sym;
7224 
7225  // If there are items here, draw those instead
7226  if( param.show_items() && curr_maptile.get_item_count() > 0 &&
7227  sees_some_items( p, player_character ) ) {
7228  // if there's furniture/terrain/trap/fields (sym!='.')
7229  // and we should not override it, then only highlight the square
7230  if( sym != '.' && sym != '%' && !draw_item_sym ) {
7231  hi = true;
