9454  if( terrain.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_FLOOR ) ||
9455  terrain.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_FLOOR_WATER ) ||
9456  terrain.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GOES_DOWN ) ||
9457  terrain.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_TRANSPARENT_FLOOR ) ) {
9458  if( below_submap &&
9459  below_submap->get_furn( sp ).obj().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SUN_ROOF_ABOVE ) ) {
9460  continue;
9461  }
9462  const point p( sx + smx * SEEX, sy + smy * SEEY );
9463  floor_cache[p.x][p.y] = false;
9464  no_floor_gaps = false;
9465  }
9466  }
9467  }
9468  }
9469  }
9470 
9471  ch.floor_cache_dirty = false;
9472  return zlevels;
9473 }
9474 
9475 void map::build_floor_caches()
9476 {
9477  const int minz = zlevels ? -OVERMAP_DEPTH : abs_sub.z();
9478  const int maxz = zlevels ? OVERMAP_HEIGHT : abs_sub.z();
9479  for( int z = minz; z <= maxz; z++ ) {
9480  build_floor_cache( z );
9481  }
9482 }
9483 
9484 static void vehicle_caching_internal( level_cache &zch, const vpart_reference &vp, vehicle *v )
9485 {
9486  auto &outside_cache = zch.outside_cache;
9487  auto &transparency_cache = zch.transparency_cache;
9488  auto &floor_cache = zch.floor_cache;
9489 
9490  const size_t part = vp.part_index();
9491  const tripoint part_pos = v->global_part_pos3( vp.part() );
9492 
9493  bool vehicle_is_opaque = vp.has_feature( VPFLAG_OPAQUE ) && !vp.part().is_broken();
9494 
9495  if( vehicle_is_opaque ) {
9496  int dpart = v->part_with_feature( part, VPFLAG_OPENABLE, true );
9497  if( dpart < 0 || !v->part( dpart ).open ) {
9498  transparency_cache[part_pos.x][part_pos.y] = LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_SOLID;
9499  } else {
9500  vehicle_is_opaque = false;
9501  }
9502  }
9503 
9504  if( vehicle_is_opaque || vp.is_inside() ) {
9505  outside_cache[part_pos.x][part_pos.y] = false;
9506  }
9507 
9508  if( vp.has_feature( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE ) && !vp.part().is_broken() ) {
9509  floor_cache[part_pos.x][part_pos.y] = true;
9510  }
9511 }
9512 
9513 static void vehicle_caching_internal_above( level_cache &zch_above, const vpart_reference &vp,
9514  vehicle *v )
9515 {
9516  if( vp.has_feature( VPFLAG_ROOF ) || vp.has_feature( VPFLAG_OPAQUE ) ) {
9517  const tripoint part_pos = v->global_part_pos3( vp.part() );
9518  zch_above.floor_cache[part_pos.x][part_pos.y] = true;
9519  }
9520 }
9521 
9522 void map::do_vehicle_caching( int z )
9523 {
9524  level_cache *ch = get_cache_lazy( z );
9525  if( !ch ) {
9526  return;
9527  }
9528  for( vehicle *v : ch->vehicle_list ) {
9529  for( const vpart_reference &vp : v->get_all_parts_with_fakes() ) {
9530  const tripoint part_pos = v->global_part_pos3( vp.part() );
9531  if( !inbounds( part_pos.xy() ) ) {
9532  continue;
9533  }
9534  vehicle_caching_internal( get_cache( part_pos.z ), vp, v );
9535  if( part_pos.z < OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) {
9536  vehicle_caching_internal_above( get_cache( part_pos.z + 1 ), vp, v );
9537  }
9538  }
9539  }
9540 }
9541 
9542 void map::build_map_cache( const int zlev, bool skip_lightmap )
9543 {
9544  const int minz = zlevels ? -OVERMAP_DEPTH : zlev;
9545  const int maxz = zlevels ? OVERMAP_HEIGHT : zlev;
9546  bool seen_cache_dirty = false;
9547  bool camera_cache_dirty = false;
9548  for( int z = minz; z <= maxz; z++ ) {
9549  build_outside_cache( z );
9550  build_transparency_cache( z );
9551  bool floor_cache_was_dirty = build_floor_cache( z );
9552  seen_cache_dirty |= floor_cache_was_dirty;
9553  seen_cache_dirty |= get_cache( z ).seen_cache_dirty;
9554  }
9555  // needs a separate pass as it changes the caches on neighbour z-levels (e.g. floor_cache);
9556  // otherwise such changes might be overwritten by main cache-building logic
9557  for( int z = minz; z <= maxz; z++ ) {
9558  do_vehicle_caching( z );
9559  }
9560  for( int z = minz; z <= maxz; z++ ) {
9561  seen_cache_dirty |= build_vision_transparency_cache( z );
9562  }
9563 
9564  if( seen_cache_dirty ) {
9565  skew_vision_cache.clear();
9566  skew_vision_wo_fields_cache.clear();
9567  }
9568  avatar &u = get_avatar();
9569  Character::moncam_cache_t mcache = u.get_active_moncams();
9570  Character::moncam_cache_t diff;
9571  std::set_symmetric_difference( u.moncam_cache.begin(), u.moncam_cache.end(), mcache.begin(),
9572  mcache.end(), std::inserter( diff, diff.end() ) );
9573  camera_cache_dirty |= !diff.empty();
9574  // Initial value is illegal player position.
9575  const tripoint_abs_ms p = get_player_character().get_location();
9576  int const sr = u.unimpaired_range();
9577  static tripoint_abs_ms player_prev_pos;
9578  static int player_prev_range( 0 );
9579  seen_cache_dirty |= player_prev_pos != p || sr != player_prev_range || camera_cache_dirty;
9580  if( seen_cache_dirty ) {
9581  if( inbounds( p ) ) {
9582  build_seen_cache( getlocal( p ), zlev, sr );
9583  }
9584  player_prev_pos = p;
9585  player_prev_range = sr;
9586  camera_cache_dirty = true;
9587 #if defined(TILES)
9588  if( !test_mode ) {
9589  // Mark cata_tiles draw caches as dirty
9590  tilecontext->set_draw_cache_dirty();
9591  }
9592 #endif
9593  }
9594  if( camera_cache_dirty ) {
9595  u.moncam_cache = mcache;
9596  bool cumulative = seen_cache_dirty;
9597  for( Character::cached_moncam const &mon : u.moncam_cache ) {
9598  if( inbounds( mon.second ) ) {
9599  int const range = mon.first->type->vision_day;
9600  build_seen_cache( getlocal( mon.second ), mon.second.z(), range, cumulative,
9601  true, std::max( 60 - range, 0 ) );
9602  cumulative = true;
9603  }
9604  }
9605  }
9606  if( !skip_lightmap ) {
9607  generate_lightmap( zlev );
9608  }
9609 }
9610 
9611 //////////
9612 ///// coordinate helpers
9613 
9614 tripoint map::getabs( const tripoint &p ) const
9615 {
9616  // TODO: fix point types
9617  return sm_to_ms_copy( abs_sub.xy().raw() ) + p;
9618 }
9619 
9620 tripoint map::getabs( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
9621 {
9622  return ( project_to<coords::ms>( abs_sub.xy() ) + p.raw() ).raw();
9623 }
9624 
9625 tripoint_abs_ms map::getglobal( const tripoint &p ) const
9626 {
9627  return tripoint_abs_ms( getabs( p ) );
9628 }
9629 
9630 tripoint_abs_ms map::getglobal( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
9631 {
9632  return project_to<coords::ms>( abs_sub.xy() ) + p.raw();
9633 }
9634 
9635 tripoint map::getlocal( const tripoint &p ) const
9636 {
9637  // TODO: fix point types
9638  return p - sm_to_ms_copy( abs_sub.xy().raw() );
9639 }
9640 
9641 tripoint map::getlocal( const tripoint_abs_ms &p ) const
9642 {
9643  // TODO: fix point types
9644  return getlocal( p.raw() );
9645 }
9646 
9647 tripoint_bub_ms map::bub_from_abs( const tripoint &p ) const
9648 {
9649  // TODO: fix point types
9650  return bub_from_abs( tripoint_abs_ms( p ) );
9651 }
9652 
9653 tripoint_bub_ms map::bub_from_abs( const tripoint_abs_ms &p ) const
9654 {
9655  return tripoint_bub_ms() + ( p - project_to<coords::ms>( abs_sub.xy() ) );
9656 }
9657 
9658 void map::set_abs_sub( const tripoint_abs_sm &p )
9659 {
9660  abs_sub = p;
9661 }
9662 
9663 tripoint_abs_sm map::get_abs_sub() const
9664 {
9665  return abs_sub;
9666 }
9667 
9668 template<typename Array>
9669 static cata::copy_const<Array, submap> *getsubmap_helper(
9670  const Array &grid, const size_t grididx )
9671 {
9672  if( grididx >= grid.size() ) {
9673  debugmsg( "Tried to access invalid grid index %d. Grid size: %d", grididx, grid.size() );
9674  return nullptr;
9675  }
9676  return grid[grididx];
9677 }
9678 
9679 submap *map::getsubmap( const size_t grididx )
9680 {
9681  return getsubmap_helper( grid, grididx );
9682 }
9683 
9684 const submap *map::getsubmap( const size_t grididx ) const
9685 {
9686  return getsubmap_helper( grid, grididx );
9687 }
9688 
9689 void map::setsubmap( const size_t grididx, submap *const smap )
9690 {
9691  if( grididx >= grid.size() ) {
9692  debugmsg( "Tried to access invalid grid index %d", grididx );
9693  return;
9694  } else if( smap == nullptr ) {
9695  debugmsg( "Tried to set NULL submap pointer at index %d", grididx );
9696  return;
9697  }
9698  grid[grididx] = smap;
9699 }
9700 
9701 submap *map::get_submap_at( const tripoint &p )
9702 {
9703  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
9704  debugmsg( "Tried to access invalid map position %s", p.to_string() );
9705  return nullptr;
9706  }
9707  return unsafe_get_submap_at( p );
9708 }
9709 
9710 const submap *map::get_submap_at( const tripoint &p ) const
9711 {
9712  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
9713  debugmsg( "Tried to access invalid map position %s", p.to_string() );
9714  return nullptr;
9715  }
9716  return unsafe_get_submap_at( p );
9717 }
9718 
9719 submap *map::get_submap_at_grid( const tripoint &gridp )
9720 {
9721  return getsubmap( get_nonant( gridp ) );
9722 }
9723 
9724 const submap *map::get_submap_at_grid( const tripoint &gridp ) const
9725 {
9726  return getsubmap( get_nonant( gridp ) );
9727 }
9728 
9729 size_t map::get_nonant( const tripoint &gridp ) const
9730 {
9731  if( gridp.x < 0 || gridp.x >= my_MAPSIZE ||
9732  gridp.y < 0 || gridp.y >= my_MAPSIZE ||
9733  gridp.z < -OVERMAP_DEPTH || gridp.z > OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) {
9734  debugmsg( "Tried to access invalid map position at grid (%d,%d,%d)", gridp.x, gridp.y, gridp.z );
9735  return 0;
9736  }
9737 
9738  if( zlevels ) {
9739  const int indexz = gridp.z + OVERMAP_HEIGHT; // Can't be lower than 0
9740  return indexz + ( gridp.x + gridp.y * my_MAPSIZE ) * OVERMAP_LAYERS;
9741  } else {
9742  return gridp.x + gridp.y * my_MAPSIZE;
9743  }
9744 }
9745 
9746 void map::draw_line_ter( const ter_id &type, const point &p1, const point &p2, const int z,
9747  bool avoid_creatures )
9748 {
9749  draw_line( [this, type, avoid_creatures, z]( const point & p ) {
9750  this->ter_set( tripoint_bub_ms( p.x, p.y, z ), type, avoid_creatures );
9751  }, p1, p2 );
9752 }
9753 
9754 void map::draw_line_furn( const furn_id &type, const point &p1, const point &p2, const int z,
9755  bool avoid_creatures )
9756 {
9757  draw_line( [this, type, avoid_creatures, z]( const point & p ) {
9758  this->furn_set( tripoint_bub_ms( p.x, p.y, z ), type, avoid_creatures );
9759  }, p1, p2 );
9760 }
9761 
9762 void map::draw_fill_background( const ter_id &type )
9763 {
9764  // Need to explicitly set caches dirty - set_ter would do it before
9765  set_transparency_cache_dirty( abs_sub.z() );
9766  set_seen_cache_dirty( abs_sub.z() );
9767  set_outside_cache_dirty( abs_sub.z() );
9768  set_pathfinding_cache_dirty( abs_sub.z() );
9769 
9770  // Fill each submap rather than each tile
9771  for( int gridx = 0; gridx < my_MAPSIZE; gridx++ ) {
9772  for( int gridy = 0; gridy < my_MAPSIZE; gridy++ ) {
9773  submap *sm = get_submap_at_grid( {gridx, gridy} );
9774  if( sm == nullptr ) {
9775  debugmsg( "Tried to fill background at (%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", gridx, gridy );
9776  continue;
9777  }
9778  sm->set_all_ter( type, true );
9779  }
9780  }
9781 }
9782 
9783 void map::draw_fill_background( ter_id( *f )() )
9784 {
9785  draw_square_ter( f, point_zero, point( SEEX * my_MAPSIZE - 1, SEEY * my_MAPSIZE - 1 ) );
9786 }
9787 void map::draw_fill_background( const weighted_int_list<ter_id> &f )
9788 {
9789  draw_square_ter( f, point_zero, point( SEEX * my_MAPSIZE - 1, SEEY * my_MAPSIZE - 1 ) );
9790 }
9791 
9792 void map::draw_square_ter( const ter_id &type, const point &p1, const point &p2, const int z,
9793  bool avoid_creatures )
9794 {
9795  draw_square( [this, type, avoid_creatures, z]( const point & p ) {
9796  this->ter_set( tripoint_bub_ms( p.x, p.y, z ), type, avoid_creatures );
9797  }, p1, p2 );
9798 }
9799 
9800 void map::draw_square_furn( const furn_id &type, const point &p1, const point &p2, const int z,
9801  bool avoid_creatures )
9802 {
9803  draw_square( [this, type, avoid_creatures, z]( const point & p ) {
9804  this->furn_set( tripoint_bub_ms( p.x, p.y, z ), type, avoid_creatures );
9805  }, p1, p2 );
9806 }
9807 
9808 void map::draw_square_ter( ter_id( *f )(), const point &p1, const point &p2, bool avoid_creatures )
9809 {
9810  draw_square( [this, f, avoid_creatures]( const point & p ) {
9811  this->ter_set( p, f(), avoid_creatures );
9812  }, p1, p2 );
9813 }
9814 
9815 void map::draw_square_ter( const weighted_int_list<ter_id> &f, const point &p1,
9816  const point &p2, bool avoid_creatures )
9817 {
9818  draw_square( [this, f, avoid_creatures]( const point & p ) {
9819  const ter_id *tid = f.pick();
9820  this->ter_set( p, tid != nullptr ? *tid : ter_str_id::NULL_ID(), avoid_creatures );
9821  }, p1, p2 );
9822 }

9832 {

9834  if( !is_open_air( tripoint( q, abs_sub.z() ) ) ) {
9835  this->furn_set( q, type );
9836  }
9837  }, p, rad );
9838 }

9844  }, p, rad );

9851  }, p, rad );

9858  }, p, rad );

9860 
9861 void map::add_corpse( const tripoint &p )
9862 {
9863  item body;
9864 
9865  const bool isReviveSpecial = one_in( 10 );
9866 
9867  if( !isReviveSpecial ) {
9868  body = item::make_corpse();
9869  } else {
9870  body = item::make_corpse( mon_zombie );
9871  body.set_flag( flag_REVIVE_SPECIAL );
9872  }
9873 
9874  put_items_from_loc( Item_spawn_data_default_zombie_clothes, p, calendar::turn_zero );
9875  if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
9876  put_items_from_loc( Item_spawn_data_default_zombie_items, p, calendar::turn_zero );
9877  }
9878 
9879  add_item_or_charges( p, body );
9880 }
9881 
9882 field &map::get_field( const tripoint &p )
9883 {
9884  return field_at( p );
9885 }
9886 
9887 void map::creature_on_trap( Creature &c, const bool may_avoid ) const
9888 {
9889  // gliding or boarded in a vehicle means the player is above the trap
9890  // like a flying monster and can never trigger the trap.
9891  const Character *const you = c.as_character();
9892  if( you != nullptr && ( you->in_vehicle || you->has_effect( effect_gliding ) ) ) {
9893  return;
9894  }
9895 
9896  tripoint pos = c.pos();
9897  // proximity traps
9898  std::vector<tripoint> tr_proximity;
9899  // find proximity traps in adjacent tiles
9900  for( int x = pos.x - 1; x <= pos.x + 1; x++ ) {
9901  for( int y = pos.y - 1; y <= pos.y + 1; y++ ) {
9902  if( x == pos.x && y == pos.y ) {
9903  continue;
9904  }
9905  const tripoint loc = tripoint( x, y, pos.z );
9906  const trap *trap_here = &tr_at( loc );
9907  if( trap_here->has_flag( json_flag_PROXIMITY ) ) {
9908  tr_proximity.push_back( loc );
9909  }
9910  }
9911  }
9912  // first trigger proximity traps
9913  for( tripoint &loc : tr_proximity ) {
9914  maybe_trigger_prox_trap( loc, c, may_avoid );
9915  }
9916  // then traps we stepped on
9917  maybe_trigger_trap( pos, c, may_avoid );
9918 }
9919 
9920 
9921 void map::maybe_trigger_prox_trap( const tripoint &pos, Creature &c, const bool may_avoid ) const
9922 {
9923  const trap &tr = tr_at( pos );
9924  if( tr.is_null() ) {
9925  return;
9926  }
9927  if( tr == tr_ledge && c.has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_LEVITATION ) ) {
9928  return;
9929  }
9930  //Don't trigger benign traps like cots and funnels
9931  if( tr.is_benign() ) {
9932  return;
9933  }
9934 
9935  if( tr.has_flag( json_flag_AVATAR_ONLY ) && !c.is_avatar() ) {
9936  return;
9937  }
9938 
9939  if( !tr.has_flag( json_flag_UNDODGEABLE ) && may_avoid && c.avoid_trap( pos, tr ) ) {
9940  Character *const pl = c.as_character();
9941  if( !tr.is_always_invisible() && pl && !pl->knows_trap( pos ) ) {
9942  pl->add_msg_if_player( _( "You've spotted a %1$s!" ), tr.name() );
9943  pl->add_known_trap( pos, tr );
9944  }
9945  return;
9946  }
9947 
9948  if( !tr.is_always_invisible() && tr.has_trigger_msg() ) {
9949  c.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, tr.get_trigger_message_u(), tr.get_trigger_message_npc(),
9950  tr.name() );
9951  }
9952  tr.trigger( pos, c );
9953 }
9954 
9955 void map::maybe_trigger_trap( const tripoint &pos, Creature &c, const bool may_avoid ) const
9956 {
9957  const trap &tr = tr_at( pos );
9958  if( tr.is_null() ) {
9959  return;
9960  }
9961  if( tr == tr_ledge && c.has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_LEVITATION ) ) {
9962  return;
9963  }
9964  //Don't trigger benign traps like cots and funnels
9965  if( tr.is_benign() ) {
9966  return;
9967  }
9968 
9969  if( tr.has_flag( json_flag_AVATAR_ONLY ) && !c.is_avatar() ) {
9970  return;
9971  }
9972 
9973  if( !tr.has_flag( json_flag_UNDODGEABLE ) && may_avoid && c.avoid_trap( pos, tr ) ) {
9974  Character *const pl = c.as_character();
9975  if( !tr.is_always_invisible() && pl && !pl->knows_trap( pos ) ) {
9976  pl->add_msg_if_player( _( "You've spotted a %1$s!" ), tr.name() );
9977  pl->add_known_trap( pos, tr );
9978  }
9979  return;
9980  }
9981 
9982  if( !tr.is_always_invisible() && tr.has_trigger_msg() ) {
9983  c.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, tr.get_trigger_message_u(), tr.get_trigger_message_npc(),
9984  tr.name() );
9985  }
9986  tr.trigger( c.pos(), c );
9987 }
9988 
9989 void map::maybe_trigger_trap( const tripoint_bub_ms &pos, Creature &c, const bool may_avoid ) const
9990 {
9991  maybe_trigger_trap( pos.raw(), c, may_avoid );
9992 }
9993 
9994 template<typename Functor>
9995 void map::function_over( const tripoint &start, const tripoint &end, Functor fun ) const
9996 {
9997  // start and end are just two points, end can be "before" start
9998  // Also clip the area to map area
9999  const tripoint min( std::max( std::min( start.x, end.x ), 0 ), std::max( std::min( start.y, end.y ),
10000  0 ), std::max( std::min( start.z, end.z ), -OVERMAP_DEPTH ) );
10001  const tripoint max( std::min( std::max( start.x, end.x ), SEEX * my_MAPSIZE - 1 ),
10002  std::min( std::max( start.y, end.y ), SEEY * my_MAPSIZE - 1 ), std::min( std::max( start.z, end.z ),
10003  OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) );
10004 
10005  // Submaps that contain the bounding points
10006  const point min_sm( min.x / SEEX, min.y / SEEY );
10007  const point max_sm( max.x / SEEX, max.y / SEEY );
10008  // Z outermost, because submaps are flat
10009  tripoint gp;
10010  int &z = gp.z;
10011  int &smx = gp.x;
10012  int &smy = gp.y;
10013  for( z = min.z; z <= max.z; z++ ) {
10014  for( smx = min_sm.x; smx <= max_sm.x; smx++ ) {
10015  for( smy = min_sm.y; smy <= max_sm.y; smy++ ) {
10016  submap const *cur_submap = get_submap_at_grid( { smx, smy, z } );
10017  if( cur_submap == nullptr ) {
10018  debugmsg( "Tried to function over (%d,%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", smx, smy, z );
10019  continue;
10020  }
10021  // Bounds on the submap coordinates
10022  const point sm_min( smx > min_sm.x ? 0 : min.x % SEEX, smy > min_sm.y ? 0 : min.y % SEEY );
10023  const point sm_max( smx < max_sm.x ? SEEX - 1 : max.x % SEEX,
10024  smy < max_sm.y ? SEEY - 1 : max.y % SEEY );
10025 
10026  point lp;
10027  int &sx = lp.x;
10028  int &sy = lp.y;
10029  for( sx = sm_min.x; sx <= sm_max.x; ++sx ) {
10030  for( sy = sm_min.y; sy <= sm_max.y; ++sy ) {
10031  const iteration_state rval = fun( gp, cur_submap, lp );
10032  if( rval != ITER_CONTINUE ) {
10033  switch( rval ) {
10034  case ITER_SKIP_ZLEVEL:
10035  smx = my_MAPSIZE + 1;
10036  smy = my_MAPSIZE + 1;
10037  // Fall through
10038  case ITER_SKIP_SUBMAP:
10039  sx = SEEX;
10040  sy = SEEY;
10041  break;
10042  default:
10043  return;
10044  }
10045  }
10046  }
10047  }
10048  }
10049  }
10050  }
10051 }
10052 
10053 void map::scent_blockers( std::array<std::array<bool, MAPSIZE_X>, MAPSIZE_Y> &blocks_scent,
10054  std::array<std::array<bool, MAPSIZE_X>, MAPSIZE_Y> &reduces_scent,
10055  const point &min, const point &max )
10056 {
10057  ter_furn_flag reduce = ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_REDUCE_SCENT;
10058  ter_furn_flag block = ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_SCENT;
10059  auto fill_values = [&]( const tripoint & gp, const submap * sm, const point & lp ) {
10060  // We need to generate the x/y coordinates, because we can't get them "for free"
10061  const point p = lp + sm_to_ms_copy( gp.xy() );
10062  if( sm->get_ter( lp ).obj().has_flag( block ) ) {
10063  blocks_scent[p.x][p.y] = true;
10064  reduces_scent[p.x][p.y] = false;
10065  } else if( sm->get_ter( lp ).obj().has_flag( reduce ) ||
10066  sm->get_furn( lp ).obj().has_flag( reduce ) ) {
10067  blocks_scent[p.x][p.y] = false;
10068  reduces_scent[p.x][p.y] = true;
10069  } else {
10070  blocks_scent[p.x][p.y] = false;
10071  reduces_scent[p.x][p.y] = false;
10072  }
10073 
10074  return ITER_CONTINUE;
10075  };
10076 
10077  function_over( tripoint( min, abs_sub.z() ), tripoint( max, abs_sub.z() ), fill_values );
10078 
10079  const inclusive_rectangle<point> local_bounds( min, max );
10080 
10081  // Now vehicles
10082 
10083  VehicleList vehs = get_vehicles();
10084  for( wrapped_vehicle &wrapped_veh : vehs ) {
10085  vehicle &veh = *( wrapped_veh.v );
10086  for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh.get_all_parts_with_fakes() ) {
10087  if( !vp.has_feature( VPFLAG_OBSTACLE ) &&
10088  ( !vp.has_feature( VPFLAG_OPENABLE ) || !vp.part().open ) ) {
10089  continue;
10090  }
10091  const tripoint part_pos = vp.pos();
10092  if( local_bounds.contains( part_pos.xy() ) ) {
10093  reduces_scent[part_pos.x][part_pos.y] = true;
10094  }
10095  }
10096  }
10097 }
10098 
10099 tripoint_range<tripoint> map::points_in_rectangle( const tripoint &from, const tripoint &to ) const
10100 {
10101  const tripoint min( std::max( 0, std::min( from.x, to.x ) ), std::max( 0, std::min( from.y,
10102  to.y ) ), std::max( -OVERMAP_DEPTH, std::min( from.z, to.z ) ) );
10103  const tripoint max( std::min( SEEX * my_MAPSIZE - 1, std::max( from.x, to.x ) ),
10104  std::min( SEEX * my_MAPSIZE - 1, std::max( from.y, to.y ) ), std::min( OVERMAP_HEIGHT,
10105  std::max( from.z, to.z ) ) );
10106  return tripoint_range<tripoint>( min, max );
10107 }
10108 
10109 tripoint_range<tripoint> map::points_in_radius( const tripoint &center, size_t radius,
10110  size_t radiusz ) const
10111 {
10112  const tripoint min( std::max<int>( 0, center.x - radius ), std::max<int>( 0, center.y - radius ),
10113  clamp<int>( center.z - radiusz, -OVERMAP_DEPTH, OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) );
10114  const tripoint max( std::min<int>( SEEX * my_MAPSIZE - 1, center.x + radius ),
10115  std::min<int>( SEEX * my_MAPSIZE - 1, center.y + radius ), clamp<int>( center.z + radiusz,
10116  -OVERMAP_DEPTH, OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) );
10117  return tripoint_range<tripoint>( min, max );
10118 }
10119 
10120 tripoint_range<tripoint_bub_ms> map::points_in_radius(
10121  const tripoint_bub_ms &center, size_t radius, size_t radiusz ) const
10122 {
10123  const tripoint_bub_ms min(
10124  std::max<int>( 0, center.x() - radius ), std::max<int>( 0, center.y() - radius ),
10125  clamp<int>( center.z() - radiusz, -OVERMAP_DEPTH, OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) );
10126  const tripoint_bub_ms max(
10127  std::min<int>( SEEX * my_MAPSIZE - 1, center.x() + radius ),
10128  std::min<int>( SEEX * my_MAPSIZE - 1, center.y() + radius ),
10129  clamp<int>( center.z() + radiusz, -OVERMAP_DEPTH, OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) );
10130  return tripoint_range<tripoint_bub_ms>( min, max );
10131 }
10132 
10133 tripoint_range<tripoint> map::points_on_zlevel( const int z ) const
10134 {
10135  if( z < -OVERMAP_DEPTH || z > OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) {
10136  // TODO: need a default constructor that creates an empty range.
10137  return tripoint_range<tripoint>( tripoint_zero, tripoint_zero - tripoint_above );
10138  }
10139  return tripoint_range<tripoint>(
10140  tripoint( 0, 0, z ), tripoint( SEEX * my_MAPSIZE - 1, SEEY * my_MAPSIZE - 1, z ) );
10141 }
10142 
10143 tripoint_range<tripoint> map::points_on_zlevel() const
10144 {
10145  return points_on_zlevel( abs_sub.z() );
10146 }
10147 
10148 std::list<item_location> map::get_active_items_in_radius(
10149  const tripoint &center, int radius )
10150 {
10151  return get_active_items_in_radius( center, radius, special_item_type::none );
10152 }
10153 
10154 std::list<item_location> map::get_active_items_in_radius( const tripoint &center, int radius,
10155  special_item_type type )
10156 {
10157  std::list<item_location> result;
10158 
10159  const point minp( center.xy() + point( -radius, -radius ) );
10160  const point maxp( center.xy() + point( radius, radius ) );
10161 
10162  const point ming( std::max( minp.x / SEEX, 0 ),
10163  std::max( minp.y / SEEY, 0 ) );
10164  const point maxg( std::min( maxp.x / SEEX, my_MAPSIZE - 1 ),
10165  std::min( maxp.y / SEEY, my_MAPSIZE - 1 ) );
10166 
10167  for( const tripoint_abs_sm &abs_submap_loc : submaps_with_active_items ) {
10168  // TODO: fix point types
10169  const tripoint submap_loc = ( abs_submap_loc - abs_sub.xy() ).raw();
10170  if( submap_loc.x < ming.x || submap_loc.y < ming.y ||
10171  submap_loc.x > maxg.x || submap_loc.y > maxg.y ) {
10172  continue;
10173  }
10174  const point sm_offset( submap_loc.x * SEEX, submap_loc.y * SEEY );
10175 
10176  submap *sm = get_submap_at_grid( submap_loc );
10177  if( sm == nullptr ) {
10178  debugmsg( "Tried get active items in radius of (%d,%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded",
10179  submap_loc.x, submap_loc.y, submap_loc.z );
10180  continue;
10181  }
10182  std::vector<item_reference> items = type == special_item_type::none ? sm->active_items.get() :
10183  sm->active_items.get_special( type );
10184  for( const item_reference &elem : items ) {
10185  const tripoint pos( sm_offset + elem.location, submap_loc.z );
10186 
10187  if( rl_dist( pos, center ) > radius ) {
10188  continue;
10189  }
10190 
10191  if( elem.item_ref ) {
10192  result.emplace_back( map_cursor( pos ), elem.item_ref.get() );
10193  }
10194  }
10195  }
10196 
10197  return result;
10198 }
10199 
10200 std::list<tripoint> map::find_furnitures_with_flag_in_radius( const tripoint &center,
10201  size_t radius,
10202  const std::string &flag,
10203  size_t radiusz ) const
10204 {
10205  std::list<tripoint> furn_locs;
10206  for( const tripoint &furn_loc : points_in_radius( center, radius, radiusz ) ) {
10207  if( has_flag_furn( flag, furn_loc ) ) {
10208  furn_locs.push_back( furn_loc );
10209  }
10210  }
10211  return furn_locs;
10212 }
10213 
10214 std::list<tripoint> map::find_furnitures_with_flag_in_radius( const tripoint &center,
10215  size_t radius,
10216  const ter_furn_flag flag,
10217  size_t radiusz ) const
10218 {
10219  std::list<tripoint> furn_locs;
10220  for( const tripoint &furn_loc : points_in_radius( center, radius, radiusz ) ) {
10221  if( has_flag_furn( flag, furn_loc ) ) {
10222  furn_locs.push_back( furn_loc );
10223  }
10224  }
10225  return furn_locs;
10226 }
10227 
10228 std::list<Creature *> map::get_creatures_in_radius( const tripoint &center, size_t radius,
10229  size_t radiusz ) const
10230 {
10231  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
10232  std::list<Creature *> creature_list;
10233  for( const tripoint &loc : points_in_radius( center, radius, radiusz ) ) {
10234  Creature *tmp_critter = creatures.creature_at( loc );
10235  if( tmp_critter != nullptr ) {
10236  creature_list.push_back( tmp_critter );
10237  }
10238 
10239  }
10240  return creature_list;
10241 }
10242 
10243 level_cache &map::access_cache( int zlev )
10244 {
10245  if( zlev >= -OVERMAP_DEPTH && zlev <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) {
10246  std::unique_ptr<level_cache> &cache = caches[zlev + OVERMAP_DEPTH];
10247  if( !cache ) {
10248  cache = std::make_unique<level_cache>();
10249  }
10250  return *cache;
10251  }
10252 
10253  debugmsg( "access_cache called with invalid z-level: %d", zlev );
10254  return nullcache;
10255 }
10256 
10257 const level_cache &map::access_cache( int zlev ) const
10258 {
10259  if( zlev >= -OVERMAP_DEPTH && zlev <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) {
10260  std::unique_ptr<level_cache> &cache = caches[zlev + OVERMAP_DEPTH];
10261  if( !cache ) {
10262  cache = std::make_unique<level_cache>();
10263  }
10264  return *cache;
10265  }
10266 
10267  debugmsg( "access_cache called with invalid z-level: %d", zlev );
10268  return nullcache;
10269 }
10270 
10271 pathfinding_cache::pathfinding_cache()
10272 {
10273  dirty = true;
10274 }
10275 
10276 pathfinding_cache &map::get_pathfinding_cache( int zlev ) const
10277 {
10278  return *pathfinding_caches[zlev + OVERMAP_DEPTH];
10279 }
10280 
10281 void map::set_pathfinding_cache_dirty( const int zlev )
10282 {
10283  if( inbounds_z( zlev ) ) {
10284  get_pathfinding_cache( zlev ).dirty = true;
10285  }
10286 }
10287 
10288 void map::set_pathfinding_cache_dirty( const tripoint &p )
10289 {
10290  if( inbounds( p ) ) {
10291  get_pathfinding_cache( p.z ).dirty_points.insert( p.xy() );
10292  }
10293 }
10294 
10295 void map::queue_main_cleanup()
10296 {
10297  if( this != &get_map() ) {
10298  _main_requires_cleanup = true;
10299  }
10300 }
10301 
10302 bool map::is_main_cleanup_queued() const
10303 {
10304  return _main_requires_cleanup;
10305 }
10306 
10307 void map::main_cleanup_override( bool over )
10308 {
10309  _main_cleanup_override = over;
10310 }
10311 
10312 const pathfinding_cache &map::get_pathfinding_cache_ref( int zlev ) const
10313 {
10314  if( !inbounds_z( zlev ) ) {
10315  debugmsg( "Tried to get pathfinding cache for out of bounds z-level %d", zlev );
10316  return *pathfinding_caches[ OVERMAP_DEPTH ];
10317  }
10318  pathfinding_cache &cache = get_pathfinding_cache( zlev );
10319  if( cache.dirty || !cache.dirty_points.empty() ) {
10320  update_pathfinding_cache( zlev );
10321  }
10322 
10323  return cache;
10324 }
10325 
10326 void map::update_pathfinding_cache( const tripoint &p ) const
10327 {
10328  if( !inbounds( p ) ) {
10329  return;
10330  }
10331  pathfinding_cache &cache = get_pathfinding_cache( p.z );
10332  pf_special cur_value = PF_NORMAL;
10333 
10334  const_maptile tile = maptile_at_internal( p );
10335 
10336  const ter_t &terrain = tile.get_ter_t();
10337  const furn_t &furniture = tile.get_furn_t();
10338  const field &field = tile.get_field();
10339  const map &here = get_map();
10340  int part;
10341  const vehicle *veh = veh_at_internal( p, part );
10342 
10343  const int cost = move_cost_internal( furniture, terrain, field, veh, part );
10344 
10345  if( cost > 2 ) {
10346  cur_value |= PF_SLOW;
10347  } else if( cost <= 0 ) {
10348  cur_value |= PF_WALL;
10349  if( terrain.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CLIMBABLE ) ) {
10350  cur_value |= PF_CLIMBABLE;
10351  }
10352  }
10353 
10354  if( veh != nullptr ) {
10355  cur_value |= PF_VEHICLE;
10356  }
10357 
10358  for( const auto &fld : tile.get_field() ) {
10359  const field_entry &cur = fld.second;
10360  if( cur.is_dangerous() ) {
10361  cur_value |= PF_FIELD;
10362  }
10363  }
10364 
10365  if( ( !tile.get_trap_t().is_benign() || !terrain.trap.obj().is_benign() ) &&
10366  !here.has_vehicle_floor( p ) ) {
10367  cur_value |= PF_TRAP;
10368  }
10369 
10370  if( terrain.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GOES_DOWN ) ||
10371  terrain.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GOES_UP ) ||
10372  terrain.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP ) || terrain.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_UP ) ||
10373  terrain.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_DOWN ) ) {
10374  cur_value |= PF_UPDOWN;
10375  }
10376 
10377  if( terrain.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SHARP ) && !here.has_vehicle_floor( p ) ) {
10378  cur_value |= PF_SHARP;
10379  }
10380 
10381  cache.special[p.x][p.y] = cur_value;
10382 }
10383 
10384 void map::update_pathfinding_cache( int zlev ) const
10385 {
10386  pathfinding_cache &cache = get_pathfinding_cache( zlev );
10387 
10388  if( cache.dirty ) {
10389  const int size = getmapsize();
10390  for( int x = 0; x < size * SEEX; ++x ) {
10391  for( int y = 0; y < size * SEEX; ++y ) {
10392  update_pathfinding_cache( { x, y, zlev } );
10393  }
10394  }
10395  cache.dirty = false;
10396  } else {
10397  for( const point &p : cache.dirty_points ) {
10398  update_pathfinding_cache( { p, zlev } );
10399  }
10400  }
10401  cache.dirty_points.clear();
10402 }
10403 
10404 void map::clip_to_bounds( tripoint &p ) const
10405 {
10406  clip_to_bounds( p.x, p.y, p.z );
10407 }
10408 
10409 void map::clip_to_bounds( int &x, int &y ) const
10410 {
10411  if( x < 0 ) {
10412  x = 0;
10413  } else if( x >= SEEX * my_MAPSIZE ) {
10414  x = SEEX * my_MAPSIZE - 1;
10415  }
10416 
10417  if( y < 0 ) {
10418  y = 0;
10419  } else if( y >= SEEY * my_MAPSIZE ) {
10420  y = SEEY * my_MAPSIZE - 1;
10421  }
10422 }
10423 
10424 void map::clip_to_bounds( int &x, int &y, int &z ) const
10425 {
10426  clip_to_bounds( x, y );
10427  if( z < -OVERMAP_DEPTH ) {
10428  z = -OVERMAP_DEPTH;
10429  } else if( z > OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) {
10430  z = OVERMAP_HEIGHT;
10431  }
10432 }
10433 
10434 bool map::is_cornerfloor( const tripoint &p ) const
10435 {
10436  if( impassable( p ) ) {
10437  return false;
10438  }
10439  std::set<tripoint> impassable_adjacent;
10440  for( const tripoint &pt : points_in_radius( p, 1 ) ) {
10441  if( impassable( pt ) ) {
10442  impassable_adjacent.insert( pt );
10443  }
10444  }
10445  if( !impassable_adjacent.empty() ) {
10446  //to check if a floor is a corner we first search if any of its diagonal adjacent points is impassable
10447  std::set< tripoint> diagonals = { p + tripoint_north_east, p + tripoint_north_west, p + tripoint_south_east, p + tripoint_south_west };
10448  for( const tripoint &impassable_diagonal : diagonals ) {
10449  if( impassable_adjacent.count( impassable_diagonal ) != 0 ) {
10450  //for every impassable diagonal found, we check if that diagonal terrain has at least two impassable neighbors that also neighbor point p
10451  int f = 0;
10452  for( const tripoint &l : points_in_radius( impassable_diagonal, 1 ) ) {
10453  if( impassable_adjacent.count( l ) != 0 ) {
10454  f++;
10455  }
10456  if( f > 2 ) {
10457  return true;
10458  }
10459  }
10460  }
10461  }
10462  }
10463  return false;
10464 }
10465 
10466 int map::calc_max_populated_zlev()
10467 {
10468  // cache is filled and valid, skip recalculation
10469  if( max_populated_zlev && max_populated_zlev->first == get_abs_sub() ) {
10470  return max_populated_zlev->second;
10471  }
10472 
10473  // We'll assume ground level is populated
10474  int max_z = 0;
10475 
10476  for( int sz = 1; sz <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; sz++ ) {
10477  bool level_done = false;
10478  for( int sx = 0; sx < my_MAPSIZE; sx++ ) {
10479  for( int sy = 0; sy < my_MAPSIZE; sy++ ) {
10480  const submap *sm = get_submap_at_grid( tripoint( sx, sy, sz ) );
10481  if( sm == nullptr ) {
10482  debugmsg( "Tried to calc max populated zlev at (%d,%d,%d) but the submap is not loaded", sx, sy,
10483  sz );
10484  continue;
10485  }
10486  if( !sm->is_uniform() ) {
10487  max_z = sz;
10488  level_done = true;
10489  break;
10490  }
10491  }
10492  if( level_done ) {
10493  break;
10494  }
10495  }
10496  }
10497 
10498  max_populated_zlev = std::make_pair( get_abs_sub(), max_z );
10499  return max_z;
10500 }
10501 
10502 void map::invalidate_max_populated_zlev( int zlev )
10503 {
10504  if( max_populated_zlev && max_populated_zlev->second < zlev ) {
10505  max_populated_zlev->second = zlev;
10506  }
10507 }
10508 
10509 bool map::has_potential_los( const tripoint &from, const tripoint &to ) const
10510 {
10511  const point key = sees_cache_key( from, to );
10512  char cached = skew_vision_cache.get( key, -1 );
10513  if( cached >= 0 ) {
10514  return cached > 0;
10515  }
10516  return true;
10517 }
10518 
10519 static bool is_haulable( const item &it )
10520 {
10521  // Liquid cannot be picked up
10522  return !it.made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID );
10523 }
10524 
10525 bool map::has_haulable_items( const tripoint &pos )
10526 {
10527  const map_stack items = i_at( pos );
10528  for( const item &it : items ) {
10529  if( is_haulable( it ) ) {
10530  return true;
10531  }
10532  }
10533  return false;
10534 }
10535 
10536 std::vector<item_location> map::get_haulable_items( const tripoint &pos )
10537 {
10538  std::vector<item_location> target_items;
10539  map_stack items = i_at( pos );
10540  target_items.reserve( items.size() );
10541  for( item &it : items ) {
10542  if( is_haulable( it ) ) {
10543  target_items.emplace_back( map_cursor( pos ), &it );
10544  }
10545  }
10546  return target_items;
10547 }
10548 
10549 tripoint drawsq_params::center() const
10550 {
10551  if( view_center == tripoint_min ) {
10552  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
10553  return player_character.pos() + player_character.view_offset;
10554  } else {
10555  return view_center;
10556  }
10557 }
